Apataleganaꞌmonanafa kagaefekeꞌmo, laha maegaiye, huꞌa apakesamo neꞌafiya vayaꞌmogi muki afinaꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo huteꞌa apamogaga aiyo, kagaemo alagepa huꞌa maisayafeꞌmo aika apati kaeꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmae. Kagikaeꞌmo hapau apayamopafiꞌmo hapauꞌnisiya vayaꞌmogimo kagaepiꞌmo apamogaga aiyo.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagaemo fatago vayaꞌmo hapa maesanageꞌa alagepa huꞌa maigae. Kagaemo haleguꞌapigana huka faika ku aika apategane.

Ala kava nene, ge neꞌnahaugenoꞌaeꞌmo kaipamo neleneꞌmo ge oꞌnahauvo. Kayoꞌmo neꞌnamisanagenoꞌaeꞌmo kaipamo neleneꞌmo kayoꞌmo oꞌnamiyo.
Lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌniyanagi kahau huka nato. Lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌnigeꞌna atete nehuvanagi halate alika alagepa huka nato.
Naipamoꞌmo lusi kava huno kana huꞌniyanageka na magi afinaꞌmo maiteka naha maegane.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, aika afe leka nagetekaeꞌmo hatu maeka nato. Falu kaipa vekamo maiꞌneka kahau huka neꞌapatana vekamo falisuva kavategatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
Faliꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo kagaefeꞌmo apakesamo noꞌafiye. Kanolufiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogi kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa nokatae.
Yulagefa neꞌaugenoꞌaeꞌmo lusi kava huno alaga neꞌnahae. Muki haniꞌilagamo hipaꞌnileꞌmo havaeꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo naunu aniꞌmoꞌmo hipaꞌnileꞌmo lamiꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo lanitani nehiye.
Kame vayaꞌnimo maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo naunumo lamiꞌnigeno naulagamo kosiꞌnigeꞌna ageꞌna alagepa huꞌna noꞌagove.
Aviꞌya nehugenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa afiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayanagi nataletapa viyo.
Nunumu huꞌna aukaya huꞌna ge nehugenoꞌaeꞌmo afiꞌniyanageno afaꞌa naha maegaiye.
Naha maesigeꞌapaeꞌmo muki kame vayaꞌnimo apavagage hisigeꞌa atete hugae. Apavagage hisigeꞌa nataleꞌa ugae.



















Ala kava nene, Ala kava netimogae, huꞌna, ma mopafi muki haopalegatiꞌmo ala kagikamo aliꞌnane. Ha le konali yakamoꞌa kokuꞌnate haneꞌniya yaꞌe vayaꞌeꞌmo ago aeno apakaseꞌniye.
Kagaemo muki aise mafaꞌne anagaꞌe nute mafaꞌne anagaꞌeꞌmo lokiya vaika apateꞌnanageꞌapaeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga nehageꞌapaeꞌmo kamekamogiꞌe gekamo amagiꞌa neꞌatalaya vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo ge osuꞌa afaꞌa maigae.
Nagaemo kokuꞌnate yaꞌmo kayatetiꞌmo alo huꞌnana yaꞌmo kaiꞌe muki kanefiꞌeꞌmo alo huka maleꞌnana yafeꞌmo nagesamo neꞌafiꞌnaeꞌmo, ma mopafi vayaꞌmo ina agufa vayanagi na kava higeka apakaefeꞌmo kagesamo neꞌafine. Na kava higeka vemo mafaꞌnemo ha neꞌmane.
<range>
Kagaemo vemo mafaꞌnemo alika atege enisole vayaꞌmo alika apatege huꞌnanageꞌapaeꞌmo enisole vayaꞌmogimo aise afinaꞌmo aeꞌa agaseꞌa maiꞌnae. Enisole vayaꞌai apaiyafiꞌmo alika ateteka ha le konali yaꞌaꞌe ala agiꞌaꞌeꞌmo alika amiꞌnane.
Kagaemo, alo huꞌnova yateꞌmo yagaika apato, huka hapa paiteka muki yaꞌe vayaꞌeꞌmo alika aiyafiꞌmo apateꞌnane.
Muki sipisipigi pulumakagi afela afugi kokuꞌnate namagi anipi noyamegi solovalapiꞌmo umenitata nehaya yanagi huka alika aiyafiꞌmo apateꞌnane.
<range>
Ala kava nene, Ala kava netimogae, huꞌna, ma mopafi muki haopalegatiꞌmo ala kagikamo aliꞌnane.







































Nagaemo hakumo alino ataleno yagaino natesiyafeꞌmo Ala kava nepiꞌmo uꞌna fala nekuvaꞌmofeꞌmo na agufa gemo, namagana huka avelegamo halelika kaune ho, hutapa naha paigae.
Ago, hosu vayaꞌmogimo alagepa apaipa vayaꞌmo hapaesayafeꞌmo atiꞌapimo yagaiteꞌa kevemo aliꞌa yagailiꞌa haniꞌilagamo neꞌvae.
Faino ateꞌniya yaꞌmo aliꞌa halagape vaiꞌa atalesayana alagepa vayaꞌmogimo na kava hugae.
Gotiꞌa kokuꞌnapiꞌmo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo aote mono noꞌafiꞌmo fai maiꞌniye. Gotiꞌa yagaino neꞌapateya siateꞌmo fai maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo ma mopafi muki vayaꞌmo apakeno alagepa huno apakeꞌneno alino fako huno neꞌapate.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa vayaꞌmo apamalageka nehiyaꞌmonanafa hosu vayanagi vayaꞌmo apamagisayafeꞌmo hapauꞌniya vayaꞌenagi huno aipafatiꞌmo alagi ohauꞌniye.
Agaemo apakaetegamo ko aigekana huno aneꞌai nofikana yaꞌmo yaga augiye. Atagi atafiꞌmo kae malefa yafanagi amuko yasimogi huno hetamaꞌapimo haneꞌniye.
Na agufa kavafeꞌmo hauꞌniyanagenoꞌaene. Ala kava neꞌmo fatago vekamo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo fatago kavafekeꞌmo hauꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmae. Alagepa kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo haiꞌa augosafiꞌmo agegae.

Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Hemenimo kagaefekeꞌmo mono nehaya vayaꞌmo oꞌmaiꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo laha mao. Ma mopafi vayapatiꞌmo fatago vayaꞌmo ago faliꞌa hano huꞌnae.
Muki vayaꞌmogimo afa gegeꞌmo hapa nepaiye. Aigofe geletiꞌmo huꞌa hapaoke nehae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa aigofe gemo huteꞌa huꞌa hapaoke nehaya vayaꞌmo kayoꞌmo apamigiye. Ala apakimo alisayafeꞌmo ge nehaya vayaꞌmo alagi alino hano huno apatalegaiye.
Apakaemo, getiletiꞌmo afaꞌa huta aeta apakasegaune. Lahauꞌniya gemo afaꞌa hugune. Ina laꞌmo yagaino nelate, huꞌa nehae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hunoꞌaeꞌmo, apakaemo kagemi yaꞌapimo oꞌmaleꞌnaya vayaꞌmo aliꞌa afepi neꞌapatae. Kafu huteꞌa alagepa huꞌa noꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogimo ha ha nehayaꞌmofeꞌmo he tiꞌna hapa maegauve. Afaꞌa maisayafeꞌmo hapauꞌniyanageꞌna hapa maeteꞌna aliꞌna alagepa huꞌna apategauve, huno huꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmo geꞌamo alagi lama geꞌageꞌmo haneꞌniye. Vayaꞌmogimo siluva yafaꞌmo aliꞌa atafiꞌmo seveni afinaꞌmo kaete kaete huꞌa kaeꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo muki oꞌaniꞌya faiꞌniya yaꞌamo leno hano huno ataleꞌnigeno siluva yafaꞌageꞌmo alino afole neꞌaiya kava huno Goti geꞌamo alagi lama geꞌageꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, yagaika latesanageta alagepa huta maigune. Muki afinaꞌmo laha maesanageꞌapaeꞌmo hosu vayaꞌmogi olatafaugae.
Alagi hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo ala apakimo neꞌaligeꞌapaeꞌmo hosu vayaꞌmogimo muki haopalegamo umenitata nehae.













Ala kava nene, huꞌna, haiya agufa vayaꞌmogimo seli mono nokafiꞌmo afaꞌa haiꞌa maigae. Haiya agufa vayaꞌmogimo kaote aveleꞌmo afaꞌa haiꞌa maigae.
Vaiꞌmo oꞌaliꞌa he tiꞌa umenitata huge fatago kavaꞌmo huge apaipafatiꞌmo lama gemo huge
huꞌa faipa huꞌa oꞌapatege apao vayaꞌaitegamo hosu kavaꞌmo osuge hapaopale neꞌmaiya vayaꞌaifenagi alu vayaꞌaifenagi huꞌa hosu faigoko gemo nehaya gemo oꞌafige
Gotiꞌa ohauꞌniya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo, laulagaleꞌmo ina agufa vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae, huꞌa huge Gotifeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌai apakiꞌapileꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa apatege Goti agiꞌalefeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo hugune, huꞌa hapa nepaiya gemo akame hisayafeꞌmo kana huꞌnisiyana afaꞌa akame huge
akamelegatiꞌmo magoꞌe monimo oꞌalige vaiꞌmo oꞌapamiꞌnaya vayaꞌaitegamo hosu kavaꞌmo hisayafeꞌmo kutulu monimo ohagege huꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogimo haiꞌa maigae. Aliꞌa hapa ofaisageꞌa ani agufa kavaꞌmo nehisaya vayaꞌmogimo muki afinaꞌmo maige maige huꞌa maigae.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, nagaemo kagaefekeꞌmo, naha maegaiye, huꞌna nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo yagaika nategeꞌnao afaꞌa maino.
Nagaemo Ala kava nefeꞌmo, Ala kava neꞌnimo maiꞌnane, huꞌna kaha nepauve. Kaha maesuvafeꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌmo nosufa ma mopafi maiꞌnaya apaote vayaꞌmo hapa maesuvafekeꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌmo nehuve. Apakaemo hogote vayaꞌmo maiꞌnageꞌna apakaefekeꞌmo amuse huꞌna neꞌapatove.
<range>
Alu gotiꞌapimo akame hisayafeꞌmo apayamukiki nehaya vayaꞌmogimo magoꞌe huꞌa lusi kana yaꞌmo aligae. Nagaemo kola ofaliniꞌapimo aliꞌna lakiꞌna oꞌapamiꞌna apakiꞌapimo oꞌaegauve.
Ala kava neꞌmo hetamaꞌnimo maiꞌneno aniꞌmo kapufatiꞌmo neꞌnova anikana huno maiꞌniye. Hetamaꞌnileꞌmo alagepa huka yagaika neꞌnatane.
Kagaemo alagepa yaꞌageꞌmo alika fako huka namiꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo amuse nehuve. He, alagepa yaꞌmo ago aliꞌnove.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alino api aino neꞌnateyanageꞌna agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna ategauve. Haniꞌilagamo nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌa alino naya neꞌmale.
Nagaemo muki afinaꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo aliꞌna naulagaleꞌmo neꞌatove. Lamaga nahaopaleꞌmo neꞌmaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo alagepa katetiꞌmo navaleliꞌa oꞌvisageꞌna aliꞌyaꞌnimo oꞌatalegauve.
Neꞌmaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo naipafiꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve. Navayafatiꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve. Navayagunagu huꞌna agava neꞌmauvanageno nagufaꞌnimo alagepa huno hanesigeꞌna maiꞌna falu huguve.
Kagaemo mani kavatefeꞌmo nauneꞌnameꞌnimo kanolufiꞌmo oꞌatalegane. Kagaemo, aote vekaꞌnimo agufaꞌamo atalesugeno okasaligiye, huka huꞌnane.
Kagaemo alagepa huꞌna maige maige huꞌna maisuva kaꞌmo alika nave ligane. Kaulagaleꞌmo maisaya vayaꞌai apaipafiꞌmo apamogaga aisaya kavaꞌmoꞌa havai tegaiye. Lamaga kahaopaleꞌmo maisaya vayaꞌmogimo muki afinaꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa apavai apavai huge huge huli uꞌa maigae.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Alagepa kavaꞌnieꞌmo ge hisugekaeꞌmo geꞌnimo afiyo. Kamalageka hisuvafeꞌmo nunumu osuꞌnogi kaipamo namiyo.
Kaulagaleꞌmo maiꞌnisugekaeꞌmo alika fako huka natetekaeꞌmo, alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌnane, huka huvo. Kagaemo alagepa kavaꞌnimo ago.
Naipaeꞌmo amalageka huꞌnane. Kagaemo haniꞌilagamo eka nagetekaeꞌmo namalageka huꞌnanaꞌmonanafa hosu nagesa neꞌafuva kavaꞌnimo oꞌageꞌnane. Hosu gemo osuguve, huꞌna nagoꞌyamo ataleꞌna ge huꞌnove.
Ma mopafi vayaꞌai kavaꞌapieꞌmo oꞌnahauꞌnigeꞌna nagesa noꞌafuve. Gekamo afiteꞌnaeꞌmo vayaꞌmo nehapaeya vekamo kaꞌaleꞌmo oꞌuꞌnove.
Nagaemo kakaleꞌmo neꞌuꞌnaeꞌmo aeꞌna halu oꞌvalesuvafeꞌmo natafauvo.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, Geꞌnimo afaꞌa afiganaꞌmofeꞌmo kagaefekeꞌmo ge huꞌnove. Kagetafo huꞌneka geꞌnimo afiyo.
Lamaga kayatetiꞌmo naha maeteka kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavakamo ageꞌna nahau aisuva kavakamo alika nave liyo. O Gotiyo, huꞌna, kame hapaesayafeꞌmo huꞌnaya vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo apakufamo alika katika neꞌapatana Gotigae, huꞌna, Naha mao.
Vayaꞌmogimo apaulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa neꞌyagaiya kava huka yagaika nato. Kahakumo ulunapiꞌmo alika fala kika nato.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo kana yaꞌmo aliꞌa neꞌnamiye. Kame vayaꞌnimogimo nahaesayafeꞌmo yagaiꞌa ku aiꞌa nateꞌnayanagi naha mao.
Apaipaguꞌe vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Ala apakimo alisayafekeꞌmo gemo nehae.
Apakaemo faiꞌa ku aiꞌa lateꞌnae. Laiyakamo ageteꞌa mopafiꞌmo aliꞌa yaga auꞌa latalesayafeꞌmo nehae.
Hapaesayafeꞌmo yagaiꞌa maiꞌnaya laiyonigana huꞌa maige fala kino maiꞌniya aikeli laiyonigana huꞌa maige huꞌa maiꞌnae.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, he tika eka apakaeꞌeꞌmo fotu nehukaeꞌmo mopafiꞌmo alika yaga auka apatalo. Kagaemo naipekaletiꞌmo hosu vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kayatetiꞌmo ma mopafi vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato. Ma mopafikeꞌmo hetamaꞌapimo haneꞌniye. Kagaemo fala kino haneꞌniya alagepa yakamo alika neꞌapaminagenoꞌaeꞌmo apakupafiꞌmo havai teꞌniye. Mafaꞌneꞌapimo neꞌyaꞌmoꞌa apamu paeꞌniye. Apakaemo kagemi yaꞌapimo neꞌatalageꞌapaeꞌmo nute mafaꞌneꞌapimogi neꞌaliye.
Kagemi yaꞌapimo neꞌaliyaꞌmonanafa nagaemo fatago kavakamo aliꞌnovanageꞌna kaugosafiꞌmo kagegauve. Nagaemo naupatiꞌmo he tiꞌna kagaekana huꞌna maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo magoꞌe kavafeꞌmo nahaꞌye osugiye.




















































Kokuꞌnateꞌmo haneꞌniya yaꞌmoꞌa Goti ha le konali yaꞌaeꞌmo aeno hakalo huno hapa nepaiye. Kokuꞌnaꞌmoꞌa Goti alagepa aliꞌyaꞌamo alino apave neliye.
Felugaꞌe felugaꞌeꞌmo ge nehunoꞌaeꞌmo haniꞌilagaꞌe haniꞌilagaꞌeꞌmo huꞌa ageteꞌa afisayafeꞌmo alino apave neliye.
Muki ma mopafiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa alu apake alu apakemo neꞌaiya vayaꞌmogimo kokuꞌnate haneꞌniya yaꞌmo ava gemo neꞌafiye. Ava gemo oꞌafiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo mago oꞌmaiꞌnae.
Kokuꞌnate haneꞌniya yaꞌmo ava gemo muki haopalega mopamo loleꞌe loleꞌe atupalegamo aino atagu faelino uneno hulino uꞌniye. Gotiꞌa yegemo noꞌamo kokuꞌnapiꞌmo ki maleꞌniye.
Aꞌmo aligefeꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogi noꞌapimo ataleꞌa apamogaga aime aime neꞌvaya kava huno yegemoꞌmo haineno nelamiye. Apayamufa vayaꞌmogimo uꞌa aeꞌa apakasesayafeꞌmo nagu nagu huꞌa neꞌvaya kava huno yegemoꞌmo haineno nelamiye.
Yegemoꞌa kokuꞌnaꞌmo aepalegatiꞌmo haineno atupalegamo nelamiye. Yegemo nelegenoꞌaeꞌmo mago amuko nosiya aupilagamo ohaneꞌnifa muki aupilagaꞌamo alagi leno amuko huno neꞌate.
Ala kava neꞌmo keꞌaepa geꞌamo kanale alagepa gemo haneꞌneno apakupi mafaꞌnemo alino alagepa huno neꞌate. Ala kava neꞌmo faigoko geꞌamoꞌmo aino ataginovano nosifa alagepa huno haneꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo oꞌageꞌnaya vayaꞌmo alino apaya maleꞌnigeꞌa apakesamo neꞌafiye.
Keꞌaepa gemo api gemo haneꞌnigeꞌa neꞌafiya vayaꞌmogi apamogaga neꞌaiye. Ani kava hiyo, ina kava osiyo, huno huꞌniya gemo hosu gemo ohaneꞌnifa alagepa geꞌageꞌmo haneꞌneno apaulagamo alino ayakeno apateteno alino alagepa huno neꞌapate.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo koli huteꞌa mono nehaya kavaꞌmo yaveyave kavaꞌmo haneꞌneno muki afinaꞌmo hanege hanege huno hanegaiye. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alino fako huno neꞌapateya gemo alagi lama geꞌageꞌmo haneꞌneno fatago gemo haneꞌniye.
Alopa monieꞌmo hapaꞌye nehiya kava huꞌa geꞌamo afisayafeꞌmo magoꞌe huno hapaꞌye hisiya agufa gemo haneꞌniye. Magoꞌe huno hagaꞌage gemo haneꞌneno kevegeve anumoꞌmo nehiya hagaꞌamo ago aeno agaseno haneꞌniye.
Gekamoꞌmo, ehekae, huno nehigeꞌnaeꞌmo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnamo afiteꞌnaeꞌmo atete nehuve. Gekamo akame nehaya vayaꞌmogimo alopa miyaꞌapimo aligae.
Muki vayaꞌmogimo muki hosu kavaꞌapifatiꞌmo aeꞌa kasalo nepaya kavaꞌapimo alagepa huꞌa afaꞌa oꞌagegae. Ala kava nene, huꞌna, hosu kavaꞌmo haneꞌniye, huꞌna oꞌageꞌna huꞌnova hosu kavaꞌnimo aeka kalo paeka atalo.
Hosu kavaꞌmo haneꞌniye, huꞌna ago ageꞌnova hosu kavaꞌmo halate osisuvafeꞌmo natafauka nato fiku yanageno ani hosu kavaꞌmoꞌa yagaino nategaiyanagi. Ani kava huka naha maesanageꞌnaeꞌmo vaiꞌmo oꞌaliꞌna hogote hosu kavaꞌmo aeno agaseꞌniya hosu kavaꞌmo osuguve.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, miya faika nateteka himamuꞌnimo alika neꞌnamina vekaꞌnimo maiꞌnane. Navayafatiꞌmo nehuva geꞌnimo ago afiteka naipafiꞌmo nagesamo neꞌafuva kavaꞌnimo kaulagafatiꞌmo ago nagetekaeꞌmo, alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌnane, huka hisanafekeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.

























Gotiꞌnimogae Gotiꞌnimogae, na kava higekaeꞌmo nataleka uꞌnane. Naha mao, huꞌna keya aeꞌna ge nehuvaꞌmonanafa na kava higekaeꞌmo nataleka uka afagiꞌaleꞌmo maiꞌneka naha noꞌmane.
O Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, felugamo keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogekaeꞌmo geꞌnimo oꞌafiꞌnane. Haniꞌilagaꞌeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogekaeꞌmo naha oꞌmaeꞌnanageꞌna maiꞌna falu nosuve.
Kagaefeꞌmo ge huꞌnovaꞌmonanafa kaote vekamo maiꞌnane. Kaote vekamo maiꞌnanageꞌapaeꞌmo Isaleli vayaꞌmogimo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa nekatae.
Laginago vayaꞌmogimo kagaefekeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago huꞌnagekaeꞌmo hapa maeꞌnane.
Kagaefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge huꞌnagekaeꞌmo apakufamo alika katika apateꞌnane. Kagaefekeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌnagekaeꞌmo hapa maeꞌnanageꞌapaeꞌmo apaipamoꞌmo kana osuꞌniye.
Huꞌnayaꞌmonanafa nagaemo vayakana huꞌna oꞌmaiꞌnofa hagifagana huꞌna maiꞌnogeꞌapaeꞌmo ina agufa vekamo maiꞌniye, huꞌa huteꞌa apakameꞌya neꞌnamiye.
Muki vayaꞌmogimo nageteꞌapaeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa neꞌnatae. Sagani huꞌa natege keka huꞌa natege huteꞌapaeꞌmo,
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa ha maesiyafeꞌmo agesamo afiꞌniyana na kava higenoꞌaeꞌmo ha noꞌmae. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa amuse huno neꞌatesiyaꞌmoꞌmo na kava higenoꞌaeꞌmo ha noꞌmae, huꞌa nehae.
Nehayaꞌmonanafa kagaemo itaꞌnimoꞌmo alagepa huka ha maeꞌnanageno alino nateꞌniye. Nute mafaꞌnemo maiꞌnogekaeꞌmo alagepa huka yagaika nateꞌnanageꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌnove.
Nagaemo itaꞌnimoꞌmo alino nateꞌniya afinatetiꞌmo kagaefekeꞌmo nagesamo afiꞌna fatago hume hume eꞌnove. Itaꞌnimoꞌmo alino nateꞌniya afinatetiꞌmo muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌnimogamo maige maige huka maiꞌnane.
Nagufaleꞌmo hanageke yaꞌmo afole neꞌaigeꞌapaeꞌmo naha maesaya vayaꞌmo oꞌmaiꞌnayanagi nataleka uka afagiꞌaleꞌmo oꞌmaiyo.
Kame vayaꞌnimogi Masani kotega afela ve pulumaka anagaꞌmogi nehaya kava huꞌa faiꞌa ku aiꞌa neꞌnatae.
Laiyoni anagaꞌmogi apaka tegeꞌapaeꞌmo kae kae nehaya kava huꞌa nagaetegamo apavayamo aka nehae.
Aniꞌmo aliꞌa mopafiꞌmo lakitalageno lamino hano nehiya kava huno lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌniye. Muki nayamufaꞌnimo uno aeno haniꞌniya nayamufamo aino hatu maeꞌniye. Naipamoꞌmo ani hegekana huꞌniye.
Hapamo leno hau nehiya kava huno lokiyaꞌnimo hau huꞌnigeno lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌniye. Ani kava huno navenafuꞌnamo hau huꞌnigeno navayafiꞌmo aeno kamaeꞌniye. Nataleꞌnanageꞌna faligefeꞌmo nehuve.
Afela kalamogi afumo hapaesayafeꞌmo faiꞌa ku aiꞌa neꞌapataya kava huꞌa hosu vayaꞌmogimo faiꞌa ku aiꞌa neꞌnatae. Nayapiꞌmo nili aige naiyafiꞌmo nili aige huꞌnae.
Muki nayamufaꞌnimo afole aiꞌnigeꞌna ageꞌnove. Kame vayaꞌnimogimo nageteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiye.
Muki kukenaꞌaꞌnimo aliꞌa fako huꞌa aliteꞌa yatala kukenaꞌnilefeꞌmo yokalo leteꞌapaeꞌmo aeno apakaseꞌniya vekamoꞌmo aliꞌniye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, afagiꞌaleꞌmo uka oꞌmaiꞌneka naha neꞌmana vekaꞌnimogae, huꞌna, malage huka eka naha mao.
Nagupi mafaꞌnemo lageso osisiyafeꞌmo naha maeteka afela kalagana agufa vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
Alopa afela laiyonimo avayafatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato. Afela ve pulumaka anagaꞌmogimo oꞌnahaesayafeꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato. Keya aeꞌna ge nehugekaeꞌmo nageleꞌmo aliꞌnane.
Naganaꞌnimogifeꞌmo kagaemo naha maeꞌnana kavafeꞌmo nava gemo huꞌna aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paiguve. Aliꞌa anupa huꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌai folagaꞌapifatiꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huguve.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo koli hutetapa mono nehaya vayaꞌmogitapamo ala agiꞌamo amiyo. Yekopu nofi vayaꞌmogitapamo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Isaleli nofi vayaꞌmogitapamo agaefekeꞌmo mono hiyo.
Hanageke yaꞌmo neꞌaliya vayaꞌmo apataleno aino afe leno akameꞌya noꞌapamifa keya aeꞌa ge nehagenoꞌaeꞌmo geꞌapimo afiteno hapa neꞌmae.
Asole vayaꞌmo aliꞌa anupa huꞌa neꞌmaiya folagapatiꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huguve. Kagaefeꞌmo mono nehaya vayaꞌai apaulagaleꞌmo kagaefeꞌmo ani kava huguve, huꞌna kaha paiꞌnova kavaꞌmo huguve.
Ala apakiꞌapimo oꞌaliꞌa yagu yaga huꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogi neꞌyaꞌmo neꞌa apamu hugae. Agaefeꞌmo kahauya huꞌa agesayafeꞌmo neꞌaya vayaꞌmogi Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hugae. Muki afinaꞌmo yuꞌilaga vekatapimo alagepa huno maigiye.
Muki ma mopamo loleꞌe loleꞌe atupaleꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo apakesamo afiteꞌa aiꞌa atagi neꞌa agaetegamo egae. Muki alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌmogimo agaefekeꞌmo mono hugae.
Ala kava neꞌmo kini vekamo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo muki alu nofi vayaꞌaiteꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌaiteꞌeꞌmo yagaino neꞌapate.
Ma mopafiꞌmo alagepa huꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogimo neꞌyaꞌmo neteꞌa agaefeꞌmo mono hugae. Muki vayaꞌmogi apakaiꞌapimo afaꞌa hapa oꞌmaeꞌa faligefe huꞌnisaya vayaꞌmogi apaleꞌyamo faiꞌa ape huꞌa maigae.
Afole aisaya vayaꞌmogimo aliꞌyaꞌamo aligae. Vayaꞌmogi aliꞌa oꞌapateꞌnayanageꞌa henagaꞌamo afole aisaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo Ala kava nefeꞌmo ava gemo huge lagufamo alino katino lateꞌniye huꞌa huge huꞌa maigae.
<range>
Vayaꞌmogimo sipisipileꞌmo yagaiꞌa neꞌapataya kava huno Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa yagaino neꞌnateyanageꞌna mago yafeꞌmo alagi kafu osuguve.
Agaemo sipisipi anagaꞌmogimo muki hegafatalili kahaumo neꞌnaya yategamo alino havaeno neꞌnate. Uno hogoteteno navalelino age noꞌaiya ani haigiꞌale ani haigiꞌaleꞌmo neꞌviye.
Nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌmo halate alino alagepa huno neꞌate. Agaemo agiꞌalefeꞌmo fatago kavaꞌmo hisuvafeꞌmo alu kate alu kateꞌmo navalelino neꞌviye.
He, nagaemo uꞌna kagoꞌmufilagamo falisuva ulunapiꞌmo faleꞌna haiꞌna umenitata nehugekaeꞌmo nagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeka maiꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo muki alu hosu kava alu hosu kavafeꞌmo alagi koli osuguve. Kayokaletiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika natege aino kalagifa hayopa kayokaletiꞌmo yagaika natege nehukaeꞌmo naipamo alika falu huka neꞌnatane.
Kagaemo kame vayaꞌnimogi apaulagaleꞌmo neꞌyaꞌnimo aliꞌna nesuvafeꞌmo hipaꞌnileꞌmo naulagaleꞌmo neꞌmalane. Kagaemo nagenopafiꞌmo uvelimo lakika faleka neꞌnatane. Aniꞌmo kapuꞌnifiꞌmo alika lakiꞌnanageno lamino havai teteno aino vali nelamiye.
Ma mopafiꞌmo maime maime neꞌvisugenoꞌaeꞌmo alagepa yaꞌmo nakame nakame huno alino namige namige huno maiteno hau huno nategaiye. Hutesigeꞌna Ala kava neꞌmo noꞌafiꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo haiꞌna maige maige huꞌna maiguve.
Ma mopamo Ala kava neꞌmo mopamae. Muki ma mopafiꞌmo haneꞌniya yaꞌamo agaiꞌa yaꞌageꞌmo haneꞌniye. Ma mopaꞌe ma mopafi vayaꞌeꞌmo agaiꞌa mopamo hanege agaiꞌa vayaꞌmo maige huꞌnae.
Agaemo ma mopamo solovala aniꞌmo agotofuleꞌmo alo hu maleꞌniye. Aniꞌmo agotofuleꞌmo faino ateꞌniye.
Haiya agufa vayaꞌmogimo Ala kava neꞌmo aveleꞌmo afaꞌa haiꞌa maigae. Haiya agufa vayaꞌmogimo aote mono noꞌafiꞌmo afaꞌa fale haiꞌa maigae.
Apayateꞌmo oꞌaniꞌyaꞌmo ofaiꞌnisiya yaveyave apaipa vayaꞌmogimae. Afa yatefeꞌmo mono osuge apagoꞌyamo ataleteꞌa aigofe gemo osuge nehisaya vayaꞌmogimae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fiku hapa maeno apamigiye. Gotiꞌa apakae apakufamo alino katino neꞌapateya vekamoꞌmo fatago kavaꞌamo alino apamigiye.
Alino apamisigeꞌa Yekopu Gotiꞌamoꞌmo agesayafeꞌmo kahauya nehae. Kaugosafiꞌmo kagesayafeꞌmo kahauya nehae.
Yafa lafi kegiꞌya kate kitamo yakitapa ateyo. Hanege hanege huno nehaneya mono note kitamo yakitapa ateyo. Yakitapa ategenoꞌao ha le konali kini vekamo faleno haineno.
Ani ha le konali kini vekamo ina laꞌae. Ala kava neꞌmo himamu lokiyaꞌaꞌe vekamae. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa himamuꞌaletiꞌmo kame huno neꞌapateya vekamae.
Yafa lafi kegiꞌya kate kitamo yakitapa ateyo. Hanege hanege huno nehaneya mono note kitamo yakitapa ateyo. Yakitapa ategenoꞌao ha le konali kini vekamo faleno haineno.
Ani ha le konali kini vekamo ina laꞌae. Asole ami vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya kini vekamo ha le konali kini vekamo maiꞌniye.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagaefekeꞌmo nunumu nehuꞌnaeꞌmo nagupi mafaꞌnemo aliꞌna asaga nehuve.
O Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, naha maegane, huꞌna nagesamo afiꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo fiku yanageꞌa kame vayaꞌnimogi aeꞌa nagasesageno navagage hugiyanagi oꞌnatalo.
He, muki vayaꞌmogimo kagava neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmo hapa maegenoꞌao apavagage osino. Apakaetegamo mago hosu kavaꞌmo osuꞌnayaꞌmonanafa fiku hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo hapa oꞌmaeka afaꞌa apatalegenoꞌao apavagage hino.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahauꞌninageka visuva kaꞌmo nave liyo. Ani kateꞌmo visuvafeꞌmo alika naya malo.
Nagufamo alika katika neꞌnatana Gotigamo maiꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo lama gekamo akame hisuvafeꞌmo alika naya malo. Muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo kagava neꞌmauve.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, akeyaꞌvilagatiꞌmo alagepa huka kahau huka apatege kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauge huka neꞌmaina kavafeꞌmo kagesamo afiyo.
Neya vekamo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo huge gekamo ago amagiꞌna atalege huꞌnova kavafeꞌmo kagesamo oꞌafiyo. O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahau huka apatege alagepa huka hapa maege huka maiꞌnekaeꞌmo nagaefeꞌmo kagesamo afiyo.
Ala kava neꞌmo alagepa fatago vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo hosu vayaꞌmogi alagepa kateꞌmo visayafeꞌmo alino apaya malegaiye.
Agaemo fatago kavaꞌaletiꞌmo yagu yaga kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo alino ho huno neꞌapate. Agaemo yagu yaga kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo kaꞌamo alino apave ligiye.
Agaemo kotalakemo hu maleꞌniya geꞌamo akame huge avayafatiꞌmo huꞌniya geꞌamo afige huꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo hau huno neꞌapateya kateꞌe geꞌamo akame nehiya kateꞌeꞌmo apavalelino neꞌviye.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, ala kagikalefeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌnimo alika atalo. Asole hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo alika atalo.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌmo ina lagimo maiꞌnae. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa afaꞌa alino apaya malesigeꞌa alagepa kateꞌmo ugae.
Apakaemo alagepa huꞌa maisageꞌa apakinago vayaꞌmogi ma mopamo aligae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaefeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌmo alino fala ki maleꞌniya geꞌamo hapa paigiye. Hapa paiteno kotalake hu maleꞌniya gemo aepaꞌamo alino apave ligiye.
Agaemo natafauno nateꞌniya umenifatiꞌmo hatu maeno nategaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo aulu heꞌna neꞌagove.
Nagaemo nagaiꞌnigeꞌmo magokeꞌageꞌmo maiꞌneꞌna kana yaꞌmo aliꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo aika afe leka nagaemo nageteka kahau huka nato.
Naipafiꞌmo haneꞌniya kana yaꞌnimoꞌa lusi kava huno kositeno afole aiꞌniyanagi hanageke yapatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
Kana yaꞌmo alige nagafu kige huꞌna maiꞌnisugeka nagetekaeꞌmo muki hosu kavaꞌnimo alika atalo.
Kame vayaꞌnimo asole vayaꞌmo maiꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo apakaefeꞌmo kagesamo afiyo. Apakaemo nagaefeꞌmo alagi ohapauꞌnigeꞌa apaini huꞌa neꞌnatae.
Nagupi mafaꞌneleꞌmo yagaika ateꞌneka hosu kavategatiꞌmo navalelika uka naote nato. Nagaemo kagaefekeꞌmo, naha maegane, huꞌna nagesamo afiteꞌna maiꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo navagage osino.
Nagaemo kagava maiꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo naha maegeꞌnao lama ge huꞌna fatago kavakamo akame huteꞌna alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌna maino.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna kagaemo Isaleli vayaꞌmo hanageke yapiꞌmo maiꞌnagi miya faika hatu maeka apato.












Ala kava neꞌmo ha le yaꞌnimo aepa vekamo maiꞌneno nagufamo alino katino neꞌnateya vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ina lagifeꞌmo koliꞌapimo huguve. Ala kava neꞌmo himamuꞌnimo aepa vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ina lagifeꞌmo atete huguve.
Hosu vayaꞌmo kame vayaꞌnimogi nagaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo nagufamo nahaeꞌa nesayafeꞌmo nagaetegamo eꞌapaeꞌmo apagoꞌya faiꞌa asagauꞌa aiꞌnae.
Asole vayaꞌmogimo kame huꞌa natesayafeꞌmo eꞌa maiꞌnisageꞌnaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo atete osugiye. Kame huꞌa natesayana naipamoꞌmo lokiya vaigiye.
Nagaemo Gotiꞌa magoke yaꞌmo alino namisiyafeꞌmo nahauꞌniyanageꞌna ani yaꞌmo alisuvafekeꞌmo kahauya huguve. Nagaemo Ala kava neꞌmo nopiꞌmo muki afaꞌa maisuva afinaꞌmo maiꞌneꞌna Ala kava neꞌmo konali yaꞌamo aulu heꞌna ageteꞌnaeꞌmo alopa mono noꞌafiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌna ge huꞌna afi gesuvafeꞌmo maigesuve.
Hanageke yaꞌmo afole aisiya afinaꞌmo alino fala kino natege alopa mono noꞌafiꞌmo alino fala kino natege huteno yatala yafateꞌmo nasaga huno faino nategaiye.
Nagaemo kame vayaꞌnimo aeꞌna apakaseteꞌna alopa mono noꞌafiꞌmo ofalinimo amiteꞌna alopa gefatiꞌmo nehuꞌnaeꞌmo namogaga aiguve. Ala kava nefekeꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo yokemo huteꞌna agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huguve.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagaefeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge hisugekaeꞌmo geꞌnimo afiyo. Kahau huka nateteka geꞌnileꞌmo aeka atagaina huka naha paiyo.
Kagaemo nagaefeꞌmo hukaeꞌmo nagaefeꞌmo kahauya hulika eno huka nehanageꞌnaeꞌmo kagaefeꞌmo nagaemo kahauya huliꞌna uguve, huꞌna nehuve.
Kaugosamo alika fala kiliꞌneka kaipamo leka nateteka aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamo naha faika oꞌnatalo. O Gotiyo, huꞌna, naha maeꞌnananagi kakameꞌyamo namiteka nataleka oꞌuvo.
Itaꞌni afoꞌnilaꞌmoganimo anakameꞌyamo namisaꞌana Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa yagaino nategaiye.
Kame vayaꞌnimo maiꞌnayanagi kagae kaꞌmo nave ligeꞌna agetesugeka ani kateꞌmo navalelika uvo.
Kame vayaꞌnimogi aigofe gemo huge kamagigune huꞌa huge nehayanagi navaleka apayapiꞌmo oꞌapamiyo.
Nagaemo ofaliꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌnisugeno Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa yaꞌamo alino namigiye, huꞌna nagesamo afiꞌna fatago nehuve.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo agava maiyo. Lokiya vaitapa maiꞌnigenoꞌao lokiya vaino lapateno. Ala kava nefekeꞌmo agava maiyo, huꞌna nehuve.


























































Gotiꞌa keꞌaepa geꞌamo amagiꞌa ataleꞌnaya kavaꞌapimo alino atalege hosu kavaꞌapimo aeno ati kaeno atalege huꞌnisiya vayaꞌmogimo Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Gotiꞌa hosu kavaꞌapimo haneꞌniye, huno nosigeꞌa humi nami kavaꞌmo osuꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Nagaemo hosu kavaꞌnieꞌmo aeꞌna hakalo osuꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo aviꞌya huge huge huꞌna maiꞌnogeno lokiyaꞌnimo ago hano huꞌniye.
Ani kava huꞌna maiꞌnogekaeꞌmo felugaꞌe haniꞌilagaꞌeꞌmo kana yaꞌmo alika namiꞌnanagenoꞌaeꞌmo amuko nehiya afinaꞌmo aniꞌmo leno nelaneya kava huno lokiyaꞌnimo ago hano huꞌniye.
Ani afinaꞌmo hosu kavaꞌnieꞌmo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna kaha paiꞌnova afinaꞌmo hosu kavaꞌnimo aeꞌna ati okaeꞌnove. Nagaemo, keꞌaepa gekamo ago amagiꞌna ataleꞌnova kavaꞌnieꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmogaeꞌmo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna kaha paiguve, huꞌna huꞌnogekaeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌnimo ago alika ataleꞌnane.
Ani kava nehanaꞌmofeꞌmo muki kakame nehaya vayaꞌmogimo kahauya huꞌa kagesaya afinaꞌmo nunumu hiyo. Aniꞌmo henoꞌaeꞌmo hapaopaleꞌmo oꞌmegaiye.
Kagaepiꞌmo eꞌna fala kiꞌnisugekaeꞌmo hanageke yaꞌmo oꞌalisuvafeꞌmo yagaika nategane. Kagaemo nagufamo alika katika natesana yokemo nehisugekaeꞌmo faika ku aika yagaika nategane.
Gotiꞌa hunoꞌaeꞌmo, nagaemo visana kaꞌmo alagepa huꞌna aliꞌna kaya maleteꞌna aliꞌna kave liguve, huno huꞌniye. Naulagaletiꞌmo visana kaꞌmo aliꞌna kave liguve.
Hosimogi apakesamo oꞌafiꞌnageꞌa vayaꞌmogigeꞌmo geꞌapimo afisayafeꞌmo apavayafiꞌmo aenimo ateteꞌa nofi aeteꞌa yagaiꞌa apateꞌneꞌa aliꞌa api aiꞌa neꞌapatae. Hosigana hutapa oꞌmaiyo.
Hosu vayaꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa kana yaꞌmo aligayaꞌmonanafa Ala kava nefeꞌmo apakesamo neꞌafiya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo hau huno neꞌapateya kavaꞌamoꞌmo yagaino ku aino apategaiye.
Alagepa vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava nefekeꞌmo lapamogaga aitetapa amuse hiyo. Geꞌamo akame nehaya vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, lapamogaga neꞌaitapaeꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo hiyo.























Nagaemo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo muki afinaꞌae afinaꞌaeꞌmo hao ke hegauve. Agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huge huge huꞌna maiguve.
Agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna atesugeꞌapaeꞌmo apakufamo aliꞌa afepi neꞌataya vayaꞌmogi afiteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga aigae.
Nagaegiꞌeꞌmo hutaeꞌmo, Ala kava neꞌmo ala agi vekamo maiꞌniye, huta magokepi higetao. Agiꞌaleꞌmo magokepi alita asaga higetao.
Koli huꞌna maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo naha maesiyafeꞌmo kahauya huꞌna nunumu huꞌnogeno afitenoꞌaeꞌmo naha maeꞌnigeꞌna koli osuꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌnove.
Vayaꞌmogimo ageteꞌapaeꞌmo amuse huꞌa maiꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo ani kava hutapa agegenoꞌao lapaipamoꞌmo kana osino.
Nagaemo lokiya vekamo oꞌmaiꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogeno Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa afiꞌniye. Afitenoꞌaeꞌmo muki hanageke yapatiꞌmo nagufamo alino katino nateꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmo enisole vekaꞌamoꞌmo Ala kava nefeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino ku aino apateteno apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate.
Ala kava neꞌmo kanale vekamo maiꞌniye hutapa agegayanagi ageyo. Ala kava nepiꞌmo fala kiꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmo Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Lapaote vayaꞌmo maiꞌnayanagi Ala kava nefeꞌmo koli hutetapa akame hiyo. Koli huteꞌa akame nehaya vayaꞌmogimo kafu osugae.
Laiyoni anaꞌaumogi apaka neteyaꞌmonanafa Ala kava neꞌmo agesayafeꞌmo kahauya nehaya vayaꞌmogimo muki alagepa yaꞌmo aliteꞌapaeꞌmo kafu nosae.
Mafaꞌne anagaꞌmogitapamo etapa geꞌnimo afiyo. Ala kava nefekeꞌmo koli hutetapa akame hisaya kavaꞌmo aliꞌna lapaya malegauvanagi eyo.
Alagepa hutapa yatala afinaꞌmo maiꞌnetapa lapamogaga aisayafeꞌmo lapauꞌnifiye.
Inagi lapauꞌnisiyana hosu gemo osuge aigofe gemo osuge hisayafeꞌmo alagepa hutapa yagaitapa lapateyo.
Hosu kavategatiꞌmo maitapa halove hutapa eta alagepa kavakeꞌmo hiyo. Kaveta osutapa alagepa hutapa magokepi lokaetapa maisayafeꞌmo kahauya hutapa vegala aeyo.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino apateꞌneno aukaya huꞌa ge nehaya geꞌapimo neꞌafiye.
Neꞌafiyaꞌmonanafa hosu kava nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo kame huno neꞌapategeꞌa faliꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo ago apake nekaniye.
Fatago vayaꞌmogimo keya aeꞌa ge nehageno afitenoꞌaeꞌmo muki hanageke yapatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa yulagefa neꞌaiya vayaꞌai hapaopaleꞌmo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo afepilagamo faleꞌa haiꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌai apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate.
Alagepa vayaꞌmogimo lusi hanageke yaꞌmo neꞌaliyaꞌmonanafa Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa muki hanageke yapatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa kanale vekaleꞌmo alagepa huno yagaino ateꞌnigeno magoke ayamufamo alagi lo oꞌaeꞌniye.
Hosu vayaꞌmo hosu kavaꞌapimoꞌmo apamagisigeꞌa faligae. Alagepa kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo nohapaiya vayaꞌmo kayoꞌmo apamigiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vayaꞌai apakufamo miya faino alino katino neꞌapate. Agaepiꞌmo eꞌa fala nekiya vayapatiꞌmo magoke vekaeꞌmo, hosu vekamo maiꞌnane, huno huteno alagi alino hafaino oꞌatalegaiye.





























Gotiꞌa hosu vayaꞌai hosu kavaꞌapieꞌmo apava gemo huno naha paiꞌniya gemo naipafiꞌmo haneꞌniyana apakaemo Gotiꞌmo apakameꞌya amiteꞌa koli nosae.
Ala vayaꞌmo maiꞌnone, huꞌa nehayaꞌmofeꞌmo Gotiꞌa hosu kavatimo oꞌagege hosu kavaꞌmo nehae, huno osuge nehiye, huꞌa apakesamo neꞌafiye.
Hosu gemo huge aigofe gemo huge huꞌa neꞌmaiye. Afiteꞌa ageꞌnaya kavaꞌe alagepa kavaꞌapiꞌeꞌmo ataleꞌa afaꞌa neꞌmaiye.
Hipaꞌapileꞌmo havaeꞌa maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo hisayafekeꞌmo apakesamo neꞌafiye. Muki nehaya kavaꞌapimo hosu kavaꞌageꞌmo haneꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo muki hosu kavaꞌapieꞌmo, haꞌao, alagi oꞌnahaiye, huꞌa nosae.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, olataleka lagaefeꞌmo kahau huka nelatana kavakamoꞌmo lusi yatala yaꞌmo kokuꞌnapiꞌmo nehaiya agufa yatala yakana huno haneꞌniye. Ani kavaꞌmo huguve, huka nehana gekamo alagi amagika oꞌataleka akame huka nehana kavakamoꞌmo ina kava huno hiyateꞌmo nehaiya agufa yakana huno haneꞌniye.
Alagepa kavakamoꞌmo avegana huno lusi yaꞌmo haneꞌniye. Alagepa huka alika fako huka neꞌapatana kavakamoꞌmo solovala aniꞌmo vasilonagana huno haneꞌniye. Ala kava nene, huꞌna, vayatenagi afulenagi yagagafalenagi huka yagaika neꞌapatanageꞌa afaꞌa neꞌmaiye.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, olataleka lagaefeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavakamoꞌmo alagepa kanale kavaꞌmo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo lahauꞌniye. Kahakumo auneꞌafiꞌmo uta fala kita neꞌmaune.
Lusi neꞌyaꞌmo nelaminageta alita neꞌnonagenoꞌaeꞌmo lamu nepae. Nelaminagetaeꞌmo lamogaga aisunafeꞌmo alopa anipatiꞌmo aniꞌmo neꞌnone.
Maige maige huta maisuna kavaꞌmo aepa vekamo maiꞌnane. Ha le yakamoꞌmo aeno ha nelegetaeꞌmo ha le yakamo ageta alagepa huta neꞌagone.
Kageꞌnaya vayaꞌmo oꞌapataleka magoꞌe huka kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahaino. Api kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌaitegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo huvo.
Himuꞌnamuꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo nagaetegamo oꞌmesayafeꞌmo esaya kateꞌmo kaꞌmo akani malo. Hosu vayaꞌmogimo aliꞌa nahafaiꞌa oꞌnatalesayafeꞌmo naha mao.
Ageyo, huꞌna, Gotiꞌa hosu vayaꞌmo apamagiꞌnigeꞌa mopafiꞌmo asagauꞌa aiteꞌa havaeꞌa maiꞌnae. Halate he otigae.
Hosu vayaꞌmogi nehaya kavaꞌapieꞌmo lapakesa alaꞌamo afitetapa lapausoli osiyo. Hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌa neꞌmaiyanageta apakaekana huta maigesune, hutapa osiyo.
Kahaumo malage huno leno falu neteya kava huꞌa malage huꞌa falu tegae. Aise yosamo neꞌvaiya kava huꞌa vaigae.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo lapakesamo afita fatago hutetapa alagepa kavaꞌmo higenoꞌao lapa maesigetapa ma mopafiꞌmo alagepa hutapa maigayanagi.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo amuse hutapa ategenoꞌao lapaipafiꞌmo lapauꞌnisiya kavaꞌmo alino lapamino.
Lapakaemo lapakesamo afitapaeꞌmo lagaetegamo na agufa kavaꞌmo afole aisifi, hutapa lapakesa afisaya kavaꞌmo alitapa Ala kava neꞌmo amitetapa agaefekeꞌmo lapakesamo afita fatago higeno lapa maeno.
Lapa maesigenoꞌaeꞌmo alagepa kavatapimo yegekana huno aeno ha legaiye. Ani kava huno fatago kavatapimo vayaꞌai apaulagaleꞌmo alino afole aino ategaiye.
Ala kava neꞌmo aulagaleꞌmo afaꞌa maiꞌnetapaeꞌmo agava maige maige hutapa maiyo. Hosu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa alagepa huꞌa neꞌmaiya kavafeꞌmo lapakesa alaꞌamo afitetapa lapausoli osiyo.
Lapaipamo oletapa hosu kavategamo alagi lapayamukiki osiyo. Lapakaemo hosu kavaꞌmo hisayafeꞌmo lapakesa alaꞌamo afitetapa ataletapa lapausoli osiyo.
Hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo kayoꞌmo aliteꞌa faligayaꞌmonanafa Ala kava nefeꞌmo agava neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogimo ma mopamo aligae.
Aise afinaꞌmo utesigeꞌa hosu vayaꞌmo alagi lageso hisagetapaeꞌmo maiꞌnaya kotegamo utapa kahauya hutapa oꞌapakegae.
Oꞌapakegayaꞌmonanafa falu fala apaipa vayaꞌmogimo ma mopamo aliteꞌa alagepa huꞌa magokepi lokaeꞌa maiꞌneꞌa apamogaga aiꞌa maigae.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo fatago vayaꞌaitegamo hosu kavaꞌmo hisayafeꞌmo ina kava hugune, ma kava hugune, huꞌa huteꞌa maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo hosu apaugosamo kaliꞌneꞌa maku make huꞌa neꞌapatae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alino apagoꞌya lagauno apatalesiya afinafeꞌmo afaꞌa apakeno maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo apakaefeꞌmo kigi huno neꞌapate.
Hosu vayaꞌmogi hosu yaꞌmo neꞌaliya vayaꞌe ina agufa vayaꞌeꞌmo afaꞌa apateꞌneꞌa api kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo naipeletiꞌmo apaisayafeꞌmo asagige atiletiꞌmo hapaesayafeꞌmo atimo alige huꞌa neꞌmaiye.
Naipeꞌapimoꞌmo apakaiꞌapi apaipafiꞌmo aesigenoꞌaeꞌmo atiꞌapimo lo aegaiye.
Mago fatago vekamoꞌa aise kagemi yaꞌamo haneꞌniya yaꞌamoꞌmo muki hosu vayaꞌai alopa kagemi yaꞌapimo ago aeno agaseno haneꞌniye.
Na kava higenoꞌaeꞌmo ago aeno neꞌagase. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hosu vayaꞌai himamuꞌapimo alino hano huno atalegaiyaꞌmonanafa fatago vayaꞌaiteꞌmo alagepa huno yagaino neꞌapateyaꞌmofeꞌmae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fatago vayaꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maigae, huno apakeꞌniye. Hetamaꞌapimo afaꞌa hanege hanege huno hanegaiye.
Hanageke yaꞌmo afole aisiya afinaꞌmo hosu hanageke yaꞌmo oꞌalige kafu hisaya afinaꞌmo kafu osuge huꞌa alagepa huꞌa maigae.
Maigayaꞌmonanafa hosu vayaꞌmo faligae. Kahaumo ausegana huꞌa maige halinagana huꞌa maige huꞌa neꞌmaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo alagi lageso hugae.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo fiku aliteꞌapaeꞌmo anonaꞌapilefeꞌmo noꞌapamiyaꞌmonanafa fatago vayaꞌmogimo hapau huꞌa apateteꞌa fiku neꞌapamiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fiku hapa neꞌmaeya vayaꞌmogimo ma mopamo alitesagenoꞌaeꞌmo huno faipa huno neꞌapateya vayaꞌmo alagi lageso hugae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa vayaꞌmogi hisaya kavaꞌmo aepa vekamo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo ago hu maleꞌniye. Ani kava huno nehaya kavaꞌapimo agetenoꞌaeꞌmo amuse huno neꞌapate.
Apakaemo asagauꞌa neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa apayateꞌmo alino he tino neꞌapateyaꞌmofeꞌmo alagi asagauꞌa oꞌaigae.
Nagaemo yatala afinaꞌmo maime maime eꞌna hemenimo ago kosuna lovaꞌmonanafa Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fatago vayaꞌamo apataleno uꞌniya kavaꞌamo oꞌagege mafaꞌneꞌapimogi neꞌyafeꞌmo aukaya huꞌnaya kavaꞌmo oꞌagege huꞌna oꞌageꞌnove.
Fatago vayaꞌmogimo muki afinaꞌmo hapau huꞌa apateteꞌa magoꞌe yaꞌmo aliꞌa apamiteꞌa anonaꞌapilefeꞌmo neꞌapamiye. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa mafaꞌneꞌapimo fiku hapa maeno neꞌapamiye.
Hosu kavaꞌmo ataletetapa alagepa kavakeꞌmo hiyo maige maige hutapa alagi maigayanagi.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa kavafekeꞌmo hauꞌniyanageno aote vayaꞌamo alagi apataleno oꞌugiye. Yagaino apatenageꞌa hano osuꞌa maige maige huꞌa maigayaꞌmonanafa hosu vayaꞌai mafaꞌneꞌapimo alino hapa faino apatalegaiye.
Fatago vayaꞌmo mago mopamo apamisigeꞌa aliteꞌa ani mopaleꞌmo maige maige huꞌa alagi maigae.
Fatago vayaꞌmogimo ageteꞌa afiꞌnaya gemo huge gefiꞌmo alagepa huꞌa aliꞌa fako huꞌa afiteꞌa ge huge huꞌa neꞌmaiye.
Goti keꞌaepa geꞌamo apaipafiꞌmo haneꞌniyanageꞌa afaꞌa aeꞌa halu oꞌvalegae.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo fatago vayaꞌmo apamagisayafeꞌmo aulu hapaeꞌa neꞌapakae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hosu vayaꞌai apayapiꞌmo apavaleno oꞌapamino hapa maesigeꞌa hosu vayaꞌmogimo agoti huꞌa apateteꞌapaeꞌmo hosu vayane, huꞌa osugae.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo agava maiꞌnetapa geꞌamo afigenoꞌao lapakitapileꞌmo alino asaga huno lapateteno mopamo hakino lapamino. Agaemo hosu vayaꞌmo alino hapa faitalesigeꞌa visagetapa apakegae.
Agovana hosu vekamoꞌa lokiya vaino yagaino apateno maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo mago yatala yosagana huno haino apakaseno maiꞌniye.
Maiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa henagaꞌamo uꞌna agovana oꞌmaiꞌnigeꞌna ageꞌnove. Kahauya huꞌnovana oꞌageꞌnove.
Lapakaemo alagepa vayaꞌmo aulu hapaetapa apaketetapaeꞌmo fatago vayaꞌmo apaketapa maiyo. Kanaꞌapimo hano hisigeꞌapaeꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maigayaꞌmonanafa
gemo amagiꞌa neꞌatalaya vayaꞌmo alagi alino hano huno apatalegaiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fatago vayaꞌai apakufamo alino katino neꞌapateya kavaꞌamo aepa vekamo maiꞌniye. Hanageke yaꞌmo afole neꞌaiya afinaꞌmo himamuꞌaletiꞌmo hapa neꞌmae.
Apakaemo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago nehayaꞌmofeꞌmo hatu maeno apateteno hosu vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo apavalelineno apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate.

Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kaipamo leka neꞌnatekaeꞌmo ge oꞌnahauvo. Kaipamo leka neꞌnatekaeꞌmo oꞌnamagiyo.
Kevekaletiꞌmo nahaeꞌnanageno eno nagufafiꞌmo haniꞌnigekaeꞌmo kayatetiꞌmo namagiꞌnane.
Kaipamo leka nateꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo nagufamoꞌmo alagi kanale nosiye. Hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo nayamufaꞌnimoꞌa alagi lokiya noꞌvaiye.
Hosu kavaꞌnimoꞌmo anikana huno nagenopaleꞌmo aeno nati kaeꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo lusi kana yaꞌmo aliꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo aeno nagaseꞌniye.
Negi kavaꞌmo huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo namuꞌmo naleteno kolaꞌe oꞌeꞌmo huꞌnigeno atu neꞌaiye.
Nagufamoꞌmo kanaꞌageꞌmo nahauꞌnigeꞌna muki afinaꞌmo ape huꞌnageꞌmo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo yulagefa aiꞌna neꞌmauve.
Amukomo nahauꞌnigeꞌna faligefeꞌmo nehuve.
Lusi kava huno alagaꞌmo nahaeꞌnigeno lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌniye. Naipamoꞌmo kanale osuꞌnigeꞌna avovo nehuve.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, na agufa naipamo nekalufi huka ago nageꞌnanageꞌnaeꞌmo avovo nehuꞌna yulagefa neꞌaugeka afiꞌnane.
Lutunopaꞌnifatiꞌmo fako pako nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌniye. Naulagafatiꞌmo haniꞌageꞌmo huꞌniye.
Lusi kaitaꞌmo nahauꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo nao vayaꞌe nafaluꞌnimogiꞌeꞌmo nagaetegamo oꞌmeꞌnae. Afamo anagaꞌnimogiꞌeꞌmo nataleꞌa uꞌa afagiꞌaleꞌmo maiꞌnae.
Namagisayafeꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo aneꞌaimo hanagi maleꞌnae. Namagigefeꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo nagaetegamo hisaya kavafeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo apakesa afifi huꞌa maiꞌneꞌa namagisaya kafeꞌmo kahauya huꞌa agesayafeꞌmo nehae.
Nehayaꞌmonanafa agesamo akanigeno gemo noꞌafiya vekagana huꞌna maiꞌneꞌna gemo noꞌafuve. Negi vekamoꞌmo age noꞌaiya vekagana huꞌna neꞌmauve.
He, gemo nehaya gemo noꞌafiya vekagana huꞌna maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo gemo nohapauve.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagava neꞌmauve. Ala kava neꞌnimo Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, geꞌnimo afiteka naha maegane.
Hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnova kavafeꞌmo fiku yanageꞌa apamogaga aigae. Aeꞌna halu vale lamiꞌna asagauꞌna aisugeꞌapaeꞌmo fiku yanageꞌa ago aeta agaseꞌnone, huꞌa hugae.
Asagauꞌna aigefeꞌmo nehugenoꞌaeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo nagafu nekiye.
Hosu kavaꞌnieꞌmo nahau huteꞌnaeꞌmo aeꞌna hakalo nehuve.
Apakaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo osuꞌnogeꞌa afaꞌa neꞌmaiya kame vayaꞌnimogiꞌeꞌmo lokiya vayaꞌageꞌmo maiꞌnae. Asole vayaꞌmogimo fiku apaini huꞌa neꞌnatae.
Nagaemo alagepa kateꞌmo visuvafeꞌmo nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo kame huꞌa nateteꞌa alagepa kavaꞌnimo anonaꞌalefeꞌmo nagaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo nehae.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, nataleka oꞌuvo. O Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, afagiꞌaleꞌmo uka oꞌmaika nahaopaꞌalekeꞌmo eka maiyo.
Ala kava neꞌnimogae, huꞌna, nagufamo alika katika neꞌnatana vekaꞌnimogamae, huꞌna, malage huka eka naha mao.















Nagaemo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa naha maesiyafeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huteꞌnaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo falu huꞌnigeꞌna agava maiꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo ape huno agetafo huꞌneno geꞌnimo afiꞌniye.
Agaemo alagi hosu ive kelifatiꞌmo nayate alino heno navayu huno navalelino haino yafateꞌmo nateteno alagepa kateꞌmo visuvafeꞌmo alino lokiya vaino nateꞌniye.
Saufa yokemo alino naya maleꞌnigeꞌna Goti agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huteꞌna ani yokemo nehuve. Asole vayaꞌmogimo nageteꞌapaeꞌmo koli huteꞌa Ala kava nefeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago huteꞌapaeꞌmo, laha maegaiye, huꞌa huteꞌa maigae.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago huteꞌapaeꞌmo, laha maegaiye, huꞌa nehaya vayaꞌmogimo Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogagamo aigae. Apakaemo himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmofi aigofe gotiꞌapimogifeꞌmo mono nehaya vayaꞌmofi huno ala apakiꞌapimo noꞌapamiye.
O Ala kava neꞌnimo Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, lagaetegamo alu kava alu kavaꞌmo huka aliꞌyaꞌmo aliteka laha maeꞌnane. Lagaefeꞌmo kagesa afifi huka neꞌmaine. Lagaemo lekana opaisuna agufa kavaꞌmo huka lagaefeꞌmo kagesamo neꞌafine. Nagaemo muki huꞌnana kavakaꞌe kagesamo neꞌafina kavakalefeꞌmo alagi alagepa huꞌna aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa opaiguve.
Afumo amagiꞌa nekamiya kavaꞌe ofalinimo nekamiya kavaꞌefeꞌmo okahauꞌniye. Kagaemo, hosu kavatapilefeꞌmo afumo amagitapa hiꞌyalamuteꞌmo atafiꞌmo kaetapa namiyo, huka osuꞌnanaꞌmonanafa gekamo afisuva agufa nagesageꞌmo namiꞌnane.
Namiꞌnanageꞌnaeꞌmo, Nago, huꞌna, nagaemo neꞌove. Goti mukufiꞌmo nava gemo haneꞌniye.
O Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, keꞌaepa gekamo naipafiꞌmo haneꞌniye. Kagaemo huvo, huka naha paiꞌnana gekamo akame hisuvafeꞌmo amuse huteꞌna namogaga neꞌauve.
Nagaemo asole vayaꞌmo eꞌa aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌnaya yateꞌmo fatago kavakaeꞌmo alagepa faigoko gekamo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paiꞌnove. Ago nageꞌnanana afaꞌa oꞌmaiꞌna gekamo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa nepauve.
Nagaemo fatago kavakamo naipafiꞌmo aeꞌna ati kaeꞌna oꞌmaleꞌnofa nagaemo, geꞌamo alagi amagino oꞌataleno akame nehunoꞌaeꞌmo apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate, huꞌna aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paiꞌnove. Nagaemo asole vayaꞌmo eꞌa aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo nekahaiya kavakaꞌe lama ge gekaꞌeꞌmo aeꞌna ati okaeꞌna aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paiꞌnove.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, oꞌnataleka kahau huka nato. Nagaefeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌninageka lama gekamo akame hugeꞌnao muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa maino.
Lekana opaisuna agufa hanageke yaꞌmoꞌmo nagufaleꞌmo faino ku aino nateꞌniye. Hosu kavaꞌnimoꞌa natafauꞌniyanageꞌna afaꞌa aliꞌna maku huꞌna okagegauve. Nayokaꞌmo asole yaꞌmo haneꞌniya kava huno hosu kavaꞌnimo magoꞌe huno haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo lokiya oꞌvaiꞌnigeno lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌniye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahauꞌnisigeka nagufamo alika katika nato. Ala kava nene, huꞌna, malage huka naha mao.
Kagaemo naha maegeꞌapao kamiti namagigefe nehaya vayaꞌmo apavagage hisigeꞌa negi nagi hiyo. Hosu yaꞌmo aliꞌa namigefe nehaya vayaꞌmo apakamelagatiꞌmo asagauꞌa aiꞌa heleve hisageno apakiꞌapimo asagauno aino.
Kigi huꞌa nateteꞌa nagaefeꞌmo, vaehae, vaehae, huꞌa nehaya vayaꞌmo apavagage hisiya yaꞌmo alika apamigeꞌa hapau aiyo.
Hapau aigayaꞌmonanafa kagaefeꞌmo kahauya huliꞌa neꞌaya vayaꞌmogimo apamogaga aiteꞌa kagaefeꞌmo amuse hiyo. Apakufamo alika katika neꞌapatana kavafeꞌmo hapauꞌnisiya vayaꞌmogimo, Ala kava neꞌmo ala agiꞌamo amiyo, huꞌa hiyo.
Inagi nagaemo afa vekamo maiꞌneꞌna kafu huꞌna maiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa nagaefeꞌmo agesamo neꞌafiye. O Gotiyo, huꞌna, naha maeka nagufamo alika katika neꞌnatana vekaꞌnimogae, afaꞌa oꞌmaika malage huka naha mao.















Afela afu anagaꞌmogimo anifeꞌmo nehapaigeꞌapaeꞌmo anitegamo neꞌvaya kava huꞌna Gotiyo, huꞌna, kagaefeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.
Afaꞌa neꞌmaina Gotigae, huꞌna, kagaefeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye. Hainu afinaꞌmo uꞌna kaulagaleꞌmo mono huguve.
Apakaemo huꞌa faipa huꞌa nateteꞌapaeꞌmo Gotikamoꞌmo haiyate maiꞌniye, huꞌa hute hute huꞌnageꞌnaeꞌmo felugaꞌe haniꞌilagaꞌeꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo oꞌneꞌna aviꞌya huge huge huꞌna neꞌmauve.
Nagaemo huꞌnova kavafeꞌmo nagesamo afiteꞌna naipafiꞌmo haneꞌniya kavaꞌaꞌnimo aeꞌna laku faeꞌna kaha nepauve. Hogoteta nagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeta neꞌutaeꞌmo mono yokemo huge Goti agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga huge hulita Goti mono notegamo uꞌnone. Mukiꞌamogitamo mono hisunafeꞌmo aote afinaꞌmo hu maleꞌnone.
Nagaemo na kava higeꞌnaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo kana nehiye. Na kava higeꞌnaeꞌmo nagesa alaꞌamo neꞌafuve. Nagupi mafaꞌneyo, huꞌna, Gotiꞌa naha maesiyafeꞌmo agava maiꞌneka kavayagunagu nehugeꞌnao halate naha neꞌmaeya vekaꞌnimo Gotiꞌnimo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga hino.
Naipamoꞌmo lusi kava huno kana nehiyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefeꞌmo halate nagesamo afiguve. Aniꞌmo Hemoni avefatiꞌe Misa avefatiꞌeꞌmo emineno alopa aniꞌmo Yoneni anipiꞌmo nelaminoꞌaeꞌmo lamino haꞌyamo asagauno neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo alopa agemo neꞌaiya kava huno alopa hanageke yaꞌmoꞌa nagufaleꞌmo nati nekae.
<range>
Nati nekaeyaꞌmonanafa Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa aipamo falu huꞌniya kavaꞌaꞌe hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniya kavaꞌaꞌeꞌmo felugamo alino nave lisigeꞌnaeꞌmo haniꞌilagamo yokemo huge afaꞌa maisuva yaꞌmo namiꞌniya Gotifeꞌmo nunumu huge huꞌna maiguve.
Nagaemo Gotiꞌa yafaꞌnigana vekaeꞌmo na kava higeka nataleka nagaefeꞌmo alagi kagesamo noꞌafine. Na kava higeka kame vayaꞌnimo apakeka apataleꞌnanageꞌa hosu yaꞌmo neꞌnamigeno nagafu nekiye.
Geꞌapiletiꞌmo keveletiꞌmo neꞌnahaya kava huꞌa Gotikamoꞌmo haiyateꞌmo maiꞌniye, huꞌa huteꞌa huꞌa faipa huꞌa neꞌnatae.
Nagaemo na kava higeꞌnaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo kana nehiye. Na kava higeꞌnaeꞌmo nagesa alaꞌamo neꞌafuve. Nagupi mafaꞌneyo, huꞌna, Gotiꞌa naha maesiyafeꞌmo agava maiꞌneka kavayagunagu nehugeꞌnao halate naha neꞌmaeya vekaꞌnimo Gotiꞌnimo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga hino.

































Alagepa gemoꞌmo naipafiꞌmo havai teteno aino vali nelamigeꞌnaeꞌmo kini vekaekeꞌmo ava gemo nehuve. Alagepa huno avoꞌmo nekaeya vekamoꞌa avoꞌmo kaesiyafeꞌmo avo kayoꞌmo aliteno alo huno neꞌmaiya kava huꞌna navayafatiꞌmo gemo hisuvafeꞌmo alo huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Kagaemo aeto agufa kumani vekamo maiꞌneka muki vayaꞌmo alagi aeka apakaseka maiꞌnane. Gotiꞌa fiku hapa maeno neꞌapamiya gemo kavayafiꞌmo alino maleꞌnigeka ani gemo nehane. Gotiꞌa muki afinaꞌmo kaha maeꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmae.
Lokiya vekae, huꞌna, kagaemo ha le konali yakaꞌe ala kagikaleꞌefeꞌmo hapau aiteꞌa amuse huꞌa nekataya vekamo maiꞌnananagi naipekamo alika anoꞌafiꞌmo mapalukafiꞌmo falu kaeteka uka kame huvo.
Kagaemo ala kagikamo alika apavelitekaeꞌmo lama gekamogi yagu yaga kavakamogi fatago kavakamogi huka ha maeka alika afole aika ato. Alika afole aika atesanafeꞌmo hosileꞌmo fai maiꞌneka uka kame huka aeka apakaso. Lokiyakaletiꞌmo kame huteka hapau aisaya agufa kavaꞌmo hugane.
Kevekamo lusi kava huno akoꞌya huꞌniya kevemo haneꞌniyanageka kame vayakamogi apaipafiꞌmo nehapanageꞌapaeꞌmo kaiyafiꞌmo asagauꞌa neꞌaiye.
O Gotiyo, huno, muki afinaꞌmo yagaika apatege apatege huka yagaika apategane. Fatago kavaꞌmo huka vayakaleꞌmo alagepa huka yagaika neꞌapatane.
Kagaemo alagepa kavafeꞌmo lusi kava huno kahauꞌnigeno hosu kavafeꞌmo alagi okahauꞌniye. Ani kava nehanaꞌmofeꞌmo Gotiꞌa Gotikamoꞌmo uvelimo faleno katetenoꞌaeꞌmo lekana paino kateꞌniyanageka alagepa huka kamogaga aika maisanafeꞌmo magoꞌe huno kamiꞌnigeka kafalukamogimo aeka apakaseka alagepa huka maiꞌnane, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌmo agiꞌamo meyagi alosigi kasiyagi huno haneꞌneno kukenakalegatiꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiye. Alagepa noꞌmo kini vekamo nopiꞌmo konali aliꞌa ateꞌnaya nopiꞌmo yokemo huꞌnagekaeꞌmo kamogaga aiteka emikeꞌnane.
Ala apaki aꞌnekamogiꞌeꞌmo kini vayaꞌai aꞌmafaꞌneꞌapimo maiꞌnae. Akamoꞌmo hogote goli yafatetiꞌmo alo huꞌnaya konalimo aliteno lamaga kahaopaleꞌmo he tino maiꞌniye.
Kini vekaleꞌmo maisana aꞌmafaꞌnemogae, huꞌna, kagesa afifi huteka kaipamo namiyo. Vayakaeꞌmo kagesamo oꞌafige afokamo vayaꞌaifeꞌmo kagesamo oꞌafige huteka kage kanika apatalegenoꞌao kini vekamoꞌa, aeto agufa kumani aꞌnimo maiꞌnane, huno huteno amuse huno kateno. Ala kava nekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo mono huteka aiyafiꞌmo maiꞌneka geꞌamo afiyo.
<range>
Taiya taonifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo malaga vayaꞌmogimo fiku kaha maeꞌa kamigae. Kagemi yaꞌapiꞌe vayaꞌmogimo hapa maesanafeꞌmo kagaetegamo ugae.
Kini vekamo aꞌmafaꞌneꞌamoꞌmo agupiꞌmo aeto agufa alagepa kanale yaꞌmo haneꞌnigeno goli nofitetiꞌmo alo huꞌnaya kukenamo alino vaiꞌniye.
Konali kukenamo leꞌniya kukena alino vaitesigeꞌapaeꞌmo kini vekalegamo avaleliꞌa ugae. Afaluꞌamogimo veꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa ohavaeꞌnaya aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌmogi akame huꞌa neꞌvayanageꞌa kagaetegamo apavaleliꞌa ugae.
Uꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga aiteꞌa kini vekamo noꞌafiꞌmo apavaleliꞌa haigae.
Kagaemo asole mafaꞌnemo alika apatesanageꞌa kaginago vayaꞌai apaimuꞌyaleꞌmo maigae. Kagaemo muki ma mopafi vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaiꞌa apatesaya vayaꞌmo lekana paika apategane.
Nagaemo ala kagikamo kamisugeꞌa henagaꞌamo afole aisaya vayaꞌmogimo kagaefeꞌmo apake okaniꞌa ala kagikamo kamigae. Muki vayaꞌmogimo kagikaleꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huge huge huꞌa maigae.

Uta fala kita neꞌmauna kotimo Gotiꞌmae. Lokiyatimo Gotiꞌmae. Hanageke yaꞌmo afole neꞌaisigenoꞌaeꞌmo lahamaesiyafeꞌmo lahaopaleꞌmo alo huno maiꞌniye.
Ani kava huno maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo imima alige avemo aino nakupaeno emineno solovala anipiꞌmo asagauno aisigeno solovala aniꞌmo aino holakau holakau hisigeno alopa agemo aige avemoꞌa kanage huge nehisigetaeꞌmo koli osugune.
<range>
Gotiꞌa Ala kava neꞌmo aeno apakaseꞌniya vekamo maiꞌniya aote taonifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo mago aniꞌmo nelamisigeꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga aigae.
Gotiꞌa ani taonifiꞌmo maiꞌniyanageno ani taonimo afaꞌa hanegaiye. Gotiꞌa kotilamisiyapiꞌmo eno taonifiꞌmo maiꞌnisaya vayaꞌmo hapa maegaiye.
Alu nofi vayaꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌeꞌmo apayamukiki huꞌa kame huteꞌapaeꞌmo yagaiꞌa neꞌapataya vayaꞌe vayaꞌapiꞌeꞌmo alagi asagauꞌa aiꞌnae. Gotiꞌa alopa gefatiꞌmo ge nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo lokiyaꞌapimo alagi hano huꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa asole vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya vekamoꞌa lagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeno maiꞌniye. Yekopu Gotiꞌamoꞌmo uta fala kita neꞌmauna kotigana huno maiꞌniye.
Etapa Ala kava neꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌamo ageyo. Mopafiꞌmo alino ayu noꞌmo kino apateꞌniye.
Agaemo muki ma mopafiꞌmo kame nehaya kavaꞌmo alino hano huno neꞌatale. Agaemo ati keveꞌapimo alino lo aeno ataleteno alini uꞌa kame nehaya talalaꞌapimo alino atafiꞌmo nekae.
Gotiꞌa hunoꞌaeꞌmo, muki kavaꞌamo ataletapa afaꞌa maiꞌnetapaeꞌmo, Gotigamo maiꞌnane, hutapa nageyo, huno nehiye. Nagaemo muki alu nofi vayaꞌaitegatiꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌaitegatiꞌeꞌmo ala nagiꞌnimo aliguve. Muki ma mopafiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaitegatiꞌmo ala nagiꞌnimo aliguve, huno nehiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa asole vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya vekamoꞌa lagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeno maiꞌniye. Yekopu Gotiꞌamoꞌmo afaꞌa uta fala kita neꞌmauna kotigana huno maiꞌniye.











Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa ala agiꞌamo aliꞌniye. Lagaemo aote alino maleꞌniya aveleꞌmo haiteta Gotitimo taoniꞌafiꞌmo faleta haita agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga huta ategetao.
Ani avemo Saiyoni avemo kanale yatala avemo haneꞌniye. Muki ma mopafi maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo ani aveeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiye. Hoga haopalega haneꞌnigeno Ala kini vekamo taoniꞌamo ani aveleꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa ani taonifiꞌmo maiꞌneno taonifiꞌmo neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmo hapa neꞌmae.
Afiyo, huꞌna, kini vayaꞌmogimo Saiyoni taonifiꞌmo kame hisayafeꞌmo aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌneꞌa taoni haopaleꞌmo eꞌnae.
Apakaemo ageteꞌapaeꞌmo hapau aiꞌnae. Apakaemo koli huteꞌa malage huꞌa ataleꞌa uꞌnae.
Eꞌa apamoꞌya aiꞌa maiꞌnae. Aꞌnemogi mafaꞌnemo aliꞌa neꞌapataya afinaꞌmo apakafu nekiya kava huno apakafu kiꞌniye.
Kagaemo yegemo haine neꞌeya kotegatiꞌmo alopa yasimo aliyo, huka huꞌnanageno aliteno Tasisi vayaꞌai alopa sipiꞌapimo aeno atava aiꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa akeyaꞌvilagamo ani agufa kavaꞌmo huꞌniya ava gemo afiteta Gotitimoꞌmo taoniꞌafiꞌmo ageꞌnone. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa asole vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya vekamoꞌmo taoniꞌafiꞌmo lokiya kavaꞌamo huꞌnigeta ageꞌnone. Gotiꞌa taoniꞌamo alino lokiya vaino atesigeno muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa hanege hanege huno hanegaiye.
O Gotiyo, huta, Lagaemo mono nokafiꞌmo maiꞌnetaeꞌmo lagaefeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauge kahauge huno kahauꞌniya kavafeꞌmo lagesamo afiꞌnone.
O Gotiyo, huta, Ala kagikamo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo muki ma mopafi vayaꞌmogimo ala kagikamo nekamiye. Lamaga kayatetiꞌmo fatago kavaꞌmo nehane.
Kagaemo alagepa huka alika fako nehanaꞌmofeꞌmo Saiyoni aveleꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayanagi Yuta nofi vayaꞌai aꞌmafaꞌneꞌapigi huꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Saiyoni avefiꞌmo umenitata nehutapa taoni yafa lafi kegiꞌyaleꞌmo faita ku aiꞌnetapa kegiꞌyaleꞌmo haneꞌniya yatala nofeꞌmo lekana paiyo.
Lapakaemo afole aisaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo hapa paisayafeꞌmo taonileꞌmo lokiya yafa lafi kegiꞌyaeꞌmo lapakesamo afiyo. Lapakaemo taonifiꞌmo lokiya nofeꞌmo lapakesa afifi hutapa maiyo.
Ani Gotiꞌa muki afinaꞌmo Gotitimoꞌmo maige maige huno maigiye. Agaemo uno hogoteteno visuna kaꞌmo alino lave lite lave lite hume hume neꞌvisigeta faligune.

Muki vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, afiyo. Muki ma mopafi maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo mani gemo afiyo.
Ala apaki vayanagi apaki ohaneꞌnisiya vayanagi kagemi yatapiꞌe vayanagi kagemi yatapimo ohaneꞌniya vayanagi hutapa afiyo.
Nagaemo naipafiꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna nagesamo afiteꞌna agegauve. Navayafatiꞌmo alagepa gemo lapa paisugetapa afitetapaeꞌmo agegae.
Gotiꞌa aeno kalafefa gefatiꞌmo hisigeꞌna afisuvafeꞌmo maiꞌneꞌna afiguve. Nagaemo ani gemo alino fala ki maleꞌniya gemo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna lapa paiguve.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo faiꞌa ku aiꞌa nateꞌneꞌa namagigefeꞌmo nehisageꞌnaeꞌmo koli osuguve.
Apakaemo, kagemi yatimoꞌa laha maegaiye, huꞌa huge alopa kagemi yatimo aliꞌnone, huꞌa huge nehaya vayaꞌmogimo
konagaꞌapimo falisaya kavategatiꞌmo afaꞌa miya faiꞌa oꞌapategae. Konagaꞌapimogimo alagepa huꞌa afaꞌa maisayafeꞌmo Gotiꞌa miya amiteꞌa miya faiꞌa oꞌapategae.
Apakupi mafaꞌnemo miya faisaya monimo alopa monimo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmae. Apakaemo kelifiꞌmo lamiꞌa oꞌmaiꞌa muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa maige maige huꞌa maisayafeꞌmo afaꞌa miya faita apategaune, huꞌa hugayana haiꞌa metalegae.
<range>
Apakaemo ago apakeꞌnayana ageteꞌa afiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo ago nefaliya kava huꞌa muki vayaꞌmogi oꞌafiꞌnaya vayaꞌe negi vayaꞌeꞌmo faliꞌapaeꞌmo kagemi yaꞌapimo ataleꞌnageꞌapaeꞌmo alu vayaꞌmogi neꞌaliye.
Apakaemo apaipafiꞌmo, notimo muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa hanesigeno neꞌmauna kotimo afaꞌa hanege hanege huno hanegaiye, huꞌa apakesa neꞌafiye. Mopaꞌapileꞌmo apakiꞌapimo neꞌatayaꞌmonanafa
ala apaki vayaꞌmo afu anagaꞌmo afaꞌa oꞌmaiꞌa nefaliya agufa afugana huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Apakaemo negi nagi apakesamo neꞌafigeꞌapaeꞌmo mafaꞌneꞌapimogimo lama gegeꞌmo nehae, huꞌa huteꞌa apakame nehae.
Sipisipimo faliꞌnaya kava huꞌa nefaligeꞌa kanolufiꞌmo kiꞌa neꞌapatae. Sipisipileꞌmo yagaiꞌa neꞌapataya kava huno falisaya kavaꞌmoꞌa yagaino apategaiye. Lama ge vayaꞌmogimo kotilamisiyapiꞌmo yagaiꞌa apategae. Kanolufiꞌmo koꞌapimo haneꞌniyanageno alagepa apakufaꞌe konali yaꞌapiꞌeꞌmo kasaligiyamonanafa
Gotiꞌa kanolumo lokiyaꞌafatiꞌmo nagupi mafaꞌnemo miya faino nateteno navalegaiye.
Mago vekamoꞌa alopa kagemi yaꞌmo aliꞌnisigeꞌapaeꞌmo afamo anagaꞌamogi ala apakimo alisagetapaeꞌmo koli osiyo.
Falisiya afinaꞌmo kagemi yaꞌamo alinino oꞌugiye. Muki konali yaꞌamoꞌa agaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaelino olamigiye.
Afaꞌa maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo agaiꞌaeꞌmo alagepa huka maiꞌnananageka afaꞌa kamogaga aigane, huno nehiye. He, lapakaitapimo alagepa hutapa lapa maesageꞌapaeꞌmo vayaꞌmogimo ala lapakitapimo lapamigae.
Ani vekamoꞌa aginago vayaꞌmo maiꞌnaya kotegamo lamino hanipiꞌmo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo ha le yaꞌmo oꞌagegaiye.
Ala apakimo aliteꞌa alagepa huꞌa ageteꞌa oꞌafiꞌnisaya vayaꞌmo afumo nefaliya agufa afugana huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Gotiꞌa Ala kava neꞌmo lokiyaꞌage vekamoꞌa ge huꞌniye. Agaemo yegemo haine neꞌeya kotegamo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌe yegemo lamino nefaleya kotegamo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌefeꞌmo keya aeno ge huꞌniye. Muki ma mopafi vayaꞌaifeꞌmo keya aeno ge huꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa Saiyoni taonimo hogote konali taonifatiꞌmo aeno ha legaiye.
Gotitimoꞌa eminenoꞌaeꞌmo ge osuno afaꞌa oꞌmaigiye. Atamo lelino uno hogotetesigeno eminegaiye. Lusi yasimo alige ko aige hulino haopaꞌaleꞌmo egaiye.
Agaemo vayaꞌageꞌmo alino fako huno apatesiyafeꞌmo kokuꞌnapi vayaꞌe ma mopafi vayaꞌefeꞌmo ge hugiye.
Ina ge huno hapa paigiye. Lapakaemo utapa naote vayaꞌnimo nagaeteꞌmo apavaleta alita anupa hutapa apateyo. Sipisipimo amagiꞌa ofalinimo namiꞌnaya kavatetiꞌmo nagaeꞌeꞌmo kotalakemo hu maleꞌnaya vayaꞌnimo apavaleta alita anupa hutapa apateyo.
Kokuꞌnapiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogi, alagi fatago vekamo maiꞌniye. Agaiꞌageꞌmo alino fako huno apategaiye, huꞌa hugae.
O vayaꞌnimogitapae, huꞌna, afiyo. Nagaemo gemo hugesuve. O Isaleli vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Nagaemo agoti huꞌna lapategauve. Nagaiꞌnigeꞌmo alagi Gotiꞌnamo maiꞌnove. Gotitapimoꞌnamo maiꞌnove.
Lapakaemo muki afinaꞌmo naulagaleꞌmo afumo amagitapa ofalinimo namige atafiꞌmo kaege nehaya kavatapilefeꞌmo agoti huꞌna olapategauve.
Nagaemo notapifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya pulumakamo apavaleliꞌna oꞌuguve. Kegiꞌyafatiꞌmo memetapimo apavaleliꞌna oꞌuguve.
Haꞌao, muki yahaofilaga maiꞌnaya afumo nagaiꞌni afumo maige tauseniꞌa aveleꞌmo maiꞌnaya pulumakamo nagaiꞌni pulumakamo maige huꞌa maiꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmae.
Muki aveꞌalegamo maiꞌnaya nama anagaꞌe muki kotega maiꞌnaya afela afu anagaꞌeꞌmo nagaiꞌni yaꞌmo maiꞌnae.
Ma mopaꞌe muki ma mopafi vayaꞌe yaꞌeꞌmo nagaiꞌni yaꞌmo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo naga tesigeꞌnaeꞌmo lapa opaiguve.
Nagaemo pulumakamo ameꞌamo nesufiye. Mememo kolaꞌamo nesufiye.
Gotifekeꞌmo hao ke hesaya agufa ofalinimo alitapa amiyo. Lapakaemo ani kavaꞌmo hugune, hutapa ha paiꞌnaya gemo akame hutapa ani agufa ofalinimo alita hogote vekamo anaga vekamo amiyo.
Hanageke yaꞌmo alisaya afinaꞌmo nagaefekeꞌmo ge higeꞌnao alagepa huꞌna lapa maesugetapa ala nagiꞌnimo namigae.
Gotiꞌa ani gemo huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa hosu vayaꞌaifeꞌmo, Na kava higetapaeꞌmo avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa geꞌnimo aeta hakalo hutapa hapa paiꞌnae. Na kava higetapaeꞌmo kotalake geꞌnimo nehae.
Lapakaemo aliꞌna lapaya malesuvafeꞌmo alagi olapauꞌniye. Geꞌnimo alita lapakamelagamo yaga autapa neꞌatalae.
Lapakaemo kumaya neꞌaliya vayaꞌmo apaketetapaeꞌmo magoke lapaipa lapakesamo aliꞌnae. Kumai kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌai apafaluꞌapimogitapamo maiꞌnae.
Muki afinaꞌmo hosu gemo huge aigofe gemo huge hutapa maiꞌnae.
Itopaleꞌmo maiꞌnetapaeꞌmo konagatapimogifeꞌmo apakamelaga gemo nehae. Lapakaemo itatapimogi mafaꞌneꞌapieꞌmo hutapa faipa hutapa neꞌapatae.
Ani agufa kavaꞌmo huꞌnageꞌnaeꞌmo ge osuꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌnove. Lapakaemo nagaefeꞌmo, lagaekana huno maiꞌniye, hutapa lapakesamo afiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnae, huꞌna lapa paiguve. Nagaemo hosu kavatapimo lapaulagaleꞌmo aliꞌna kale kaeꞌna lapave liguve.
Gotifeꞌmo lapake kaniꞌnisiya vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, geꞌnieꞌmo lapakesa afifi hutapa maiyo. Fiku yanageꞌna lapaeꞌna katali katalu hisugeꞌapaeꞌmo lapa maesaya vayaꞌmo oꞌmaigae.
Nagaefeꞌmo, alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌniye, huꞌa nehaya vayaꞌmogimo ala nagiꞌnimo neꞌnamiye. Nehaya kavaꞌapilefeꞌmo apakesa afifi huꞌa maiꞌnisaya vayaꞌmo Gotiꞌa apakufamo alino katino neꞌapateya kavaꞌamo aliꞌna apave liguve.


O Gotiyo, huꞌna, kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌnigeka hapa neꞌmana kava huka kahau huka nato. Lusi kava huka kahau huka neꞌapatana kava huka gekamo amagiꞌna neꞌatalova kavaꞌnimo aeka kalo paeka atalo.
Muki hosu kavaꞌnimo alagi aeka kalo paeka atalo. Hosu kavaꞌnimo alika ataleteka alika alagepa huka nato.
Nagaemo ma hosu kava huꞌnove, ina hosu kava huꞌnove, huꞌna aeꞌna hakalo nehuve. Nagaemo hosu kavaꞌnimo ageꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo ani hosu kavaꞌnimoꞌmo naulagaleꞌmo afole neꞌaigeꞌna neꞌagove.
Kagae kaulagaleꞌmo hosu kavakeꞌmo huꞌna maiꞌnove. Nagaemo hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo kagaemo fatago kavaꞌmo huka agotimo huka nateꞌnane. Kagaemo nagaefeꞌmo fatago gemo hukaeꞌmo, hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnane, huka huꞌnane.
Vae, huꞌna, itaꞌnimoꞌmo nagae aipaguꞌeꞌmo aepa faiꞌniya afinaꞌmo hosu kavapiꞌmo maiꞌnove. Itaꞌnimo aipafiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo hosu mafaꞌnemo maiꞌnove.
Vae, huꞌna, lama ge kavaꞌmo naipafiꞌmo hanesiyafeꞌmo kahauꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ageꞌna aeto hisuvafeꞌmo naipafiꞌmo alika naya malegane.
Aika fuli fuli huka faleka nategeꞌnao yaveyave vekamo maino. Sese huka nategeꞌnao yaveyave yafakana huꞌna yaveyaveꞌageꞌmo huꞌna magoꞌe huꞌna yaveyave vekamo maino.
Falu fala gemo huka naha paigeꞌnao namogaga aino. Nagupi mafaꞌnemo aeka lata paiꞌnanaꞌmonanafa halate namogaga aiguve.
Hosu kavaꞌnimo oꞌageka aika afe leka maiyo. Muki hosu kavaꞌnimo aeka kalo paeka atalo.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, yaveyave naipamo alo huka nateteka gekamo afisuvafeꞌmo nauneꞌnameꞌmo alika hegafa huka ato.
Kagaetegatiꞌmo alika naha faika oꞌnataleka kaote Kaunekamekamo nagaepatiꞌmo oꞌaliyo.
Hogoteka nagufamo ago alika katika nateꞌnanageꞌnaeꞌmo namogaga aiꞌnovanagi halate namogaga aisuva kavaꞌmo alika namiyo. Hatu maeno natesiya Kaunekametetiꞌmo natafauka maiyo.
Ani kava hisanageꞌnaeꞌmo gekamo amagiꞌa neꞌatalaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo ina kavaꞌmo huvo, huka nehana gekamo aliꞌna apaya malesugeꞌapaeꞌmo aiꞌa afe leꞌa kagaetegamo egae.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, nagaemo mago vekamo kamiti amagiꞌnove. Ani hosu kavaꞌnimo alika atalo. Alika atalesanageꞌnaeꞌmo, nagufamo ago alino katino nateꞌniye, huꞌna huteꞌna yokemo huguve.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, navayamo alika aka huka nategeꞌnao kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna kateno.
Nagaemo ofalinimo kamisuvafeꞌmo kahauꞌniyesinana kamuvesine. Nagaemo afumo amagiꞌna atafiꞌmo kaeꞌna kamisuvana amuse osugane.
Afu ofalinimo kamisuvafeꞌmo okahauꞌnifa naipamo aino atalagausiyafekeꞌmo kahauꞌniye. O Gotiyo, huꞌna, apaipamo aliꞌa afepi ateteꞌa apaipamo aliꞌa afe nelaya kavafeꞌmo kahauꞌniye.
Saiyoni kotega vayaꞌaifeꞌmo kagesamo afiteka hapa mao. Yulusalemu taonifi yafa lafi kegiꞌyamo halate hisayafeꞌmo hapa mao.
Ani kava hisanageꞌapaeꞌmo alagepa ofalinimo atafi nekaya ofalinimo kamisageka amuse huka apategane. Ani afinaꞌmo ve pulumakamo amagiꞌa hiꞌyalamuteꞌmo atafiꞌmo kaeꞌa kamigae.












Negi nagi vayaꞌmogimo apaipafiꞌmo, Gotiꞌa oꞌmaiꞌniye, huꞌa nehae. Afumo nefaligenoꞌaeꞌmo apakufamo nekasaliya kava huꞌa hosu vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Gotiꞌa avenatuꞌnaꞌmo heno neꞌapateya kavaꞌmo nehae. Magoke vekamoꞌa alagepa kavaꞌmo nehiya vekamo alagi oꞌmaiꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa kokuꞌnapatiꞌmo apakenoꞌaeꞌmo, Mago ageteꞌa afiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo maiꞌnafi mago vayaꞌmogi kahauya huꞌa nagesayafeꞌmo nehafi huno apakeꞌniye.
Apakeꞌniyaꞌmonanafa mukiꞌamogimo alagepa kaꞌmo ago ataleꞌa magoke aiyaya huꞌa hosu vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Alagepa kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo alagiꞌato oꞌmaiꞌnae. Magokeꞌatomo alagi oꞌmaiꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa hunoꞌaeꞌmo, oꞌafiꞌneꞌa hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo negi nagi vayaꞌmo maiꞌnafi. Neꞌyaꞌmo aliꞌa neꞌnaya kava huꞌa vayaꞌnimo apamagiꞌa hano huꞌa apataleteꞌa Gotifeꞌmo nunumu nosae, huno huꞌniye.
Hemenimo aiseꞌamo koli nehayaꞌmonanafa henagaꞌamo lusi kava huꞌa koli hugae. Gotiꞌa hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo apamagisigeꞌa falisagenoꞌaeꞌmo lokiyaꞌapimo aino atagu faegaiye. Gotiꞌa akameꞌya apamiꞌniyanageꞌa alagi asagauꞌa aigae.
Nahauꞌniyanageno mago vekamoꞌa Saiyoni kotegatiꞌmo eno Isaleli vayaꞌmo hapa maesigeꞌa aeꞌa apakasegae. Gotiꞌa hapa maesigeꞌapaeꞌmo Isaleli vayaꞌmo halate alagepa huꞌa maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa apamogaga aigae.








































































































O Gotiyo, huꞌna, Alopa gefatiꞌmo ge nehuvanagi afiyo. Nunumu nehuva geꞌnieꞌmo kagesa afifi huka maiyo.
Ma mopamo atupalegatiꞌmo kagaefeꞌmo ge huguve. Lusi kana yaꞌmo alisugeno aino nati kaesiya afinaꞌmo navalelika haika yafateꞌmo faika nato. Nagaemo afepiꞌmo maiꞌnovanagi navalelika haika anaga haneꞌniya yafateꞌmo faika nato.
Kagaemo fala kiꞌna maiꞌnova nokana huka maiꞌnekaeꞌmo alagepa huka yagaika nateꞌnane. Kagaemo yatala noꞌmo lokiya nokana huka maiꞌnanageꞌnaeꞌmo kame vayaꞌnimo apataleꞌna haiꞌna alagepa huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Nagaemo alagepa seli nokafiꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo maige maige huꞌna maiguve. Naha maegane, huteꞌna uꞌna kahakufiꞌmo fala kiguve.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, ma kava huguve, huꞌna kaha paiꞌnova geꞌnimo ago afiꞌnane. Mafaꞌneꞌapimogimo afoꞌapimogi kagemi yaꞌapimo neꞌaliya kava huꞌa kagikaeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌmogimo alagepa yakamo aligae. Ani kava huka alika namisanageꞌna aliguve.
Kagaemo kini vekamo ha maesanageno asole kafugamo maigiye. Agaemo mafaꞌneꞌamogi mafaꞌneꞌapimo apakegaiye.
Agaemo Goti aulagaleꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo alagepa huno maige maige huno maigiye. Kahau huka atesana kavaꞌe agaetefeꞌmo lama geꞌeꞌmo alo huvo. Kahau huka ateteka alagepa huꞌna yagaiꞌna kategauve, huka huꞌnana lama gekaletiꞌmo yagaika ategane.
Naha maesanageꞌna muki afinaꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna katege katege huꞌna maiguve. Huguve, huꞌna kaha paiꞌnova geꞌniletiꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo akame hisuvafeꞌmo muki afinaꞌae afinaꞌaeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna kategauve.

Nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌa ge osuno Gotifekeꞌmo agava maiꞌniye. Agaiꞌageꞌmo nagufamo alino katino nategaiye.
Agaiꞌageꞌmo yafaꞌnimo maiꞌneno nagufamo alino katino neꞌnateya Gotiꞌnimoꞌmo maiꞌniye. Naha maesigeꞌna afaꞌa maiguve.
Lapakaemo na magi afinaꞌmo kame hutapa nategae. Lapakaemo aino aega huꞌniya yafa kegiꞌyagana hutapa maige uti uti neꞌaiya kegiꞌyagana hutapa maige huꞌnayanagetapa asagautapa aitetapa faligae.
Apakaemo aliꞌa afepiꞌmo yaga auꞌa atalesayafeꞌmo vege nehae. Aigofe gemo hisayafeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiye. Apakaemo apavayaꞌaletikeꞌmo Gotiꞌa ha maeno, huꞌa nehayaꞌmonanafa apaipafiꞌmo Gotiꞌa amagino, huꞌa apakesamo neꞌafiye.
Nagaemo Gotiꞌa naha maegaiye, huꞌna nagesamo afiꞌna fatago nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo nagupi mafaꞌneyo, huꞌna, ge osuka Gotifekeꞌmo agava maiyo.
Agaiꞌageꞌmo yafaꞌnimo maiꞌneno nagufamo alino katino neꞌnateya Gotiꞌnimoꞌmo maiꞌniye. Naha maesigeꞌna afaꞌa maiguve.
Gotiꞌa nagufamo alino katino nateteno nagiꞌnileꞌmo alino asaga huno nategaiye. Gotiꞌa lokiya yafaꞌnimo maiꞌniye. Nagaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo afole neꞌaigeꞌnaeꞌmo agaepiꞌmo alagepa huꞌna fala kiꞌna neꞌmauve.
Vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, muki afinaꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo lapakesamo afitapa fatago hutetapaeꞌmo, laha maegaiye, hutapa hiyo. Lapaipafatiꞌmo aniꞌmo alitapa lakigekana hutapa nunumu hutapa ha paiyo. Lagaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo afole neꞌaigetaeꞌmo Gotipiꞌmo alagepa huta fala kita neꞌmaune.
Apaki oꞌaliꞌnisaya vayaꞌmo afa vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Apaki aliꞌnisaya vayaꞌmo aigofe vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Sigelileꞌmo asaisunagenoꞌaeꞌmo kanaꞌapimo ohanegaiye.
Lapakaemo agoti hutapa apatege kumaya alige hisayafeꞌmo lapakesamo oꞌafiyo lapa oꞌmaegayanagi. Monitapimo magoꞌe huno afole aisigetapaeꞌmo, laha maegaiye, hutapa lapakesamo oꞌafiyo.
Gotiꞌa magoke afinaꞌmo ge huꞌniye. Nagaemo lole afinaꞌmo afiꞌnovana Goti lokiyaꞌamo haneꞌniye, huꞌna ago afiꞌnove.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, vayakaeꞌmo kahau huka neꞌapatane, huꞌna ago afiꞌnove. Kagaemo kavaꞌapilefeꞌmo apamete apamete huka alika fako huka neꞌapamine.

O Gotiyo, huꞌna, Gotiꞌnimogamo maiꞌnane. Kagesuvafeꞌmo kotilamisiyapiꞌmo kahauya huguve. Nauneꞌnameꞌmoꞌa kagaefeꞌmo nehaiye. Aniꞌmo ohaneꞌniya koteꞌmo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo vayaꞌmogimo anifeꞌmo nehapaiya kava huno kagaefeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.
Hogoteꞌna kaote mono nokafiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌna lokiyakaꞌe ha le konali yakaꞌeꞌmo ageꞌnova kava huꞌna hemeniꞌeꞌmo agesuvafeꞌmo huve.
Ofaliꞌna afaꞌa neꞌmauva kavaꞌmo kanale kavaꞌmo haneꞌniyaꞌmonanafa oꞌnataleka kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌnigeka naha neꞌmana kavaꞌmo aeno agaseꞌniya kavaꞌmo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna kategauve.
Muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo kahao ke hege hege huꞌna maiguve. Nayaꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huliꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo kagaefekeꞌmo nunumu huguve.
Afumo afayaꞌaꞌe atuꞌaꞌeꞌmo neꞌa apamu nehaya kava huno nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌa neno amu hugiye. Nagaemo namogaga aiteꞌna navayafatiꞌmo yokemo huꞌna kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna kategauve.
Hipaꞌnileꞌmo havaegefeꞌmo nehuꞌnaeꞌmo kagaefekeꞌmo nagesamo afiteꞌna muki haniꞌilagaꞌamo kagaefekeꞌmo nagesa afifi nehuve.
Naha maeꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo kahakufiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo namogaga aiguve.
Nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌa magokepi lokaeno maisiyafeꞌmo kakame nehigeka nayapiꞌmo natafauka alika lokiya vaika neꞌnatane.
Nehanaꞌmonanafa kahauya huꞌa nageꞌa nahaegefeꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo mopamo afepilaga faliꞌnaya vayaꞌmo lamiꞌa neꞌmaiya kotegamo lamigae.
Kame vayaꞌapimogi hapaesageꞌa afela kalamogi apakufaꞌamo negae.
Negayaꞌmonanafa kini vekamoꞌa Gotifeꞌmo amogaga aigiye. Agiꞌalefeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo ha le konali yaꞌapimo aligayaꞌmonanafa aigofe gemo nehaya vayaꞌai apavayaleꞌmo alino akanigiye.














































Gotiꞌa fiku laha maeno lamiteno alino maku huno lageno.
Ani kava hisanageꞌapaeꞌmo muki ma mopafi vayaꞌmogimo kaꞌmo agesagekaeꞌmo apakufamo alika katika apategane.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, muki alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo. Muki alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo.
Kagaemo fatago kavaꞌmo huka alika fako huka apateteka muki alu nofi vayaꞌaiteꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌaiteꞌeꞌmo yagaika neꞌapatanaꞌmofeꞌmo apamogaga aiteꞌa yoke hiyo.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo. Muki alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo.
Ma mopafatiꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo ago afole aiꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌa Gotitimoꞌmo laha maeno lamiꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa laha maeno lamiꞌniyanagi muki ma mopafi vayaꞌmogimo agaefekeꞌmo koli huteꞌa mono hiyo.





































O Gotiyo, huꞌna, aniꞌmoꞌa lugoꞌnifiꞌmo haineꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
Naiyamo aeꞌna maisuva yaꞌmo ohaneꞌnigeꞌna hapafikeꞌmo aeꞌna lapaneꞌnove. Aniꞌmo heteno aeno nati kaeꞌniye.
Keya aeꞌna ge huge huge huꞌna maiꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo lusi kava huno alagaꞌmo nahaeꞌniye. Lugoꞌnileꞌmo hau huꞌnigeꞌna Gotiꞌnimofeꞌmo agava maiꞌnogeno naulagafatiꞌmo nagafu nekiye.
Nayokaꞌmo lusi asole yaꞌmo haneꞌniya kava huꞌa kame vayaꞌnimo magoꞌe huꞌa maiꞌnae. Apakaetegamo mago agufa hosu kavaꞌmo osuꞌnovaꞌmonanafa fiku apaini huꞌa neꞌnatae. Afaꞌa fiku nahaesayafeꞌmo huꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo lokiya vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Mago yaꞌapimo kumaya oꞌaliꞌnovaꞌmonanafa anonaꞌnilefeꞌmo afaꞌa amiguve.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, negi kavaꞌmo huꞌna kavaꞌnimo ago ageꞌnane. Hosu kavaꞌnimo kaulagaleꞌmo fala okiꞌnigeka ago ageꞌnane.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna asole ami vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaika neꞌapatana Ala kava nene, huꞌna, fiku yanageꞌna hosu kavaꞌmo hisuvana kagaefeꞌmo kagava neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogimo apavagage hugiye. O Isaleli vayaꞌmogita Gotitimogae, huꞌna, fiku yanageꞌna hosu kavaꞌmo hisuvana kagaemo kagesayafeꞌmo kahauya nehaya vayaꞌmogimo hosu apakiꞌapimo aligae.
Kagaetefeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa nateꞌnageno navagage huꞌniye.
Naganaꞌnimogimo oꞌapakeꞌnaya vayaꞌaitegamo nehaya agufa kavaꞌmo nagaetegamo nehae. Itaꞌnimo mafaꞌne anagaꞌamogimo alu kotega vayaꞌaifeꞌmo apakesamo noꞌafiya kava huꞌa nagaefeꞌmo apakesamo noꞌafiye.
Kagaemo nokamo alagepa huno hanesiyafeꞌmo nayamukiki nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo noꞌnagae. Huꞌa faipa huꞌa nekataya gemoꞌmo nagaeteꞌmo asagauno aiꞌniye.
Aviꞌya huge nagufamo aliꞌna afepi atesuvafeꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo mo sige huꞌna maiꞌnogeꞌapaeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa nateꞌnae.
Hosu kogu kukenamo aliꞌna vaiꞌnogeꞌapaeꞌmo muki vayaꞌmogi kigi yokalo gemo huꞌa nateꞌnae.
Kateꞌmo aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogi huꞌa faipa huꞌa neꞌnatae. Alopa aniꞌmo neteꞌa negi nagi gemo nehaya vayaꞌmogi nagaefeꞌmo yoke nehae.
Nehayaꞌmonanafa nagaemo kagaefekeꞌmo nunumu nehuve. O Ala kava nene, O Gotiyo, huꞌna, kahauꞌnisiya afinaꞌmo kahau huka nateteka geꞌnimo afaꞌa afitekaeꞌmo lama gekaletiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
Hapafiꞌmo aeꞌna olapanesuvafeꞌmo hapafatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato. Apaini huꞌa neꞌnataya vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo hapa faleka nato. Aniꞌmo neheya yapatiꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
Aniꞌmo neheya aniꞌmoꞌa aeno nati kaesifi alopa anipiꞌmo aeꞌna lapanesufi yatala kelifiꞌmo avayamo aino akanino natesifi hisigeꞌna maisuvafeꞌmo oꞌnato.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahau kayamopafiꞌmo nekahaiya kavakamo alagepa kavaꞌmo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo geꞌnimo afiyo. Magoꞌe huka kahau huka neꞌapatana kavakalefeꞌmo nagaetegamo aika afe leka eno.
Hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnamo kaugosafiꞌmo okagesuvafeꞌmo aika ati okao. Malage huka geꞌnimo afiyo.
Nahaopaleꞌmo eka miya faika hatu maeka nato. Kame vayaꞌnimogi apayapatiꞌmo hatu maeka nato.
Ago apakeꞌnanageꞌapaeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa natege navagage yaꞌmo aliꞌa namige nagiꞌnileꞌmo aliꞌa afepi atege nehageka apakeꞌnane. Kame vayaꞌnimo kaulagaleꞌmo maiꞌnae.
Huꞌa faipa huꞌa nateꞌnageꞌna lusi kana yaꞌmo aliꞌnogeno kanamo nahauꞌniye. Hau huno natesiya vekamo agesuvafeꞌmo kahauya huꞌnovaꞌmonanafa magoke vekamo alagi oꞌmaiꞌniye. Mago vayaꞌmogi naipamo aliꞌa lokiya vaiꞌa natesageꞌna naipamoꞌmo falu hisiyafeꞌmo nagesamo afiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa alagi oꞌmaiꞌnae.
Nesuvafeꞌmo atu neheya fipikana agufa yaꞌmo aliꞌa namiꞌnae. Anifeꞌmo nahauꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo atu neheya aniꞌmo aliꞌa namiꞌnae.
Hapa oꞌmaegenoꞌao hosu kavaꞌapimo anonaꞌapilefeꞌmo magokepiꞌmo alopa neꞌyaꞌmo neꞌnesagenoꞌaeꞌmo apaneꞌmu aegekana huno aeno. Alagepa huꞌa neꞌmaiya kavaꞌapimoꞌa aneꞌaifiꞌmo hegekana huno haneno.
Magoꞌe huꞌa oꞌagesayafeꞌmo apaulagafatiꞌmo haniꞌageꞌmo hino. Lusi kana yaꞌmo alika apamigeꞌapao aliteꞌa muki afinaꞌmo ape hulitata huꞌa maiyo.
Kaipamo neleya kavakamo apakaeteꞌmo aniꞌmo lakigekana huka alika apamiyo. Kaipamo leka apateꞌneka apatafauvo.
Koꞌapimo no atufaꞌageꞌmo hanegaiye. Fiku yanageꞌa mago alu vayaꞌmogi seli noꞌapifiꞌmo maigae.
Na kava nehayaꞌmofeꞌmae. Apakaemo amagiꞌnana vekaeꞌmo apaini huꞌa neꞌatae. Apakaemo hapaeꞌnana vayaꞌaifeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa apateteꞌa kana yaꞌmo aliꞌa neꞌapamiye.
Alu hosu kava alu hosu kavaꞌapilefeꞌmo agoti huka apato. Apakaemo fatago kavakamo oꞌalisageka naulagaleꞌmo fatago vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae, huka hapa opaiyo.
Maige maige huꞌa maisaya vayaꞌai apakiꞌapimo haneꞌniya mukufatiꞌmo apakiꞌapimo aeka kalo paeka atalo. Fatago vayaꞌai apakiꞌapimo haneꞌniya mukufiꞌmo apakiꞌapimo avoꞌmo kaeka oꞌmalo.
Huꞌa maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa nagaemo muki yaꞌnimo ohaneꞌniya vekamo maiꞌneꞌna kana yaꞌmo aliꞌnove. O Gotiyo, huꞌna, nagufamo alika katika nateteka alika asaga huka nato.
Nagaemo yoke huꞌna Gotiꞌmo ala agiꞌamo amiguve. Hao ke heꞌnaeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna ategauve.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa ani hisuva kavafeꞌmo lusi kava huno amuse hugiye. Pulumakamo heꞌna amisugenoꞌaeꞌmo amuse osugiye.
Ala vayaꞌmo maiꞌnone, huꞌa apakesamo noꞌafiya vayaꞌmogi ani kavaꞌmo ageteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga aigae. Lapakaemo Gotiꞌmo agesayafeꞌmo kahauya nehaya vayaꞌmogitapamo lapaipamo alagepa huno hanesigetapa maige maige hutapa maigae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa muki yaꞌapimo ohaneꞌniya vayaꞌai geꞌapimo neꞌafiye. Agaemo agaiꞌa vayaꞌamo kalavusifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogifeꞌmo afa vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae, huno agesamo noꞌafifa apakaefeꞌmo alagepa huno agesamo neꞌafiye.
Kokuꞌnaꞌmoꞌagi ma mopamoꞌagi solovala aniꞌmoꞌagi muki noyamemogimogi solovala anipiꞌmo maiꞌnaya yaꞌmogimogi huꞌa ala agiꞌamo amiyo.
Na agufa kavatefeꞌmo ala agiꞌamo amigae. Gotiꞌa Saiyoni kotega vayaꞌamogi apakufamo aliꞌa katiꞌa apategae. Apakaemo Yuta kotega taoniꞌafi taoniꞌafiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa ani hetamaꞌapimo alisayafeꞌmo Gotiꞌa taoniꞌaꞌe taoniꞌaꞌeꞌmo kigiye.
Aliꞌyakamo neꞌaliya vayaꞌai apakinago vayaꞌmogi ani mopamo alisageꞌa Gotifeꞌmo hapauꞌnisiya vayaꞌmogimo ani mopaleꞌmo maige maige huꞌa alagi maigae.






























O Gotiyo, huꞌna, kagaemo kini vekamo alagepa aipa agesamo alika amiꞌnegenoꞌao vayakaleꞌmo alagepa huno yagaino apateno. Fatago kavakamo alika kini vekamo mafaꞌneꞌamo amiꞌnegenoꞌao kagemi yaꞌapimo oꞌmaleꞌnisaya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo alagepa huno yagaino apateno.
<range>
Fatago kavaꞌaletiꞌmo yagaino apateꞌninageꞌa aise aveleꞌe alopa aveleꞌeꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maisageno hoyaꞌapifatiꞌmo alagepa neꞌyaꞌmo afole aigiye.
Kini vekamoꞌa kagemi yaꞌapimo oꞌmaleꞌnisaya vayaꞌmo hapa maege kafu nehaya vayaꞌmo hapa maege huteno apakaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo apamagiteno alino afepi apategaiye.
Yegemo lege kaimo lege nehisigeꞌapaeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo kagaefekeꞌmo mono hugae.
Ko neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo hoyaꞌe mopaꞌeꞌmo alagepa huno nehaneya agufa kavaꞌmo huno hapa maesigeꞌa alagepa huꞌa maigae.
Maige maige huno maiꞌnisigeꞌapaeꞌmo fatago vayaꞌmo magoꞌe huꞌa alagepa huꞌa maigae. Muki afinaꞌmo kaimo nelegeꞌapaeꞌmo alagepa huꞌa magokepi lokaeꞌa maigae.
Solovala aniꞌmo aluga aluga atupaleꞌmo yagaino apategaiye. Alopa aniꞌmo nelamiya aniteꞌe mugagaya faligaꞌeꞌmo muki vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino apategaiye.
Kaꞌme kotega maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo agaeteꞌmo ape huꞌa maisageꞌapaeꞌmo kame vayaꞌamogimo agaefeꞌmo atete huteꞌa apagoꞌya faigae.
Sipeni koteꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogiꞌe muki solovala agiꞌnaleꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo muki yaꞌmo fiku alini eꞌa amigae. Alepiya koteꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogiꞌe Itiyopiya koteꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo ofalinimo fiku amigae.
Muki kini vayaꞌamogimo agaeteꞌmo ape huꞌa maisageꞌapaeꞌmo muki alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌmogimo geꞌamo afiteꞌa akame hugae.
Kagemi yaꞌapimo oꞌmaleꞌnisaya vayaꞌmogimo agaefeꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge nehisagenoꞌaeꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apategaiye. Kafu nehaya vayaꞌmo hapa maege hapa noꞌmaeya vayaꞌmo hapa maege huno hapa maegaiye.
Agaemo lokiyaꞌapimo nohaneya vayaꞌe kafu nehaya vayaꞌefeꞌmo hau huno apategaiye. Kafu nehaya vayaꞌai apakufamo alino katino apategaiye.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo humi apatege apakufamo aliꞌa afepi apatege huteꞌa neꞌapamagigenoꞌaeꞌmo miya faino hatu maeno apategaiye. Apakaemo kolaꞌapimo hisiyafeꞌmo ohauꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo, kolaꞌapieꞌmo hogote yaꞌmo haneꞌniye, huno agesamo neꞌafiye.
Agaemo ofalino afaꞌa maigiye. Alepiya kotegatiꞌmo monimo aliniꞌeꞌa amigae. Muki afinaꞌmo nunumu huꞌa ategae. Muki afinaꞌae afinaꞌaeꞌmo ala agiꞌamo amigae.
Avina yaꞌmo apayapiꞌmo neꞌaliya agufa yakana huno ma mopafiꞌmo mago anaga aveleꞌmo hakalegaiye. Hagetenoꞌaeꞌmo asole neꞌyaꞌmo aesigenoꞌaeꞌmo Lemani avefatiꞌmo alopa yosamoꞌmo uti uti neꞌaiya agufa kavaꞌmo hugiye. Asole kahaumo alagepa huno nelagiya kava huꞌa taonifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa asole vayaꞌmo afole aigae.
Yegemo haneꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo agiꞌamo hanege hanege huno haneꞌnisigeꞌa agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huge huge huꞌa maigae. Gotiꞌa agaetetiꞌmo muki vayaꞌmo hapa maegaiye. Muki alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa ategae.
Agaiꞌageꞌmo hapau neꞌaiya agufa alagepa kavaꞌmo nehiyaꞌmofeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo Isaleli vayaꞌai Gotiꞌapimo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa ateyo.
Ha le konali agiꞌaleꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo. Ala agiꞌamoꞌmo muki ma mopafiꞌmo aino atagu faeno uneno hisigeꞌa muki vayaꞌmogimo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo. He, lama ge, lama ge.
Neviniꞌmo Yesi mafaꞌneꞌamoꞌmo muki alu ge alu gemo huno nunumu huge huge huno maiꞌniya nunumu geꞌamo alagi huno hano huꞌniye.
Ina gemo alagi lama gemo huꞌnae. Gotiꞌa Isaleli vayaꞌmo yaveyave apaipa vayaꞌalegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo huno hapa neꞌmae. Yaveyave apaipa vayaꞌalegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo nehiye.
Alagepa kavaꞌmo nehiyaꞌmonanafa nagaemo alagi ago hogoꞌamo asagauꞌna aisuva agufa kavaꞌmo huꞌnove. Alagi hogoꞌamo lole nagesamo afiteꞌna aeꞌna halu vale lamiꞌna asagauꞌna aisuva agufa kavaꞌmo huꞌnove.
Apakovana himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogi alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnageꞌna apaketeꞌnaeꞌmo maiꞌnaya agufa kavaꞌmo huꞌna maiguve, huꞌna huteꞌnaeꞌmo nahaꞌye huꞌniye.
Faligefeꞌmo nehagenoꞌaeꞌmo apakufamoꞌmo lokiya vaiteno apakafu nokiye.
Muki vayaꞌmogimo hanageke yaꞌmo neꞌaliyaꞌmonanafa noꞌaliye. Muki vayaꞌmogimo hosu yaꞌmo neꞌaliyaꞌmonanafa noꞌaliye.
Himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo nehaya kavaꞌapimoꞌa ha le konali yaꞌapigana huno haneꞌniye. Kame nehaya kavaꞌapimoꞌa kukenaꞌapigana huno haneꞌniye.
Apafayaꞌe vayaꞌmo maiꞌnageno apakufamo ko nesiye. Hosu kavaꞌapimoꞌa apaipafiꞌmo havai teteno aino vali nelamiye.
Huꞌa faipa huꞌa apatege apaini huꞌa apatege nehae. Himuꞌnamu gemo huteꞌapaeꞌmo alita afepi lapategaune, huꞌa nehae.
Kokuꞌnapi maiꞌniya Gotifeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa neꞌatae. Hosu geꞌapimoꞌmo aino atagu faeno uneno huꞌniye.
Ani kavaꞌmo nehayaꞌmofeꞌmo Goti vayaꞌamogimo aiꞌa atagineꞌa manileꞌmo neꞌae. Apakaemo kapufiꞌmo aniꞌmo havai teꞌnigeꞌa aliꞌa neꞌnae.
Apakaemo, Haiya kava huno Gotiꞌa afigiye, huꞌa nehae. Anaga vekamo aeno apakaseꞌniya vekamoꞌmo lageꞌnifiye, huꞌa nehae.
Apako, huꞌna, ani vayaꞌmogi Gotifeꞌmo mono nosaya vayaꞌmogimo muki afinaꞌmo maiꞌa falu huꞌa maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo magoꞌe magoꞌe huꞌa kagemi yaꞌmo afaꞌa neꞌaliye.
