Nagaemo naipafatiꞌmo hosu kavaꞌnimo aeꞌna kalo paeteꞌna nayaꞌmo sese huꞌnovaꞌmonanafa aliꞌyaꞌnimo afole noꞌaiye.
Netepiꞌmo kaita nahautenoꞌaeꞌmo nahaulinuno unetiꞌniye. Muki neteꞌae neteꞌaeꞌmo kayoꞌmo neꞌnamine.
Nagaemo, ani kavafeꞌmo ava gemo huꞌna hapa paiguve, huꞌna huꞌnovesinana mafaꞌnekalegamo hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnogeꞌa asagauꞌa aiꞌnaesine.
Ani kavaꞌmo aepaꞌamo agesuvafeꞌmo lusi kava huno alagaꞌmo nahaeꞌniye.
Alagaꞌmo nahaeꞌnigeꞌna oꞌageꞌna maime maime neꞌeꞌna Gotitegamo neꞌuꞌnaeꞌmo hano hisiya afinaꞌmo ageꞌnove.
Alagi lama gemo nehuve. Kagaemo alika halu neꞌvaleya katekeꞌmo apateꞌnane. Kagaemo alika yaga auka neꞌapatalanageꞌapaeꞌmo alagi uꞌa lamiꞌa hano nehae.
Lusi hosu yaꞌmo alika neꞌapaminageꞌapaeꞌmo malage huꞌa uꞌa lamiꞌa hano nehae. Lusi kava huꞌa apamoꞌya neꞌaiya kavaꞌmoꞌa atafi kaegekana huꞌa aliꞌa hano huꞌa neꞌapatalae.
Haniꞌilagamo alagamuna ageteꞌapaeꞌmo apaupatiꞌmo he netigenoꞌaeꞌmo ani alagamunamo ago apake nekaniya kava huꞌa malage huꞌa hano hugae. Ala kava nene, huꞌna, ani kavaꞌmo huka kaupatiꞌmo he tika apauneꞌageꞌmo apaketekaeꞌmo alagi okahaugiye.
Naipamoꞌmo kana huꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo naipafatiꞌmo atu nahaeꞌniye.
Negi nagi kavaꞌmo huteꞌna oꞌagege oꞌafige huteꞌna kaulagaleꞌmo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo afela afugana huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Ani kavakeꞌmo huꞌna maiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa nagaemo muki afinaꞌmo kagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌna maiꞌnogeka nayapiꞌmo natafauka maiꞌnane.
Hemenimo kagaemo gekaletiꞌmo alika ho huka nateteka henagaꞌamo ha le konali koteꞌmo navalelika haigane.
Kokuꞌnapiꞌmo mago naha maesiya vekamo oꞌmaiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa kagaekeꞌmo maiꞌnane. Ma mopafi vekaeꞌmo nahaꞌye nehiya vekamo mago oꞌmaiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa kagaekeꞌmo maiꞌnane.
Nagufaꞌe naipa nagesaꞌeꞌmo hano hugiyaꞌmonanafa naipamo alika lokiya vaika nateteka muki afinaꞌmo hetamaꞌnimo kagaekeꞌmo maiꞌnane.
Kahaopaleꞌmo eꞌa oꞌmaiꞌa afagiꞌaleꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo alagi lageso hugae. Kagaemo kataleꞌa neꞌvaya vayaꞌmo alika apagoꞌya laga nehanaꞌmonanafa
kahaopaleꞌmo uꞌna maisuva kavaꞌmo kanale kavane. Nagaemo muki nehana kavafeꞌmo ava gemo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paisuvafeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo Gotiꞌnimoꞌa alagepa huno naha maegaiye, huꞌna huteꞌna maiꞌnove.




































































Vayaꞌnimogitapae, huꞌna, aliꞌna lapaya malegefeꞌmo huvanagi geꞌnimo afiyo. Gemo lapa paigefeꞌmo huvanagi mani gemo alagepa hutapa afiyo.
Akeyaꞌvilaga kavafeꞌmo aeꞌna kalafefa gemo huꞌna aepaꞌaeꞌmo lapa paiguve.
Laginago vayaꞌmogi laha paiꞌnageta afiꞌnona gemo halate lapa paiguve.
Lagaemo aeta ati okaeta Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa lokiya kavaꞌaꞌe hapau aiꞌnaya kavaꞌaꞌefeꞌmo ava gemo huta mafaꞌnetieꞌmo hapa paiteta henagaꞌamo afole aisaya mafaꞌnetieꞌmo hapa paigune.
Agaemo Isaleli vayaꞌaifeꞌmo keꞌaepa geꞌamo hapa paiꞌniya agufa gemo huno Yekopu aginago vayaꞌaifeꞌmo ma kava hiyo, huno hapa paiꞌniye. Laginago vayaꞌaifeꞌmo, keꞌaepa geꞌnimo mafaꞌnetapimo alita apaya malegeꞌapao aliꞌa apatesaya mafaꞌneꞌapimogi afiteꞌapaeꞌmo mafaꞌneꞌapieꞌmo halate hapa paiyo, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
<range>
Afiteꞌapaeꞌmo Gotifeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago huteꞌa Gotiꞌa huꞌniya kavafeꞌmo apake okaniꞌa keꞌaepa geꞌamo akame hugae.
Apakinago vayaꞌmogimo himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa geꞌamo oꞌafiꞌa Gotifeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago osuꞌa ataleꞌa uꞌnae. Fiku yanageꞌa apakaeꞌeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huꞌa maigae.
Ifalemi nofi vayaꞌmogimo atiꞌapimo aliteꞌa uꞌnayaꞌmonanafa kame osuꞌa ataleꞌa aiꞌa atagi neꞌa eꞌnae.
Apakaemo Goti kotalake geꞌamo akame osuꞌa keꞌaepa geꞌamo ago amagiꞌa ataleꞌnae.
Huꞌniya aune kavafeꞌmo ago apake kaniꞌniye.
Agaemo afoꞌapimogi apaulagaleꞌmo Isipi kotega Sovani koteꞌmo aune kavaꞌmo huꞌniye.
Solovala aniꞌmoꞌa folagapatiꞌmo aino akaka vaelino ani anagamo haino hanete ani afelagamo lamino hanete huꞌnigeꞌa folagapatiꞌmo uꞌnae.
Agaemo felugamo hiyaꞌmo uno hogoteno apavalelino uꞌniya kava huno haniꞌilagaꞌeꞌmo ata vaiꞌmo leno halelino uno hogoteno apavalelino uꞌniye.
Agaemo kaꞌme koteꞌmo aniꞌmo ohaneꞌniya koteꞌmo yafaꞌmo amagino apalo atiꞌnigeno afepatiꞌmo alopa aniꞌmo haineno asagauno aiꞌnigeꞌa neꞌnae.
Yafapatiꞌmo alopa aniꞌmo emineꞌnigeꞌa nege nege huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa kaꞌme kotegamo hogote vekamo anaga vekalegamo magoꞌe magoꞌe huꞌa hosu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa geꞌamo ago amagiꞌa ataleꞌnae.
Gotifeꞌmo, lahauꞌniya neꞌyaꞌmo alika lamiyo, huꞌa amalageka huꞌnae.
Apakaemo Gotifeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa ateteꞌapaeꞌmo, Gotiꞌa kaꞌme koteꞌmo alopa neꞌyaꞌmo afaꞌa lamigifiye, huꞌa huꞌnae.
Agaemo yafaꞌmo amagiꞌnigeno alopa aniꞌmo eminetenoꞌaeꞌmo ani aniꞌmo afaꞌa heꞌniye. Ani kavaꞌmo huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa neꞌyaꞌe afumo ameꞌaꞌeꞌmo afaꞌa lamigifiye, huꞌa huꞌnae.
Huꞌa huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa afitenoꞌaeꞌmo lusi kava huno aipamo leno apateꞌniye. Yekopu vayaꞌmo atamoꞌmo emineno leno apasaga liꞌniye. Lagufamo alino katino lategaiye, huꞌa apakesa afiꞌa fatago osuꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo aipamo leno apateꞌniye.
<range>
Apakesa afiꞌa fatago osuꞌnayaꞌmonanafa kokuꞌnafeꞌmo aika akaka vao, huno huꞌnigeno aino akaka vaeꞌnigeno koꞌmo aigekana huno mago neꞌyaꞌmo agiꞌamo mana neꞌyaꞌmo asagauno aiꞌnigeꞌa aliꞌa neꞌnae.
<range>
Gotiꞌa enisole vayaꞌmogi neꞌyaꞌmo ma mopafi vayaꞌmo alino apamiꞌnigeꞌa ago aliꞌa neꞌa apamu huꞌnae.
Agaemo, yasimo aliyo, huno huꞌnigeno yegemo haine neꞌeya kotegatiꞌmo yasimo aliꞌniye. Himamuꞌaletiꞌmo yasimo aliyo, huno huꞌnigeno aluga aluga haopalegatiꞌmo yasimo aliꞌniye.
Yasimoꞌmo nama anagaꞌmo mumusopakana huno lekana opaisaya agufa nama anagaꞌmo apavalelino eꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa ani kahaepagana huꞌa asagauꞌa aiꞌnae.
Maiꞌnaya folagapiꞌmo asagauꞌa aige muki seli noteꞌmo asagauꞌa aige huꞌa asagauꞌa aiꞌnae.
Agaemo hapauꞌniya neꞌyaꞌmo alino apamiꞌnigeꞌa aliꞌa neꞌa apamu huꞌnae.
Neꞌyaꞌmo afaꞌa alino lamigifiye, huꞌa huteꞌa amalageka huteꞌa apakesamo afiꞌa fatago osuꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo apamiꞌniya neꞌyaꞌmo neꞌa oꞌnakaiꞌa apavayafiꞌmo haniliꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌa aipamo leno apateteno Isaleli vayapatiꞌmo hogote lokiya vayaꞌageꞌmo ago apamagiꞌnigeꞌa faliꞌnae.
<range>
Ani kavaꞌmo huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa agaetegamo magoꞌe magoꞌe huꞌageꞌmo hosu kavakeꞌmo huꞌa maiꞌnae. Aune kavaꞌmo huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa apakesa afiꞌa fatago osuꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo afa aliꞌya aliteꞌa koli hume hume uꞌa faliꞌnae.
<range>
Apamagiꞌnigeꞌa faliꞌnageꞌapaeꞌmo mago vayaꞌamogimo apaipamo aliꞌa afe leꞌa Gotiꞌmo agesayafeꞌmo lokiya vaiꞌa kahauya huꞌnae.
Apakaemo, Gotiꞌa yagaino nelateya vekamo maiꞌniye. Lokiya vekamoꞌa laha neꞌmaeya vekamo maiꞌniye, huꞌa halate apakesamo afiꞌnae.
Kanale vekamo maiꞌniye, huꞌa huꞌnayana apaipafatiꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa osuꞌnafa apavayaꞌaletikeꞌmo aigofe gemo huꞌnae.
Agaetefeꞌmo apaipamo kanale osigeꞌa kotalake geꞌamo ago amagiꞌa ataleꞌnae.
Ani kavaꞌmo huꞌnayaꞌmonanafa hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniya vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo muki vayaꞌamo kamiti oꞌapamagiꞌnifa hosu kavaꞌapigeꞌmo alino ataleꞌniye. Muki afinaꞌmo aipamo lege lege huno maiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa ataleteno aipamo leno apateꞌniya kavaꞌaꞌeꞌmo ataleꞌniye.
Agaemo, Vayatafaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Apava musa neꞌaiya yaꞌmo malage huno hano nehiya kava huꞌa neꞌmaiye, huno agesa afiꞌniye.
Muki afinaꞌmo kaꞌme kotegamo maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo geꞌamo ago amagiꞌa ataleꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo aipamoꞌmo kana huꞌniye.
Apakaemo muki afinaꞌmo Gotiꞌmo amalageka huge Isaleli vayaꞌai aote Gotiꞌapimo kaꞌamo akani malege huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Apakaemo himamuꞌaletiꞌmo huꞌniya kavaꞌaeꞌmo ago apake kanige kame vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apateꞌniya kavaꞌaeꞌmo ago apake kanige huꞌnigeꞌa apakesamo oꞌafiꞌnae.
Hogoteno himamuꞌaletiꞌmo aune kavaꞌmo Isipi kotegamo mago Sovani koteꞌmo huꞌniya kavafeꞌmo apakesamo oꞌafiꞌnae.
Agaemo alopa aniꞌe aise aniꞌeꞌmo alino kola aniꞌmo hamaleno ateꞌnigeꞌa Isipi vayaꞌmogimo oꞌneꞌnae.
Agaemo asole kosiꞌmo alino apateꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa hapaege esoꞌmo alino apateꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa muki mopaꞌapileꞌmo haneꞌniya yaꞌmo aliꞌa hosu huꞌa atege huꞌnae.
Agaemo mago kafamo alino apateꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa hoyaꞌapifiꞌmo haneꞌniya neꞌyaꞌmo nege akenuꞌmo alino apateꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa hoyaꞌapifiꞌmo hakale maleꞌnaya neꞌyaꞌmo nege huꞌnae.
Agaemo ko mopa koꞌmo alino ataleꞌnigeno emineno alagamo neꞌaeya nofiꞌapimo amagino falu atiꞌniye. Agaemo haniꞌilagamo ko mopagana huno lao yaꞌmo alino ataleꞌnigeno emineꞌnigeno alagamo neꞌaeya yosa hoyaꞌapimo falu teꞌniye.
Agaemo ko mopa koꞌmo alino ataleꞌnigeno emineno pulumakaꞌapimo apamagiꞌnigeꞌa faliꞌnae.
Gotiꞌa aipamo leno apatege hai vaino apatege huteno hanageke yaꞌmo alino apamiꞌnigeno apakafu kiꞌniye. Ani kava huꞌa enisole vayaꞌmogimo apamagiꞌnageꞌa faliꞌnae.
Aipamo leno apatetenoꞌaeꞌmo afaꞌa apakeno oꞌapataleꞌnifa apamagiꞌnigeno kaita hapauꞌnigeꞌa ago faliꞌnae.
Agaemo Isipi kotega vayaꞌai muki yege mafaꞌneꞌapimo kamiti apamagiꞌnigeꞌa ago faliꞌnae.
Apamagiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa sipisipimo apavaleliꞌa neꞌvaya kava huno vayaꞌamo kaꞌme kotegamo apavalelino uꞌniye.
Alagepa huno yagaino apateꞌnigeꞌa koli osuꞌa afaꞌa uꞌnayaꞌmonanafa solovala aniꞌmoꞌa kame vayaꞌapimo ago aeno apati kaeꞌniye.
Apavalelino uno aote mopaleꞌmo himamuꞌaletiꞌmo aliꞌniya aveleꞌmo apateꞌniye.
Agaemo alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌmo ago alino hapa faitaleno mopaꞌapimo hapafaleno hakino apamiteno seli noꞌapifiꞌmo alino apateꞌniye.
Ani kavaꞌmo huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa hogote anaga vekamo Gotiꞌa amalageka huteꞌa himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa ma kavaꞌmo hiyo, huno huꞌniya gemo ago amagiꞌa ataleꞌnae.
Afoꞌapimogi himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa ataleꞌnaya kava huꞌa maiꞌneꞌa kayagiꞌniya kevemo hetalageno kahaufilagamo neꞌviya kava huꞌa ataleꞌa hosu kateꞌmo uꞌnae.
Apakaemo aveꞌale aveꞌaleꞌmo aigofe gotiꞌapimogifeꞌmo mono huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo aipamo leno apateꞌniye. Aigofe gotiꞌapimo auneꞌamo alo hu maleꞌneꞌa mono huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo hosu aipamo kaliꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa apaketenoꞌaeꞌmo aipamo leno apateteno agaiꞌa vayaꞌamo akameꞌya apamiꞌniye.
Agaemo Sailo kotega seli mono nopiꞌmo neꞌmaiya nopatiꞌmo ataleno uꞌniye.
Agaiꞌa vayaꞌamo hapa oꞌmaeno kame vayaꞌapimo alino apateꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa kame huꞌa aeꞌa apakaseteꞌa kotalake gemo hu maleꞌniya kesimo kumaya aliniꞌa uꞌnae. Ani kesimo apakaeꞌeꞌmo ohaneꞌniya kava huno himamuꞌaꞌe ha le konali yaꞌaꞌeꞌmo apakaeꞌeꞌmo ohaneꞌniye.
Agaemo agaiꞌa vayaꞌaifeꞌmo aipamo leno apateteno kame vayaꞌapimo alino apateꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa naipeletiꞌmo apaiꞌnae.
Kame huteꞌapaeꞌmo neya vayaꞌapimo kamiti apaiꞌnageꞌa faliꞌnageꞌapaeꞌmo aꞌmafaꞌneꞌapimo veleꞌmo oꞌmaiꞌa afaꞌa maiꞌnae.
Kame vayaꞌapimogimo mono huꞌa neꞌapataya vayaꞌapimo kamiti apaiꞌnageꞌapaeꞌmo aꞌneꞌapimogimo yulagefa oꞌaige aviꞌya huꞌa oꞌapatege huꞌnae.
Ani kavaꞌmo huꞌa maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo apaupatiꞌmo he netiya kava huno Ala kava neꞌmo he tiꞌniye. Lokiya vekamoꞌa nofi alagafati aniꞌmo netenoꞌaeꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo ge nehiya kava huno Ala kava neꞌmo malage huno he tiꞌniye.
Malage huno kame vayaꞌamo alino hapa faino apataleꞌnigeno apavagage huꞌnigeꞌa uꞌa maiꞌnae.
Agaemo vayaꞌaleꞌmo yagaiꞌa apatesayafeꞌmo Yosefe aginago vayapatiꞌmo lekana paino oꞌapateno apataleno uno Ifalemi nofi vayapatiꞌmo lekana paino oꞌapateno apataleno uno Yuta nofi vayapatikeꞌmo lekana paino apateteno Saiyoni aveeꞌmo hauꞌniya avemo lekana paino ateꞌniye.
<range>
Agaemo ani aveleꞌmo mono noꞌamo avegana huno ki maleꞌniye. Ma mopamo lokiya vaino haneꞌniya kava huno noꞌamo lokiya noꞌmo ki maleꞌniye.
Agaemo Yuta nofi vayapatiꞌmo Neviniꞌmo lekana paino ateteno sipisipileꞌmo yagaino maiꞌniya kotegatiꞌmo avalelino uno Isaleli vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino apatesiya kini vekamo ateꞌniye.
<range>
Ateꞌnigeno Neviniꞌa aliꞌyaꞌalefekeꞌmo agesamo afiteno alagepa huno yagaino apateꞌniye.














































































Ala kava nene, huꞌna, muki vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaika neꞌapatana vekae. Nagaemo maiꞌnanatega mono nokaeꞌmo lusi kava huno neꞌnahaiye.
Nokafiꞌmo maisuva yafeꞌmo lusi kava huno naipamoꞌmo nehaiye. Muki nagufamoꞌe naipa nagesafatiꞌeꞌmo afaꞌa neꞌmaiya Gotifekeꞌmo nehaiye.
Aise nama anagaꞌmogi apanoꞌmo kiteꞌa maiꞌnageꞌapaeꞌmo kisaveꞌyavemogi apanoꞌmo haneꞌnigeꞌa apamuꞌmo maleteꞌa aiꞌa apalo atiteꞌa neꞌyagaiye. Nokafiꞌmo neꞌmaiyaꞌmonanafa muki vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaika neꞌapatana vekae, huꞌna, kini vekaꞌnimo Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, nokafiꞌmo oꞌmaiꞌneꞌna ofalinimo kamisuva hiꞌyalamukaleꞌmo ofalinimo nehaya hiꞌyalamukaleꞌe hiꞌyalamukaleꞌefeꞌmo nagesamo neꞌafuve.
Nokafiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa yokemo huꞌa kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga nehaya vayaꞌmogi kaulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Lokiyaꞌapimo kagaetegatiꞌmo aliꞌnisaya vayaꞌmogimo kaulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa apamogaga aigae. Kagaetegamo visaya apaipamo nekaliye.
Kaꞌmo umenitata nehuꞌapaeꞌmo aniꞌmo leno laneꞌniya kalokalopafiꞌmo apaunumo uno nelamigeꞌa umenitata nehuꞌapaeꞌmo kelimo kafi maleꞌnageno koꞌmo aiteno aniꞌmo maleno havai teꞌnigeꞌa neꞌnae.
Lokiya vaime vaime uꞌa magoꞌe huꞌa lokiya vaiꞌa uꞌa aigofe gotiꞌapimogimo aeno apakaseꞌniya Gotitegamo Saiyoni kotegamo agegae.
Muki vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaika neꞌapatana vekae, huꞌna, nunumu nehuvanagi geꞌnimo afiyo. Yekopu Gotiꞌamogae, huꞌna, afiyo.
O Gotiyo, halegutimogae, huꞌna, ago. Lekana paika ateꞌnana vekamo augosafiꞌmo ago.
Mago alagepa haopalegamo uꞌna yatala afinaꞌmo maisuvana namogaga aiguvaꞌmonanafa nokafiꞌmo aise afinaꞌmo maisuvana magoꞌe huꞌna namogaga aiguve. Nagaemo Gotiꞌnimo noꞌafiꞌmo afa ina agufa vekamo kipateꞌmo neꞌyagauva vekamo maisuvafeꞌmo nahauꞌniyaꞌmonanafa hosu vayaꞌai noꞌapifiꞌmo haiꞌna maisuvafeꞌmo oꞌnahauꞌniye.
Ala kava netimoꞌa yegetiꞌe halegutiꞌeꞌmo maiꞌniye. Agaemo ala apakiꞌapimo apamiteno alagepa yaꞌmo fiku hapa maeno apamigiye. Agaemo api kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo magoke alagepa yaꞌmo magokeꞌageꞌmo aliꞌna lapamiguve huno osugifa muki alagepa yaꞌamo afaꞌa alino apamigiye.
Muki vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaika neꞌapatana vekae, huꞌna, Kagaefekeꞌmo, laha maegaiye, huꞌa apakesamo neꞌafiya vayaꞌmogi kaulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogagamo aigae.

Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagaemo mopakaleꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo alagepa huka hapa maeꞌnane. Kagaemo Yekopu nofi vayaꞌmo hatu maeka apateteka apavalelika eka apakaiꞌapi mopaleꞌmo apateꞌnane.
Kagaemo vayakamogi hosu kavaꞌapimo alika ataletekaeꞌmo, afaꞌa ateyo, huka huꞌnane. Muki hosu kavaꞌapimo aeka ati kaeka ataleꞌnane.
Hogoteka kaipamo leka apateꞌnanaꞌmonanafa henagaꞌamo kaipamo falu huka apateꞌnane. Lusi kava huno kaipamo leꞌniyana afaꞌa ataleꞌnane.
O, Gotiyo, huꞌna, lagufamo alika katika nelatana vekamae. Halate alika alagepa huka lateteka alika aika atagi neka lavalelika eno. Kaipamo falu huka lato.
Muki afinaꞌmo kaipamo leka latesapiye. Hemenimo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaifenagi henagaꞌamo afole aiꞌa maisaya vayaꞌaifenagi huka kaipamo leka apateka hano osuka leka apateme apateme ugapiye.
Faligekana huta maiꞌnonagi halate alika he tika olategapiye. Vayakamogimo kagaefekeꞌmo apamogaga aisayafeꞌmae.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahau huka lato. Lagufamo alika katika lato.
Nagaemo Ala kava neꞌmo Gotiꞌa hisiya gemo afiguve. Agaemo agaiꞌa vayaꞌmo apaote vayaꞌaifeꞌmo alino nanu aeno apatesiya geeꞌmo hunoꞌaeꞌmo, lapaipamoꞌmo falu hino, huno hapa paigiye. Hapa paigiyaꞌmonanafa fiku kavanageꞌa aiꞌa atagineꞌa eꞌa halate negi kavaꞌmo hugae.
Ha le konali yaꞌamoꞌmo lagae mopaleꞌmo hanege hanege huno hanesiyafeꞌmo agaefeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌmo hapaopaleꞌmo eno apakufamo alino katino apategaiye.
Hau huno apatesiya kavaꞌaꞌe lama geꞌaꞌeꞌmo eꞌana fotu huꞌnaꞌae. Fatago kavaꞌaꞌe alino nanu aeno apatesiya kavaꞌaꞌeꞌmo eꞌana hanaeꞌana neꞌnaꞌae.
Lama ge kavaꞌmoꞌa ma mopafatiꞌmo hagegekana huno afole aisigeno fatago kavaꞌmoꞌa kokuꞌnapatiꞌmo he tino aeno kamafaino apakegaiye.
He, Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa yaꞌmo alino lamisigeno lagae mopafatiꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo hagegaiye.
Fatago kavaꞌmo hogoteno neꞌvisigenoꞌaeꞌmo agaemo egaiye. Fatago kavaꞌamo aiyakamo alisunafeꞌmo kaꞌmo valino lategaiye.

















Gotiꞌa taoniꞌamo aoteꞌmo hu maleꞌniya aveleꞌale aveleꞌaleꞌmo faino ateꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa Yekopu aginago vayaꞌamogimo noꞌapifi noꞌapifiꞌmo apaote apaote huꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniyaꞌmonanafa Saiyoni mono no yafa lafi kegiyafiꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo magoꞌe huno hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa agaiꞌa taonifatiꞌmo ha le konali yaꞌamo mago vayaꞌmo alino apave liꞌnigeꞌa ageteꞌapaeꞌmo ava gemo nehae.
Nagaemo, Isipi kotega maiꞌnaya vayaꞌe Mamiloni kotega maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo nageꞌa aeto huꞌnae, huꞌna huguve. Afiyo, Filisitiya vayanagi Taiya vayanagi Itiyopiya vayanagi huno Gotiꞌa taoniꞌafiꞌmo apavaleno apatesigeꞌa vayaꞌamo maigae.
Apakaemo, ani vayaꞌe ani vayaꞌeꞌmo Gotiꞌa taoniꞌafiꞌmo apavaleno apateꞌniye, huꞌa hugae. Anaga hogote vekamoꞌmo agaiꞌamo ani taonimo alino lokiya vaino atesigeno afaꞌa hanege hanege huno hanegaiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaiꞌa taonifiꞌmo apavaleno apateꞌniya vayaꞌai apakiꞌapimo mukufiꞌmo avoꞌmo kae malegaiye.
Yokemo huꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo, muki yaꞌamo aepa vekamo maiꞌnanagetaeꞌmo kagaetegatikeꞌmo muki yaꞌamo neꞌalune, huꞌa yokemo nehae.




















O, Ala kava nene, huꞌna, nagaemo kahau huka neꞌapatana kavaꞌaleꞌe kavaꞌaleꞌefeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo yokegeꞌmo huge huge huꞌna maiguve. Kagaemo gekamo alagi akame nehana kavakaeꞌmo hemenimo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌe aliꞌa apateme apateme visaya vayaꞌefeꞌmo navayafatiꞌmo hapa paiguve.
Nagaemo, kagaemo noꞌmo kigekana huka muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa hanesiyafeꞌmo kahau huka apatege apatege huka maigane, huꞌna hapa paiꞌnove. Kagaemo gekamo alagi akame nehana kavakamoꞌmo kokuꞌnapiꞌmo noꞌmo faika ategekana huka maleꞌnane.
Gotiꞌa, Nagaemo mago vekamo lekana paiꞌna ateteꞌna agaeꞌeꞌmo kotalake geꞌnimo magokepiꞌmo hu maleꞌnove. Aliꞌyaꞌnimo neꞌaliya vekamo Nevinifeꞌmo,
kagae nofi vayaꞌmogi muki afinaꞌmo lokiya vaiꞌa maigae. Kini vekamo maiꞌneka yagaika neꞌapatana kava huꞌa kini vayaꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa yagaiꞌa apatete apatete hume hume uꞌa maigae, huꞌna ha paiꞌnove.
O, Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kokuꞌnapiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogi nehana kavakamo ageteꞌapaeꞌmo hapau aiteꞌa ala kagikamo kamigae. Apaote vayaꞌmo aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo gekamo akame nehana kavakalefeꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌageꞌmo nehiye, huꞌa hugae.
Kokuꞌnapiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayapatiꞌmo ina laꞌmo Ala kava nekana huno maiꞌniye. Lokiya vayapatiꞌmo mago vekamoꞌa Ala kava nekana huno oꞌmaiꞌniye.
Apaote vayaꞌmo aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌnayategamo Gotifekeꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa koli huꞌnae. Gotiꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogi agaefeꞌmo koli huꞌnae.
O Gotiyo, muki vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaika neꞌapatana Gotigae, huꞌna, Lokiyakaꞌe vekamo maiꞌnanageno ina laꞌmo kagaekana huno maiꞌniye. Gekamo alagi akame nehana kavakamoꞌmo faino ku aino nekate.
Solovala aniꞌmoꞌa aino holakau holakau nehigekaeꞌmo yagaika neꞌatane. Solovala aniꞌmoꞌa aepa faino aino holakau hugefe nehigekaeꞌmo afaꞌa hano huka nehanagenoꞌaeꞌmo afaꞌa nehane.
Kagaemo Isipi kotega maiꞌnaya vayaꞌai himamuꞌapimo ago alika hano huka ataleꞌnane. Lokiya kayatetiꞌmo kame vayakamo apamagiꞌnanageꞌa atagu faeꞌa uꞌeꞌa huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Kokuꞌnaꞌe ma mopaꞌeꞌmo kagaika yaꞌmo haneꞌniye. Ma mopaꞌe muki ma mopafiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌe yaꞌeꞌmo alo huꞌnane.
Aluga aluga haopalegaꞌeꞌmo alo huꞌnane. Alopa avemo Tamo aveꞌmoꞌe Hemoni avemo alopa avemoꞌeꞌmo kagikalefeꞌmo anamogaga neꞌaiꞌae.
Himamukaletiꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌmo neꞌaline. Kayaꞌmo lokiya kayaꞌmo haneꞌniye. Lamaga kayatetiꞌmo aeka apakaseꞌnane.
Kini vekamo maiꞌneka fatago kavaꞌmo huka alagepa huka alika fako huka apateteka yagaika neꞌapatane. Kahau huka apatege lama geꞌageꞌmo huge huka maiꞌnane.
Afiteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiya gemo afiꞌa aeto huꞌnaya vayaꞌmo Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae. Kaugosafatiꞌmo aeno ha neleya yategamo umenitata hugae.
Apakaemo kagikalefeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiye. Apakaemo fatago kavakaletiꞌmo ala apakiꞌapimo neꞌaliye.
Ha le konali himamuꞌapimo kagaetegatiꞌmo aliꞌnae. Kagaemo fiku laha maeka lamiꞌnanageta aeta apakaseꞌnone.
Ala kava neꞌmo halegutigana huno maiꞌniye. Isaleliꞌa aote vekamo kini vekatimo maiꞌniye.
Aote vekakamoꞌa alagamuna agegekana huno ageꞌnigekaeꞌmo ina ge huka ha paiꞌnane. Nagaemo himamuꞌaꞌe vekamo lokiya vaiꞌna ateꞌnove. Nagaemo mago vekamo vayapatiꞌmo lekana paiꞌna ateteꞌna aliꞌna asaga huꞌna ateꞌnove.
Nagaemo aliꞌyaꞌnimo alisiya vekamo Neviniꞌmo kahauya huꞌna ageteꞌnaeꞌmo aote uveliletiꞌmo faleꞌna ateꞌnove.
Muki afinaꞌmo himamuꞌnimo agaeteꞌmo maleteꞌnaeꞌmo lokiya vaiꞌna ategauve.
Kame vekaꞌamoꞌmo anonaꞌalefeꞌmo asole yaꞌmo oꞌalisigeno hosu vekamoꞌa kana yaꞌmo alino oꞌamigiye.
Nagaemo kame vayaꞌamo apamagisugeꞌa aulagaleꞌmo asagauꞌa aigae. Nagaemo apaini huꞌa neꞌataya vayaꞌmo kaitaꞌmo apamiguve.
Apamiguvaꞌmonanafa agaefeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huguve, huꞌna ha paiꞌnova geꞌnimo alagi akame huꞌna nahau huꞌna ategauve. Nagiꞌnilefeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna ategauve.
Nagaemo alopa mopaleꞌmo yagaisiyafeꞌmo lokiya vaiꞌna ateꞌnisugeno mago ayaꞌmo solovala aniteꞌmo maleteno mago ayaꞌmo anilafateꞌmo malegaiye.
Agaemo alopa gefatiꞌmo nagaefeꞌmo keya aeno ge hunoꞌaeꞌmo, Kagaemo afoꞌnimogamo maiꞌnane. Gotiꞌnimogae, huno, nagufamo alika katika natesana yafaꞌnimo maiꞌnane, huno naha paigiye.
Yege mafaꞌneꞌnimo maiꞌniye, huꞌna hu malegauve. Agaemo muki ma mopafiꞌmo maiꞌnaya kini vayaꞌmo ago aeno apakaseno hogote kini vekamo maigiye.
Nagaemo muki afinaꞌmo nahau huꞌna atege atege huꞌna maiguve. Agaeꞌeꞌmo kotalake geꞌnimo hu maleꞌnova geꞌnimoꞌa afaꞌa hanege hanege huno hanegaiye.
Agae nofi vayaꞌamo afaꞌa maige maige huꞌa maigae. Kokuꞌnaꞌmoꞌa hanege hanege huno hanesiya kava huno muki afinaꞌmo kini vekamo maiꞌneno yagaino apategaiye.
Mafaꞌneꞌamogimo keꞌaepa geꞌnimo ataleꞌa aliꞌna fako hu maleꞌnova geꞌnimo akame osuge
avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya geꞌnimo amagiꞌa atalege hiyo, huꞌna hapa paiꞌnova gemo akame osuge huꞌa maiꞌnisayaꞌmoꞌmo
nagaemo hosu kavaꞌapilefeꞌmo kayoꞌmo apamiteꞌna kayotetiꞌmo apamagisugeno apamuꞌmo apalegaiye.
Kayoꞌmo apamiguvaꞌmonanafa alagi aliꞌna hafaiꞌna oꞌataleꞌna agaefeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌnisigeꞌna ha maegauve, huꞌna huꞌnova geꞌnimo amagiꞌna oꞌataleꞌna alagi akame huguve.
Kotalake geꞌnimo amagiꞌna oꞌataleꞌna navayafatiꞌmo hu maleꞌnova geꞌnileꞌmo alu gemo halate osuguve.
Nagaemo magoke afinaꞌmo naote kavaꞌnilefeꞌmo huꞌnaeꞌmo, Nevinifeꞌmo aigofe gemo alagi osuguve, huꞌna nagoꞌyamo ago ataleteꞌna ha paiꞌnove.
Agae nofi vayaꞌamo alagi hano osuꞌa afaꞌa maige maige huꞌa maigae. Yegemoꞌmo naulagaleꞌmo lege lege huno neꞌmaiya kava huno muki afinaꞌmo kini vekamo maiꞌneno yagaino apategaiye.
Kaimoꞌmo hanege hanege huno nehaneya kava huno fai maiꞌneno yagaino neꞌapateya sialeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo fai maiꞌneno yagaino apategaiye. Kokuꞌnapatiꞌmo kaimoꞌmo, Gotiꞌa maiꞌniye, huno lama gemo nehiye, huno nehiya kaigana huno maiꞌneno yagaino apategaiye.
Kagaemo ani gemo huꞌnanaꞌmonanafa kagaemo ago alika yaga auka ataleteka kakameꞌyamo amiꞌnane. Kagaemo uvelimo faleka ateꞌnana vekaeꞌmo kaipamo leka ateꞌnane.
Kagaemo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaliya vekaꞌeꞌmo kotalake gemo hu maleꞌnana gemo ago alika hano huka ataleꞌnane.
Kagaemo kegiꞌyaꞌamo ago aeka halagape vaiꞌnane. Halagape oꞌvaisaya agufa lokiya nokoꞌmo heka halagape vaiꞌnane.
Muki u eꞌa nehaya vayaꞌmogimo kagemi yaꞌamo kumayaꞌmo neꞌaliye. Haopaleꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo huꞌa faipa huꞌa neꞌatae.
Kagaemo kame vayaꞌamo hapa maeꞌnanageꞌa kame huꞌa aeꞌa agaseꞌnae. Hapa maeꞌnanageꞌa apamogaga aiꞌnae.
Kagaemo ati vayaꞌamo lokiya vaika oꞌapateꞌnanageꞌa kame huꞌa aeꞌa oꞌapakaseꞌnae. Kagaemo afaꞌa ataleꞌnanageno kame vayaꞌaꞌeꞌmo kame huno aeno oꞌapakaseꞌniye.
Kagaemo ha le konali yaꞌamo alika hano huka ataleꞌnane. Yagaino apatesiya himamuꞌamo ago alika hano huka ataleꞌnane.
Kagaemo ataleꞌnanageno malage huno ago kosuna leꞌniye. Lokiyaꞌamo ohaneꞌnigeno avagage kavaꞌamoꞌmo aeno ati kaeꞌniye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, na magi afinaꞌmo fala kika maigane. Muki afinaꞌmo fala kika maigapiye. Atagana huno kaipamo lesifiye.
Maisuva afinaꞌmo aise afinaꞌmo haneꞌniyaꞌmofemo kage okanika kagesamo afiyo. Fiku maisayafeꞌmo muki vayaꞌmo alo huka apateꞌnapiye.
Haiya vekamoꞌa ofalino afaꞌa maige maige huno maigiye. Kanolufiꞌmo oꞌmaino faino kasalo paegaifiye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Hogoteka Nevinifeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌnigeka alagepa huka ha maeꞌnane. Na kava higeka hemenimo ani kavaꞌmo nosane. Kagaemo Nevinifeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huguve, huka huteka kagoꞌyamo ataleꞌnane.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, aliꞌyakamo neꞌaliya vayakaeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa neꞌapataya kavafeꞌmo kage okanika kagesamo afiyo. Muki asole vayaꞌmogimo huꞌa faipa huꞌa nelatageꞌnaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo lusi kava huno kana nehiye.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kame vayakamogi huꞌa faipa huꞌa lateꞌnae. Apakaemo uvelimo faleka ateꞌnana vekamoꞌa nehiya kavafeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa ateꞌnae.
Ala kava neꞌmo alagepa huno maino. He, Lama ge. Lama ge.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, lagaemo afole aige afole aige huta neꞌmaunagekaeꞌmo kagaemo muki afinaꞌmo notigana huka maiꞌnane.
Akeyaꞌvilaga aveꞌe ma mopaꞌeꞌmo alo osuꞌnana afinaꞌmo hogoteka maiꞌnananageka maige maige huka alagi maigane.
Kagaemo vayaꞌaifeꞌmo, halate mopamo alita hamaleyo, huka huteka nefaligekaeꞌmo mopamo alika hamaleka neꞌapatane.
Vani tauseniꞌa kafugamo magoke afinakana huno haneꞌniye, huka kagesamo afiꞌnane. Egamo malage huno hano huꞌniya kava huno vani tauseniꞌa kafugamo malage huno hano nehiye. Magoke haniꞌilagamo malage huno hano huꞌniya kava huno kaulagaleꞌmo vani tauseniꞌa kafugamo malage huno hano nehiye.
Aniꞌmo heteno alinino neꞌviya kava huka lavalelika uka nelatanageta nefalune. Alagamunamo ageꞌnageno malage huno apake nekaniya kava huta malage huta nefalune. Kahaumoꞌmo netepiꞌmo lagiteno ause hetenoꞌaeꞌmo uneꞌamo ago falu neteya kava huta maiꞌneta nefalune.
<range>
Kaipamo leka latetekaeꞌmo nelamagine. Kayamukiki nehanagetaeꞌmo atete nehune.
Hosu kavatimo afole yateꞌmo haneꞌnigeka neꞌagane. Huta fala kita neꞌatalona hosu kavatimo kaulagalekeꞌmo haneꞌnigeka alika neꞌmalane.
Kaipamo leꞌnigeka ge nehukaeꞌmo ma mopafiꞌmo maisuna afinatimo alika hogo huka nelatane. Kaiteneꞌmo huꞌa hapa nepaigenoꞌaeꞌmo malage huno apake nekaniya kava huta malage huta nefalune.
Lagaemo 70ꞌa kafugamo maige lokiya vayaꞌmo 80ꞌa kafugamo maige huta neꞌmaunaꞌmonanafa lokiya aliꞌyaꞌmo alige hanageke yaꞌmo alige huta aise afinaꞌmo maiꞌneta ma mopamo malage huta ataleta halelita neꞌune.
Ina laꞌmo kaipamo leꞌniya lokiyakamo ageno alagepa huno ageꞌniye. Kaipamo nelegeka kayamukiki nehanageꞌapaeꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa koli nehaya kavakamo ina laꞌmo ageno alagepa huno ageꞌniye.
Ma mopafiꞌmo maisuna afinatimo lekana paisunafeꞌmo alika laya malegeta alagepa huta ageteta afino.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, aika atagi neka lagaetegamo eno. Na magi afinaꞌmo kaipamo leka lategane. Aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluna vayakaeꞌmo kahau huka lato.
Muki afinaꞌmo lamogaga aige amuse huge huta maisunafeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo neteꞌae neteꞌaeꞌmo olataleka kahau huka lato.
Hanageke yaꞌmo lamiꞌnanageno laipamoꞌmo kana huꞌniye. Laha maegeta na magi afinaꞌmo laipamoꞌmo kana huꞌnifi huta ani agufa yatala afinakeꞌmo lamogaga aino.
Aliꞌyakamo alika aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluna vayakamo lave liyo. Laginago mafaꞌnetimo himamukamo alika apave liyo.
Ala kava neꞌmo Gotitimogae, huꞌna, amuse huka lateteka laha maegenoꞌao aliꞌyatimoꞌmo alagepa huno afole aino.
Hogote Ala neꞌapimo fala kino maiꞌniyategamo haino neꞌmaiya vekamoꞌa lokiyaꞌage vekamo aunefiꞌmo fala kino maige maige huno maigiye.
Nagaemo Ala kava nefeꞌmo huꞌnaeꞌmo, agaepiꞌmo fala kiꞌna maiꞌnogeno faino ku aino yagaino nateꞌneno naha maeno nagufamo alino katino nateꞌniya vekaꞌnimo maiꞌniye. Gotiꞌnimoꞌmo maiꞌniyanageno, naha maegaiye, huꞌna huguve.
Agaemo oꞌageꞌnana nofitetiꞌmo aneꞌaimo hanagiꞌa aeꞌa katafaugefeꞌmo hisaya nofiꞌmoꞌa okatafausiyafeꞌmo hatu maeno kateteno lusi kaitaꞌmo kahausigekaeꞌmo ofalisanafeꞌmo alagepa huno yagaino kategaiye.
Agaemo hakumo alino atalelineno hakufiꞌmo alino fala kino katesigeka alagepa huka hakufiꞌmo fala kika maigane. Lama geꞌamoꞌmo kagae halegukana huno haneꞌneno yagaino katesigeka maigane.
Apakaemo hanipifeꞌmo koli hisaya yafeꞌmo kagaemo koli osugane. Kevemoꞌmo malage huno eno haniꞌniya kava huno yegemo neleya afinaꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmoꞌa malage huno kahaesiya kavafeꞌmo koli osugane.
Haniꞌilagamo lusi kaitaꞌmo kahausigekaeꞌmo koli osugane. Felugamo alopa hanageke yaꞌmo kagaeteꞌmo afole aisiya kavafeꞌmo koli osugane.
Kahaopaleꞌmo vani tauseniꞌa vayaꞌmo falige lamaga kahaopaleꞌmo teni tauseniꞌa vayaꞌmo falige huꞌa falisagenoꞌaeꞌmo falisana kavaꞌmo kahaopaleꞌmo afole oꞌaigiye.
Kahaopaleꞌmo afole oꞌaigiyaꞌmonanafa kaulagafatikeꞌmo hosu vayaꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo anonaꞌapilefeꞌmo hosu yaꞌmo alisageka apakegane.
Kagaemo uꞌna fala kiꞌnova vekafifeꞌmo, agaepiꞌmo maige maige huꞌna maiguve, huka huꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo mago hosu yaꞌmoꞌa okahaesigeno hosu kaitaꞌmo nokaleꞌmo afole oꞌaigiye.
<range>
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa enisole vayaꞌaeꞌmo, yagaitapa ateyo, huno hapa paisigeꞌa muki afinaꞌmo kategamo umenitata hisana afinaꞌmo yagaiꞌa kategayaꞌmofeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo kagaeteꞌmo alagi afole oꞌaigiye.
Apayatetiꞌmo kavaleꞌa kasagausageno yafaꞌmoꞌa kaiyafiꞌmo okahaegaiye.
Kaiyaletiꞌmo laiyoniꞌe nagaloꞌyaveꞌeꞌmo aeka latapaigane.
Gotiꞌa, nagaefeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agufamo aliꞌna katiꞌna ategauve, huno huꞌniye. Nagiꞌnimo afino alagepa huꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna ategauve.
Nagaefeꞌmo keya aeno ge hisigeꞌnaeꞌmo afiguve. Hanageke yaꞌmo neꞌalisigeꞌnaeꞌmo agaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌna maiguve. Agufamo aliꞌna katiꞌna ateteꞌna ala agiꞌamo amiguve.
Yatala kafugamo maisiya yaꞌmo amisugenoꞌaeꞌmo, haine, huno huteno hao ke hegaiye. Agufamo aliꞌna katiꞌna ateꞌnova kavaꞌnimo aepaꞌamo aliꞌna ave liguve, huno huꞌniye.
















Ala kava neꞌmo kini vekamo maiꞌneno yagaino neꞌapate. Agaemo ala agiꞌaꞌe ha le konali yaꞌaꞌeꞌmo alino vaino aliꞌniye. Lokiyaꞌamo alino kukenagana huno vaino aliꞌniye. Agaemo ma mopamo alino lokiya vaino ateꞌniyanageno kanage kanage osugiye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Kagaemo akeyaꞌvilagatiꞌmo maime maime neꞌane. Muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo kini vekamo maiꞌnane.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, aniꞌmoꞌa aino holakau holakau nehiye. Aniꞌmoꞌa haiteno lamiteno nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo alopa agemo neꞌaiye.
Ala kava neꞌmo lokiyaꞌamoꞌmo aniꞌmoꞌa aino holakau holakau nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo alopa agemo neꞌaiya aniꞌmo lokiyaꞌamo ago aeno agaseꞌniye.
Kavayafatiꞌmo lokiya gemo huꞌnana gemo haneꞌniyanageno alagi hanege hanege huno afaꞌa hanegaiye. O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Nokamo konali yaꞌamo hanege hanege huno hanesiya kava huꞌa vayakamogi alagepa apaote kavaꞌapimo haneꞌniye.























Egetao Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga huta agaefeꞌmo mono yokemo hugune. Lokiya vekatimo yafakana huno maiꞌneno lagufamo alino katino nelateya vekaekeꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo huteta lamogagamo aigune.
Agaetegamo egetao agaefekeꞌmo hao ke hegaune. Agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga huta lamogagamo aiteta samu yokemo hugune.
Ala kava neꞌmo ala Gotiꞌapimoꞌmo maiꞌniye. Ala kini vekamo maiꞌneno muki aigofe gotiꞌapimogimo alagi aeno apakaseno yagaino neꞌapateyaꞌmofeꞌmo mono yokemo higetao.
Kagoꞌmufilagamo yagaige aveleꞌmo yagaige huno neꞌyagaiye.
Solovala aniꞌe mopaꞌeꞌmo alo huꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaiꞌa yaꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Etapa ape higetao Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alo huno lateꞌniya vekaeꞌmo laleꞌya faiꞌneta mono huta maigune.
Gotitimoꞌmo maiꞌneno yagaino nelateya vayaꞌmo sipisipi vayaꞌamo agaiꞌa kegiꞌyafiꞌmo haita maiꞌnonaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo mono higetao. Hemenimo lapakaemo Goti geꞌamo neꞌafisayana
lapaipamo alita lokiya vaitapa oꞌateyo. Lapakinago vayaꞌmogimo kaꞌme kotegamo nata neꞌa neꞌuꞌapaeꞌmo namalageka huꞌnae. Geꞌnimo ago amagiꞌa ataleꞌnaya kava hutapa geꞌnimo amagitapa oꞌataleyo.
Nagaemo lusi alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌna fotiꞌa kafugamo hapa maeꞌnogeꞌa alagepa kavaꞌnimo ago ageꞌnayaꞌmonanafa hosu kavakeꞌmo nehuꞌapaeꞌmo, na agufa kavaꞌmo husifi, huteꞌa namalageka huꞌnae.
Huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo ani afinaꞌmo muki maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo naipamo kana huꞌnaeꞌmo, muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hosu apaipa apakesageꞌmo afiteꞌapaeꞌmo neꞌnatalae. Geꞌnimo alagi alagepa huꞌa noꞌafiye.
Naipamo leꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo nagoꞌya ataleteꞌna lokiya gefatiꞌmo huꞌnaeꞌmo, nagaeꞌeꞌmo haiꞌeꞌa maiꞌa falu hisaya koteꞌmo alagi haiꞌa oꞌmaigae, huꞌna huꞌnove.
Ala kava nefeꞌmo saufa yokemo hiyo. Muki ma mopafi vayaꞌmogimo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo yokemo hiyo.
Ala kava nefeꞌmo yokemo hutetapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Lagufamo alino katino lateꞌniye, hutapa muki afinaꞌae afinaꞌaeꞌmo aeta hakalo hutapa hapa paiyo.
Ala agiꞌamo amitetapaeꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌmo aliꞌniya kavaꞌaenagi lokiya kavaꞌmo huꞌniya kavaꞌaenagi huta muki vayaꞌaifeꞌmo ava gemo hutapa hapa paiyo.
Ala kava neꞌmo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo magoꞌe hutapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Aigofe gotiꞌapimogimo alagi aeno apakaseꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo magoꞌe hutapa koli nehutapa mono hiyo.
Muki alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌai gotiꞌapimogimo aigofe gotigi maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa kokuꞌnaꞌmo alo huꞌniye.
Ha le konali yaꞌamo haneꞌnigeno kini vekamo maiꞌniye. Lokiya vekamo maiꞌnigeꞌa hapaꞌye huꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo neꞌagaya vekamo maiꞌniye.
Muki ma mopafi vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hutetapa ha le konali yaꞌaleꞌe lokiyaꞌaleꞌefeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo.
Ala agiꞌamo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hutetapa ofalinimo alinita agaetegamo eyo.
Aote kavaꞌmo nehutapaekeꞌmo Ala kava nefeꞌmo mono hiyo. Muki ma mopafi vayaꞌmogitapamo agaefekeꞌmo atete hutapa maiyo.
Muki alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌaifeꞌmo, Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa yagaino neꞌmaiye, hutapa hapa paiyo. Mopamo alino lokiya vaino ateteno maleꞌniyanageno afaꞌa hanegaiye. Agaemo fatago kavaꞌmo nehunoꞌaeꞌmo muki vayaꞌmo alino fako huno apategaiye.
Kokuꞌnaꞌmogamo kamogaga aigenoꞌao mopamoꞌeꞌmo amogaga aino. Solovala aniꞌmogaꞌe solovala anipiꞌmo maiꞌnaya yaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo huteꞌa apamogaga aiyo.
Hoyamogaꞌe hoyafiꞌmo haneꞌnaya neꞌyaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo lapamogaga aiyo. Yahaofilaga yosamoꞌa alopa gefatiꞌmo huteno amogaga aigiye.
Ala kava neꞌmo muki ma mopafi vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino apatesiyafeꞌmo eminegaiye. Agaemo alagi alagepa fatago kavaꞌmo huno muki ma mopafi vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino apategaiye.






























Ma mopafi muki haopalega maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogitapamo lapamogaga aitetapa Ala kava nefekeꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo hiyo.
Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌalefeꞌmo mono nehutapaeꞌmo lapamogaga lapamagaga aitapa maiyo. Yokemo nehutapaeꞌmo agaemo maiꞌniya yategamo etapa maiyo.
Agetapa aeto hutetapaeꞌmo Ala kava nefeꞌmo, Gotiꞌmae, hutapa hiyo. Lagaemo lagaitimo alo osuꞌnopa agaiꞌamo alo huno lateꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo lagaemo agaiꞌa vayaꞌmo maiꞌnone. Lagaemo vayaꞌamo maiꞌneta sipisipiꞌamo agae kegiꞌyafiꞌmo haita maiꞌnonagenoꞌaeꞌmo yagaino nelate.
Kahao ke nehone, hutapa hume hume neꞌutapaeꞌmo mono noꞌamo yafa lafi kegiꞌya kate kipaꞌapifiꞌmo faletapa haiyo. Mono no kumaꞌaleꞌmo neꞌutapaeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hume hume viyo. Hao ke hetetapa ala agiꞌamo amiyo.
Ala kava neꞌmo alagepa vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmae. Agaemo lagaefeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo haume haume neꞌviya kavaꞌamoꞌmo hauno hano osuno muki afinaꞌmo nehaiye. Lama gemo hunoꞌaeꞌmo, lapa maeꞌna lapamiguve, huno huꞌniya geꞌamo alagi oꞌataleno akame huno muki hemenimo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaitegaꞌe aliꞌa apateme apateme visaya vayaꞌaitegaꞌeꞌmo ani agufa kavaꞌmo afaꞌa hugiye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Nagaemo kahau huka neꞌatana kavakaꞌe alagepa huka alika fako huka neꞌatana kavakaleꞌefeꞌmo yoke huguve. Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagaefekeꞌmo yoke huguve.
Ageꞌna aeto huteꞌnaeꞌmo afiteꞌna vaiꞌmo alagi oꞌalisuva kateꞌmo uguve. Hainu afinaꞌmo nagaetegamo egane. Nagaemo noꞌnifiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌnimo neꞌaliya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaiꞌna apateꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo vaiꞌmo alagi oꞌalisuvana alagepa kavaꞌageꞌmo huꞌna maiguve.
Nagaemo hosu kavaꞌmo hisuvafeꞌmo nagesamo oꞌafiguve. Alagepa kaꞌmo ataleꞌa neꞌvaya vayaꞌai kavaꞌapieꞌmo alagi oꞌnahauꞌniyanageno ani agufa hosu kavaꞌapimoꞌa nagaeteꞌmo aino okamaegaiye.
Aigofe kavaꞌmo osuꞌna hosu apaipa vayaꞌmo hapafaiꞌna apatalegauve.
Huꞌa faipa huꞌa neꞌataya vayaꞌmo hapafaiꞌna apatalegauve. Ala vayaꞌmo maiꞌnone, huꞌa huteꞌa himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo nagaeꞌeꞌmo oꞌmaigae.
Nagaemo Goti geꞌamo oꞌataleꞌa akame nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo amuse huꞌna apatesugeꞌa nagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa maigae. Aigofe gemo nosaya vayaꞌamogigeꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌnimo aligae.
Aeꞌa ati nekaya vayaꞌmo noꞌnifiꞌmo haiꞌa oꞌmaigae. Aigofe gemo nehaya vayaꞌmo nagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa oꞌmaigae.
Malage huꞌna he tiꞌna hosu vayaꞌmo aliꞌna hano huꞌna apataleteꞌna hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo taonifatiꞌmo aliꞌna hapa faiꞌna apatalegauve.





























Nagupi mafaꞌneo, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alika asaga huvo. Muki nagufamoꞌe naipa nagesamoꞌeꞌmo aote neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alino asaga hino.
Nagupi mafaꞌneo, huꞌna, alagepa huno naha maeꞌniya kavafeꞌmo kage okanika agiꞌaleꞌmo alika asaga huvo.
Agaemo muki hosu kavaꞌnimo alino ataleteno muki kaitaꞌnimo alino nahageno neꞌnate.
Falisuva kavapatiꞌmo miya faino hatu maeno neꞌnate. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa ala nagiꞌnimo namitenoꞌaeꞌmo nagaefeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo hau huno neꞌnate.
Alagepa yaꞌmo alino neꞌnamigenoꞌaeꞌmo magoꞌe yafeꞌmo naipafatiꞌmo ohauꞌniye. Naha neꞌmaegeꞌnaeꞌmo hakiki namamo neya vekagana huno maiꞌniya kava huꞌna neꞌmauve.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa aliꞌa afepi apatageꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmo hapa maeteno apakaiꞌapi yaꞌmo alisayafeꞌmo alino apamigiye.
Agaemo aipafiꞌmo agesa afige hauge nehiya kavaꞌamo Moseseꞌmo alino ave lige Isaleli vayaꞌmo huꞌniya kavaꞌamo alino apave lige huꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hau huno apatege fiku hapa maeno apamige vase vase huno aipamo leno apatege lusi kava huno hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauge huno neꞌmaiye.
Halate magoꞌe huno olahaugiyaꞌmonanafa muki afinaꞌmo aipamo leno olategaiye.
Hosu kavatimo anonatilefeꞌmo magoke aiyaya huno nolamiye. Hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnona kavatilefeꞌmo magoke aiyaya huno nolamagiye.
Kokuꞌnaꞌmo muga anagamo haneꞌniya kava huno agaefekeꞌmo koli huteꞌa mono nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo magoke aiyaya kava huno hau huno neꞌapate.
Yegemo haine neꞌeya aupilagaꞌe yegemo lamino nefaleya aupilagaꞌeꞌmo lusi afagiꞌaleꞌmo haneꞌniya kava huno Gotiꞌa hosu kavatimo magoke aiyaya kava huno alino afagiꞌaleꞌmo yaga auno neꞌatale.
Afoꞌapimogi mafaꞌne anagaꞌapieꞌmo hapau huꞌa neꞌataya kava huno Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaefeꞌmo koli huteꞌa mono nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo hau huno neꞌate.
Agaemo, mopaletiꞌmo alo huꞌna apateꞌnove. Mumusopaletiꞌmo alo huꞌnova vayaꞌageꞌmo maiꞌnae, huno agesamo neꞌafiyaꞌmofeꞌmo lagaetegamo vase vase huno aliꞌyaꞌmo neꞌaliye.
Kahaumoꞌmo aise afinaꞌmo nehaneya kava huta ma mopafiꞌmo aise afinaꞌmo maigeta nefalune. Kahau ausemo heꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo malage huno yasimo neꞌaligenoꞌaeꞌmo falu teteno hali huno mopafiꞌmo asagauno neꞌaiya kava huta aise afinaꞌmo maigeta ago nefalune.
<range>
Nefalunaꞌmonanafa Ala kava nefeꞌmo koli huteꞌa mono nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo ema akeyaꞌvilagatiꞌmo hau huno apateme apateme eno henagaꞌamo afole aisiya afinaꞌeꞌmo hau huno apateme apateme uno hano osugiye. Agaemo laha neꞌmaeya kava huno alita apateꞌnonanageꞌa henagaꞌamo aliꞌa apateme apateme visaya mafaꞌnemogimo kotalake geꞌamo akame huꞌa ma kavaꞌmo hiyo, huno huꞌniya gemo neꞌafiya vayaꞌmo hapa neꞌmae.
<range>
Ala kava neꞌmo kokuꞌnapiꞌmo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo yagaino neꞌate. Muki asole vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌate.
Enisole vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, lokiya vayaꞌmo maiꞌnetapa geꞌamo afitetapa akame nehaya vayaꞌmogitapae, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo.
Muki kokuꞌnapi maiꞌnetapa aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vayaꞌamogitapamo hauꞌniya kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo.
Muki alo huno lapateteno muki neꞌyagaiya kotegamo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Nagupi mafaꞌneo, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alika asaga huvo.
O, Nauneꞌnameyo, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alika asaga huka ato. Ala kava neo, O Gotiꞌnimogae, huꞌna, ala kagi vekamo maiꞌnane. Ala kagikaꞌe alopa konali yakaꞌeꞌmo kukenagana huka alika vaiteka neꞌmaine.
Ha le yakamo kukenakagana huka alika vaiteka neꞌmaine. Kokuꞌnaꞌmo seli nokana huka alika atale maleꞌnane.
Anagamo hiyapi aniteꞌmo nokamo akalo huka ki maleꞌnane. Hiyaꞌmo kalekagana huno haneꞌnigeno yasimoꞌmo kavalelino neꞌviye.
Agaemo enisole vayaꞌamo yasigana huno alo huno apateꞌniye. Aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vayaꞌmo ata vaikana huno alo huno apateꞌniye.
Kagaemo ma mopamo muki afinaꞌmo hanege hanege huno hanesiyafeꞌmo faika ateꞌnane.
Solovala aniꞌmo alika ateꞌnanageno eno ma mopamo aeno ati kaeteno avemo alino agaseꞌniye.
Solovala anifeꞌmo, kaune ho, huka huꞌnanageno aune heno uꞌniye. Hakalu huꞌnanageno afitenoꞌaeꞌmo nagu nagu huno lamiꞌniye. Aveletiꞌmo aino laki lamino aune hetaleno lamino ani yamufiꞌmo asagauno aiteno ateꞌnana noꞌaleꞌmo halate haneꞌniye.
<range>
Kegiꞌyamo huka ku aika ateꞌnananageno halate eno ma mopamo aeno ati okaegaiye.
Meti aniꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno ani yamufiꞌmo nelamiye.
Nelamigeꞌapaeꞌmo muki afela afumogimo neꞌnae. Afela nokimogimo neꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo apainagamo hau nosiye.
Ani agiꞌnaleꞌmo haneꞌniya yosafiꞌmo nama anagaꞌmogi apanoꞌmo ki maleteꞌa yosa akopaleꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa apake neꞌaiye.
Anagamo akalo huka ki maleꞌnana nopatiꞌmo aniꞌmo alika aveleꞌmo lakiꞌnanagenoꞌaeꞌmo koꞌmo neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo muki ma mopafi yaꞌmo nehage.
Muki pulumakamogi kahaumo nesayafeꞌmo alika hageka ateteka vayaꞌmogi hoyafiꞌmo hakalesaya neꞌyateꞌmo yagaiꞌneꞌa aliꞌa nesayafeꞌmo alika hageka neꞌatane.
Ani kava huka ma mopafi vayaꞌmogimo apamogaga aisayafeꞌmo nofi alagafati aniꞌmo alika apamige apaugosafiꞌmo uvelimo falesageno fayu fayu hisigeꞌa amuse hisayafeꞌmo uvelimo alika apamige apaipamo alino lokiya vaino apatesiyafeꞌmo peleti mayamo alika apamige huka alika neꞌamine.
Koꞌmo neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo Lemanonigayagamo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fai maleꞌniya yosamoꞌmo lusi kava huno aniꞌmo neꞌaliye.
Ani yosaleꞌmo muki nama anagaꞌmogimo apanoꞌmo nekiye. Mago alopa namamogimo mago yosaleꞌmo apanoꞌmo nekiye.
Afela meme anagaꞌmogimo yatala aveleꞌmo umenitata nehageꞌapaeꞌmo mago afela afu anagaꞌmo yafa kapiꞌmo uꞌa fala nekiye.
Kagaemo kaimo alo hu maleꞌnanageno muki afinaꞌmo kaimo eno neꞌateya kavafeꞌmo lekana nepaiye. Yegemo lamino nefaleya afinaꞌmo agetageno lamino nefale.
Kagaemo hani huvo, huka nehanageno haniꞌmo nehigeꞌapaeꞌmo muki yagagafamo fala kiꞌa maiꞌnayategatiꞌmo eꞌa umenitata nehae.
Afela laiyoni anaꞌaumogi Gotitegatiꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo aliꞌa nesayafeꞌmo kahauya huꞌa kae kae nehae.
Yegemo nelegeꞌapaeꞌmo kelifiꞌmo lamiꞌa havaeꞌa neꞌmaiye.
Fala kiꞌa neꞌmaigeꞌapaeꞌmo vayaꞌmo he tiꞌa uꞌa aliꞌyaꞌapimo neꞌaligenoꞌaeꞌmo yegemo lamino nefale.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, asole kavaꞌmo nehane. Ageteka afiꞌnana kavakaletiꞌmo muki ma mopafi yaꞌe vayaꞌeꞌmo alo hu maleꞌnanageꞌapaeꞌmo ma mopafiꞌmo kili paeꞌa maiꞌnae.
Solovala aniꞌmo muga afagiꞌaleꞌmo haneꞌnigeno lusi yatala aniꞌmo vasilonafiꞌmo muki apauneꞌapameꞌe yaꞌmo maiꞌnae.
Muga alopa anipiꞌmo asole sipimo neꞌvageꞌapaeꞌmo alopa noyamemogi nagosaꞌmo ailiꞌa uꞌeꞌa huꞌa yokalomo neleꞌaeꞌmo aeꞌa hailo huꞌa haiteꞌa emi eteꞌa nehae.
Mukiꞌamogimo neꞌyaꞌmo alika apamisanafeꞌmo apaka netegeꞌa kagava neꞌmaiye.
Neꞌyaꞌmo alika neꞌapaminageꞌaphaeꞌmo neꞌnae. Kayapatiꞌmo aliꞌa neꞌa apamu neae.
Kakameꞌyamo neꞌapaminageꞌapaeꞌmo kolikamo nehae. Apavamusateꞌmo neꞌalinageꞌapaeꞌmo faliteꞌa halate mopamo aliꞌa nehamalae.
Kaunekameꞌmo alika ateꞌnanageno uno alino afole aino neꞌapate. Muki haopalegamo saufa yaꞌe vayaꞌeꞌmo alo huteka alika afole aika neꞌapatane.
Ala kava neꞌmo ha le konali yaꞌamoꞌmo alagi hanege hanege huno haneno. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alo huꞌniya yatefeꞌmo amogaga aino.
Agaemo mopaleꞌmo aulu heno neꞌagegenoꞌaeꞌmo imima neꞌaliye. Aveleꞌmo ame neꞌaligenoꞌaeꞌmo halinamo neꞌaiye.
Nagaemo ofaliꞌna muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna yoke huguve.
Ala kava nefeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauvaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna neꞌmauvanageno amuse huno natesiyafeꞌmo nahauꞌniye.
Agaemo hosu vayaꞌmo ma mopafatiꞌmo alagi alino hano huno apatalesiyafeꞌmo nahauꞌniye. O nauneꞌnameyo, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alika asaga huka ato. Ala agiꞌamo amiyo.
Ala kava nefekeꞌmo hao ke heyo. Agaefekeꞌmo ge hiyo. Huꞌniya kavafeꞌmo ava gemo afisayafeꞌmo muki alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌaifeꞌmo aeta hakalo hutapa hapa paiyo.
Agaefekeꞌmo yoke huge samu yokemo huge hiyo. Lapau neꞌaiya kavaꞌae kavaꞌaeꞌmo ava gemo hiyo.
Aote agiꞌalefeꞌmo ala lapakitapimo alitetapa lapamogaga aiyo. Ala kava nefeꞌmo kahauya nehaya vayaꞌmogimo apamogaga aiyo.
Ala kava netegamo utapa himamuꞌamo alisayafeꞌmo kahauya hutapa maiyo. Augosamo agesayafeꞌmo kahauya hiyo.
Emalehamuꞌa Ala kava neꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vekaꞌamo aginago vayaꞌamogitapae, huꞌna, Yekopuꞌa lekana paino ateꞌniya vekamo aginago vayaꞌamogitapae, huꞌna, lokiya kavaꞌaꞌe aune kavaꞌaꞌefeꞌmo lapakesamo afiyo. Alino fako huno apateteno ani kavaꞌmo hiyo, huno huꞌniya geꞌaeꞌmo lapakesamo afiyo.
<range>
Agaemo Ala kava netimo Gotitimoꞌae. Agaemo muki ma mopafi vayaꞌmo alino fako huno apateteno ani kavaꞌmo hiyo, huno nehiye.
Agaemo muki afinaꞌmo agaiꞌa kotalake geꞌaeꞌmo agesamo afiteno oꞌataleno akame huno neꞌmaiye. Vayaꞌmo afole aite afole aite hume hume neꞌvisagenoꞌaeꞌmo afole aino, huno huꞌniya geeꞌmo age okanino agesamo afino maiꞌniye.
Agaemo Emalehamuꞌeꞌmo kotalake gemo hu maleteno Emalehamu mafaꞌneꞌamo Aisikifeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huguve, huno hu maleteno Aisiki mafaꞌneꞌamo Yekopufeꞌmo hanege hanege huno hanesiya kotalake geꞌamo hu maleꞌniye.
<range>
Kenani mopamo aliꞌna hakiꞌna lapamisugeno lapakaitapi mopatapimo hanegaiye, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Aise vayaꞌamogi ina agufa nata vayaꞌmo maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo uꞌa mago nofi vayaꞌai mopaleꞌmo maigeꞌa atale uꞌa mago alu nofi vayaꞌai mopaleꞌmo maigeꞌa atale uꞌa ani kava huꞌa mago kini vekamoꞌa yagaiꞌniya mopaleꞌmo uꞌa maigeꞌa atale uꞌa mago alu kini vekamoꞌa yagaiꞌniya mopaleꞌmo maige maige huꞌa maiꞌnae.
<range>
Ani kava huꞌa maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaiꞌa vayaꞌaiteꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌa yagaiꞌa oꞌatesayafeꞌmo oꞌataleno yagaino apateꞌniye.
Inagi yagaiꞌa neꞌapataya kini vayaꞌaifeꞌmo, uvelimo faleꞌna apateꞌnova vayaꞌmo apame oꞌaliyo. Nagaetegati gemo alini eꞌa aeꞌa hakalo huꞌa hapa nepaiya vayaꞌmo maitapa halove hutapa apatetetapa hanageke yaꞌmo alitapa oꞌapamiyo, huno ke hapauꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa, kafu hisaya kavaꞌmo aliꞌna afole aiꞌna ategauve, huno agesamo afiteno hogoteno vayaꞌamo hapa maesiya vekamo Yosefeꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno uꞌniye. Yosefe nepuꞌamogimo avaleꞌa alu nofi vayaꞌmo apamiꞌnageꞌa kalavusi aliꞌyaꞌmo alisiya mafaꞌnemo maisiyafeꞌmo miya faiꞌa avaleliꞌa uꞌnae.
<range>
Isipi kotegamo uno maiꞌnigeꞌa kalavusi huꞌa ateteꞌapaeꞌmo aiyalateꞌmo seli nofitetiꞌmo kiꞌa ateꞌnageno lusi kava huno kana hauꞌniye.
Ani kava huno maiꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa amalageka huno ateme ateme neꞌvigenoꞌaeꞌmo afole aigiye, huno huꞌniya kavaꞌmo afole aiꞌniye.
Hogote kini vekamoꞌa aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vekaeꞌmo, hatu maeka ato, huteno alino ateꞌnigeno uno Yosefeꞌmo hatu maeno ateꞌniye.
Hatu maeno atetenoꞌaeꞌmo, muki Isipi mopaleꞌe vayaꞌaiteꞌeꞌmo yagaika apato, huno ha paiꞌnigeno Yosefeꞌa hogote gamani vayaꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa yagaiꞌa neꞌataya vayaꞌaiteꞌeꞌmo yagaino apateteno vayatama vayaꞌmo alino apaya maleꞌniye.
<range>
Ani kava huno yagaino apateꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo Isaleli vayaꞌmo Isipi kotegamo eꞌnae. Yekopuꞌe muki afamo anaga vayaꞌaꞌeꞌmo eꞌa Hamu aginago vayaꞌai mopaleꞌmo Isipi kotegamo maiꞌnae.
Maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa vayaꞌamo hapa maeꞌnigeꞌa asole mafaꞌnemo aliꞌa apateꞌnageꞌa aiꞌa atagu faeꞌa maiteꞌa lokiya vayaꞌmo hamaleteꞌa kame vayaꞌapimo aeꞌa apakaseꞌnae.
Agaemo Isipi vayaꞌai apaipa apakesamo alino afe leno apateꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo agaiꞌa vayaꞌaitegamo apaini huꞌa apateteꞌa aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo humi apateꞌnae.
Agaemo aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vekaꞌamo Moseseꞌe lekana paino ateꞌniya vekamo Eloniꞌeꞌmo alino anateꞌnigeꞌana kini vekalegamo uꞌnaꞌae.
Anakaemo Goti lokiya kavaꞌamo noꞌagaya agufa aune kavaꞌmo Isipi kotegamo huꞌnaꞌae.
Agaemo hani hisiya kavaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno emineno hani huꞌniye. Isaleli vayaꞌmogi geꞌamo oꞌataleꞌa afiꞌnae.
Agaemo aniꞌmo kola aniꞌmo alino hamaleno ateꞌnigeꞌa noyame anagaꞌmo faliꞌa hano huꞌnae.
Lokuloku anagaꞌmo aiꞌa atagu faeꞌa muki ani mopaleꞌmo maiꞌneꞌaeꞌmo kini vayaꞌmo nehavaya noꞌapifiꞌmo haiꞌa maiꞌnae.
Ge huꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo asole kosi anaganagi apayokapi nama anaganagi huꞌa eꞌa muki ani mopaleꞌmo aiꞌa atagu faeꞌa maiꞌnae.
Afa koꞌmo aiyo, huno osuꞌnifa ko mopa koꞌmo aiyo, huno huꞌnigeno muki ani koteꞌmo alino alave huteno lusi ko mopa koꞌmo aiteno nofiꞌe fiki yosaꞌeꞌmo amagiꞌniye. Hafosa haiꞌnigeno muki haopalegamo haneꞌniya yosamo amagino lo aeꞌniye.
<range>
Ge huꞌnigeꞌa asole akenu anagaꞌmo neya akenuꞌage huꞌa lekana opaisuna agufa akenu anagaꞌmogimo eꞌa muki hegafatalili yaꞌe muki hoyalega haneꞌniya neꞌyaꞌapiꞌeꞌmo neꞌa hano huꞌa ataleꞌnae.
<range>
Muki Isipi vayaꞌai yege mafaꞌneꞌapimo apamagiꞌniye.
Apamagiteno Isaleli vayaꞌmo hatu maeno apateꞌnigeꞌa Isipi kotegamo ataleꞌa ugefeꞌmo nehuꞌapaeꞌmo Isipi vayaꞌai siluva yafaꞌapiꞌe goli yafaꞌapiꞌeꞌmo aliniꞌa uꞌnae. Muki vayaꞌamo kaita ohapauꞌnigeꞌa lokiya vaiꞌa maiꞌneꞌa uꞌnae.
Isipi vayaꞌmogimo apakaefeꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa koli huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo Isaleli vayaꞌmo apataleꞌa neꞌvageꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga aiꞌnae.
Gotiꞌa muki felugaꞌamo ulunapiꞌmo uge maige hisayafeꞌmo hiyatetiꞌmo aino apati kaeteno muki haniꞌilagaꞌamo aeno ha leno apatesiyafeꞌmo kokuꞌnapatiꞌmo ata leꞌnigeno aeno ha leno apateꞌniye.
Apakaemo Gotifeꞌmo afi geꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo hifakana agufa nama anagaꞌmo apateꞌnigeꞌa haleli uꞌa maiꞌnageꞌa apatafauꞌa kaeꞌa neꞌnae. Agaemo lusi neꞌyaꞌmo kokuꞌnapatiꞌmo alino apamiꞌnigeꞌa aliꞌa neꞌa apamu huꞌnae.
Agaemo aniꞌmo ohaneꞌniya kotegamo yafapiꞌmo amagino apalo atiꞌnigeno yafapatiꞌmo alopa anikefamo emineꞌnigeꞌa neꞌnae.
Agaemo aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vekaꞌamo Emalehamufeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huguve, huno hu maleꞌniya geꞌaeꞌmo agesamo afiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huꞌniye.
Ani kava nehunoꞌaeꞌmo vayaꞌamo apavalelino neꞌvigeꞌapaeꞌmo lekana paino apateꞌniya vayaꞌamogimo yoke huꞌa apamogaga aiꞌnae.
Agaemo alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌai mopamo alino apamiꞌnigeꞌa hoyaꞌapiꞌeꞌmo aliꞌnae.
Geꞌamo afiteꞌa keꞌaepa geꞌamo akame hisayafeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huꞌniye. Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hutapa ateyo.
Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Alagepa vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo hao ke heyo. Muki afinaꞌmo hau huno apatege apatege huno neꞌmaiye.
Ina lagimo huꞌniya kavafeꞌmo ava gemo hugae. Alagepa kavaꞌmo lusi kanale kavaꞌmo huꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ina lagimo ani kavaꞌmo huꞌa agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hugae.
Geꞌamo afiteꞌa akame huꞌa muki afinaꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Vayakamo hapa maesana afinaꞌmo nagaeꞌefeꞌmo kagesamo afiyo. Apakufamo alika katika apatesana afinaꞌmo nagaeꞌeꞌmo nagufamo alika katika nato.
Naha maegeꞌnao vayakamo alagepa huꞌa maisageꞌna apaketeꞌnaeꞌmo apakaegiꞌeꞌmo magokepi namogaga aiteꞌna vayakaꞌeꞌmo Goti vayaꞌamo maiꞌnone, huꞌna huteꞌna magokepi lamogaga aigune.
Laginago vayaꞌmogimo hosu kavakeꞌmo huꞌa maiꞌnaya kava huta hosu kavakeꞌmo huta maiꞌnone.
Laginago vayaꞌmogi Isipi kotegamo maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌa lokiya aune kavaꞌmo huꞌniyana ageꞌa aeto osuꞌnae. Hau huno apateꞌniya kavafeꞌmo alagepa huꞌa apakesamo oꞌafiꞌnafa ago apake kaniꞌniye. Apakaemo solovala aniteꞌmo uꞌa avaꞌyi huteꞌaeꞌmo anaga hogote vekalegamo hosu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa geꞌamo ago amagiꞌa ataleꞌnae.
Amagiꞌa ataleꞌnayaꞌmonanafa lapa maegauve, huno huꞌniya gemo akame huno himamuꞌamo alino apave lisiyafeꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apateꞌniye.
Agaemo solovala anifeꞌmo, aika kaka vao, huno huꞌnigeno aino akaka vaeꞌnigeno aniꞌmo folagapiꞌmo hau huꞌniya mopaleꞌmo apavalelino uꞌniye.
Agaemo kame vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo apakufamo ago alino katino apatetenoꞌaeꞌmo ani kava huno kame vayaꞌapilegatiꞌmo apavalelino eꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa afaꞌa maiꞌnae.
Aniꞌmoꞌa kame vayaꞌapimo ago aeno apati kaeꞌnigeꞌa muki vayaꞌamo ago faliꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo geꞌaeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago huꞌnae.
Huꞌnayaꞌmonanafa huꞌniya kavafeꞌmo ago apake kaniꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo agaefeꞌmo na kava hisune, huꞌa afi okeꞌneꞌa afa kavaꞌmo huꞌnae.
Kaꞌme kotega maiꞌneꞌaeꞌmo hosu hapaꞌye huꞌnigeꞌa Gotiꞌmo amalageka huꞌa ateꞌnae.
Agaefeꞌmo lamiyo, huꞌa ge huꞌnaya gemo afiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa kaitaꞌmo apamiꞌnigeꞌa ago faliꞌnae.
Kaꞌme kotega maiꞌneꞌaeꞌmo Moseseꞌe Ala kava neꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vekamo Eloniꞌefeꞌmo, aetana laga oseꞌnaꞌaꞌmofeꞌmo yagaitana olateꞌao, huꞌa huꞌnageno mopamo aino akaka vaeꞌnigeꞌa Neteniꞌe afamo anagaꞌaꞌenagi Amilamiꞌe afamo anagaꞌaꞌenagi huꞌa asagauꞌa aiꞌnageno aino akaniteno aeno apati kaeꞌniye.
<range>
Kokuꞌnapatiꞌmo atamo emineno hosu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa anakame huꞌnaya vayaꞌeꞌmo alagi leno apasaga liꞌniye.
Alu afinaꞌmo apakaemo goli yafatetiꞌmo pulumakamo auneꞌamo alo huteꞌa mono huꞌnae.
Apakaemo ani kava huꞌa ha le konali Gotiꞌmo ataleꞌa agae aimuꞌyaleꞌmo kahaumo neꞌneya pulumakamo auneꞌalefeꞌmo mono huꞌnae.
Gotiꞌa lokiya aune kavaꞌmo Isipi kotegamo huteno apakufamo alino katino apateꞌniya kavafeꞌmo ago apake kaniꞌniye.
Agaemo Isipi kotegamo aune kavaꞌmo huteno solovala aniteꞌeꞌmo lokiya kavaꞌmo huꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo hapau aiꞌnae.
Henagaꞌamo Gotiꞌa aipamo leno apatetenoꞌaeꞌmo vayaꞌnimo aliꞌna apagoꞌya lagauꞌna apatalegauve, huno nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌamo alisiyafeꞌmo Gotiꞌa lekana paino ateꞌniya vekamo Moseseꞌa nunumu huno apatetenoꞌaeꞌmo apamagisiya kaꞌmo ago akani maleꞌnigeno Gotiꞌa afaꞌa apateꞌniye.
Apateteno alagepa mopamo lapamiguve, huno huꞌniyana apakesamo afiꞌa fatago osuꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo ina agufa mopamo haneꞌniye, huꞌa huteꞌa alagepa mopaeꞌmo ohapauꞌniye.
Apakaemo seli noꞌapifiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌaeꞌmo Goti geꞌamo akame osuꞌa ge nege nege huꞌageꞌmo maiꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌa maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo ani vayaꞌaifeꞌmo kaꞌme kotegamo lapamagiteꞌna henagaꞌamo lapakinago vayaꞌmo alagepa mopaꞌapiletiꞌmo aliꞌna hapa faitalesugeꞌa alu vayaꞌai kotegamo uꞌa falige falige huꞌa maigae, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
<range>
Henagaꞌamo Piyo kotega aigofe gotiꞌapimo agiꞌamo Malifeꞌmo mono huteꞌa aunemeꞌamo ohaneꞌniya aigofe gotiꞌa ofalinimo amiteꞌa amiꞌnaya ofalini yaꞌmo aliꞌa neꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa aipamo leno apateteno alopa kaitaꞌmo apamiꞌniye.
Apamiꞌnigeno Finiyasiꞌa he tino hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnaya vayaꞌmo apamagiꞌnigeꞌa faliꞌnageno Gotiꞌa magoꞌe huno kaitaꞌmo alino oꞌapamino ataleꞌniye.
Finiyasiꞌa ani alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌa naulagaleꞌmo fatago kavaꞌmo huꞌniye, huno hu maleꞌniyanageno fatago kavaꞌamo muki afinaꞌmo hanege hanege huno hanegaiye.
Apakaemo Melima kotegamo yafapatiꞌmo aniꞌmo emineꞌniya kotegamo hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌa aipamo leno apateꞌniye. Hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Moseseꞌa hosu aipamo kaliꞌnigeno agesamo oꞌafiꞌneno malage huno hosu gemo huꞌnigeno Gotiꞌa kana yaꞌmo alino amiꞌniye.
<range>
Henagaꞌamo Gotiꞌa, alu nofi vayaꞌmo muki vayaꞌamo apamagigeꞌa faliyo, huno huꞌniya gemo oꞌafiꞌnae.
Oꞌafiꞌa alu nofi vayaꞌai aꞌmafaꞌneꞌapimo alige aꞌmafaꞌneꞌapimo apamige huꞌa maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌapimo akame huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Aigofe gotiꞌapimogifeꞌmo mono huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo Gotiꞌa apamagiꞌniye.
Apakaemo mafaꞌneꞌapiꞌe aꞌmafaꞌneꞌapiꞌeꞌmo apamagiꞌa hosu apaune vayaꞌmo ofalinimo apamiꞌnae. Apakaemo mago kavaꞌmo osuꞌnaya nute mafaꞌneꞌapimo apamagiteꞌa Kenani vayaꞌai aigofe gotiꞌapimogimo aliꞌa apamiꞌnae. Apamagiꞌnaya mafaꞌneꞌapimogi kolaꞌmoꞌa mopamo alagi alino hosu huno ateꞌniye.
<range>
Apakaemo Gotiꞌa apakameꞌya amiteꞌa hosu kavaꞌmo huteꞌa apakaiꞌapimo aliꞌa hosu huꞌa apateꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaiꞌa vayaꞌaifeꞌmo aipamo leno apateteno ohauꞌniye.
Hapa oꞌmaeno afaꞌa apakeno apataleꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo alu nofi vayaꞌmo kame vayaꞌapimogimo eꞌa yagaiꞌa apateꞌnae.
Kame vayaꞌapimogi yagaiꞌa apateꞌnageꞌa apaiyafiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa geꞌapimo akame huꞌnae.
Agaemo asole afinaꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apateme apateme eꞌniyaꞌmonanafa apakameꞌya amiteꞌa hosu kavaꞌmo huteꞌapaeꞌmo hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌa maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa agaefeꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge huꞌnageno hau huno apateꞌniye.
Kotalake gemo huguve, huno hu maleꞌniya geꞌaeꞌmo agesamo afiꞌniye. Apakaefeꞌmo hau huno apateteno halate agesamo afiꞌniye.
Agaemo kalavusi aliꞌyateꞌmo apavaleli uꞌa apateꞌnaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo hapa paiꞌnigeꞌa hapau huꞌa apateꞌnae.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, Ala kava netimogae, lagufamo alika katika lateteka alu nofi vayaꞌai apayapatiꞌmo lavaleka alika anupa huka lategetao kaote kagikaleꞌmo alita asaga huta ateteta kahao ke heteta lamogaga aino.
Isaleli vayaꞌai Gotiꞌapimo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Hemenimo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hutetapa muki afinaꞌefeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Muki vayaꞌamogitapamo he, lama ge hutapa hiyo. Agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Gotiꞌa hosu kavategatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino neꞌateya kavafeꞌmo ava gemo huꞌniya gemae
Ala kava neꞌmo alagepa vekamo maiꞌneno muki afinaꞌamo hau huno apateme apateme uno hau huno apategaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo hao ke heyo.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa kame vayaꞌapimogi apayapatiꞌmo hatu maeno apateꞌniya vayaꞌmogimo, Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hatu maeno lateꞌniye, huꞌa hisaya gemo haneꞌniye.
Agaemo yegemo haine neꞌeya kotegatiꞌmo apavalelino ege yegemo lamino nefaleya kotegatiꞌmo apavalelino ege aluga aluga haopalegatiꞌmo apavalelino ege huno apavalelino eno alino anupa huno apateꞌniye.
Mago vayaꞌmo aniꞌmo ohaneno kaꞌme kotega vayaꞌmo oꞌmaiꞌnaya kotegamo afaꞌa umenitata nehuꞌapaeꞌmo maisaya taonieꞌmo kahauya huꞌnayaꞌmonanafa oꞌageꞌnae.
Afaꞌa umenitata nehagenoꞌaeꞌmo apaka tege anifeꞌmo hapauge nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo apakupi mafaꞌneꞌageꞌmo apaunena aiꞌniye.
Ani kava huꞌa hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo lusi hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnaya kavapatiꞌmo apavalelino eꞌniye.
Agaemo uꞌa maisaya taonifiꞌmo visayafeꞌmo fatago kateꞌmo apavalelino uꞌniye.
O, Vayaꞌmogi Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa muki vayaꞌaitegamo alagepa kavaꞌamo ageteꞌa hapau aiꞌnaya kavafeꞌmo hao ke heyo.
Agaemo hapauꞌnigeꞌa hapaꞌye nehiya vayaꞌmo alino falu huno apatege apaka neteya vayaꞌmo alagepa yaꞌmo alino apamige huno neꞌmaiyaꞌmofeꞌmae.
Mago vayaꞌamogimo Gotiꞌapimo geꞌamo ago amagiꞌa ataleteꞌa anaga hogote vekamoꞌa hisaya kavafeꞌmo huꞌniya geeꞌmo, afa gemo huꞌniye, huꞌa huteꞌa ataleꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo seli nofitetiꞌmo kino apateꞌnigeꞌa hani huꞌniya yapiꞌmo ulunapiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa falisaya kavapiꞌmo maiꞌnae.
<range>
Ani kava huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo lokiya aliꞌyaꞌmo alino apamiꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo lokiyaꞌapimo alagi hano huꞌniye. Apakaemo mopafiꞌmo asagauꞌa aiꞌnageꞌapaeꞌmo mago hapa maesaya vayaꞌmo alagi oꞌmaiꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌa hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌa maiꞌneꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava nefeꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge huꞌnageno afiteno hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnaya kavaꞌapifatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apateꞌniye.
Agaemo seli nofiꞌmo alino kapalu aeno ataleteno hani huꞌniya yapiꞌmo ulunapiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa falisaya kavapatiꞌmo apavalelino uꞌniye.
O, Vayaꞌmogi Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa muki vayaꞌaitegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo nehiya kavaꞌamo ageteꞌa hapau aiꞌnaya kavafeꞌmo hao ke heyo.
Na kava huꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo hao ke hegae. Agaemo yafa lafi kegiꞌyale kateꞌmo aeni kitamo alino lo aeteno lokiya aeniletiꞌmo ka akani maleꞌnaya aenimo alino lo ae maleꞌniye.
Negi nagi vayaꞌmogimo Goti geꞌamo ago amagiꞌa atalege hosu kavaꞌmo huge huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo kaita hapauꞌniye.
Muki alu neꞌya alu neꞌyafeꞌmo ohapauꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo faligefeꞌmo huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌa hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge huꞌnageno hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnaya kavaꞌapifatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apateꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa geꞌamo alino ateꞌnigeno emineꞌniya geꞌaletiꞌmo alino alagepa huno apateꞌniye. Agaemo falisaya agufa hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnaya kavategatiꞌmo apavalelino uꞌniye.
O, Vayaꞌmogimo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa muki vayaꞌaitegamo huꞌniya alagepa kavaꞌamo ageteꞌa hapau aiꞌnaya kavaꞌaeꞌmo hao ke heyo.
Apakaemo Gotifeꞌmo hao ke hesaya ofalinimo amagiꞌa amiyo. Amiteꞌa aliꞌyaꞌalefeꞌmo apamogaga aiteꞌapaeꞌmo aeꞌa hakalo hiyo.
Alopa solovala anipiꞌmo sipifiꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌmo neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogimo
Ala kava neꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌamo agege solovala aniteꞌmo huꞌniya kavaꞌamo ageteꞌa hapau aiꞌnaya kavaꞌmo agege huꞌa neꞌagae.
Agaemo yasi aliyo, huno nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo lusi kava huno yasimo aliꞌnigeno aniꞌmoꞌa aino holakau holakau huteno apavalelino haiteno lamiteno nehiye.
Sipifi maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo lusi hanageke yaꞌmo afole aiꞌnigeꞌa kokuꞌnapilagamo haiteꞌa emiꞌeꞌa afepilagamo lamiteꞌa huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo apakupi mafaꞌnemoꞌmo ani hegekana huꞌniye.
Alopa aniꞌmo neteꞌa negi nagi huteꞌa laku taka nehaya vayakana huꞌa maiꞌnae. Alagepa huta maisunafeꞌmo na kava hisupi huꞌa apakesamo oꞌafiꞌnae.
Ani kava huꞌa hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnaya kavapatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apateꞌniye.
Agaemo yasieꞌmo afaꞌa maiyo, huno huꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo aniꞌeꞌmo afaꞌa haneꞌnaꞌae.
Aniꞌmo afaꞌa haneꞌnigeꞌa apamogaga aiꞌnae. Ani kava huno apavalelino uno solovala ani agiꞌnaleꞌmo haneꞌniya taonifiꞌmo uꞌa avaꞌyi huteꞌa alagepa huꞌa maisayafeꞌmo huꞌniya taonifiꞌmo apateꞌniye.
O, Vayaꞌmogimo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa muki vayaꞌaitegamo huꞌniya alagepa kavaꞌamo ageteꞌa hapau aiꞌnaya kavaꞌaeꞌmo hao ke heyo.
Apakaemo aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maisayateꞌmo ala agiꞌamo amiyo. Apakaemo vayatama vayaꞌmogi aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maisayateꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa ateyo.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alopa aniꞌmo alino leneno neꞌatale. Haine neꞌeya meti aniꞌmo alagi alino hano huno neꞌatale.
Vayaꞌmogimo hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo mopafatiꞌmo asole neꞌyaꞌmo neꞌaeya mopaꞌapimo alino hosu mopamo hamaleno neꞌate.
Nehiyaꞌmonanafa hau huꞌniya mopamo alino lanitani mopamo hamaleno neꞌate. Aniꞌmo ohaneꞌniya mopafatiꞌmo aniꞌmo alo huno ateꞌnigeno haine neꞌe.
Agaemo apaka neteya vayaꞌmo ani mopaleꞌmo maisayafeꞌmo apavalelino uno neꞌapate. Apakaemo maisaya taoniꞌapimo kisayafeꞌmo apavalelino uno neꞌapate.
Apakaemo asole neꞌyaꞌapimo alisayafeꞌmo avina yaꞌmo hakalege nofi alagamo faige huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hapa neꞌmaegeꞌapaeꞌmo asole mafaꞌnemo aliꞌa neꞌapatae. Pulumaka anagaꞌmo hapa neꞌmaegeꞌapaeꞌmo magoꞌe huꞌa aiꞌa atagu nefae.
Kame vayaꞌapimogi kana yaꞌmo aliꞌa apamige hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌa apamige huꞌa aliꞌa apamisagenoꞌaeꞌmo apaipamoꞌmo kana hisigeꞌa alagepa huꞌa oꞌmaisaya afinaꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hapa maegaiye.
Agaemo kame vayaꞌapileꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmo alino afepi apateꞌnigeꞌa kaꞌmo ohaneꞌniya kaꞌme kotegamo afaꞌa umenitata nehae.
Alino afepiꞌmo neꞌateyaꞌmonanafa kagemi yaꞌapimo oꞌmaleꞌnaya vayaꞌmo alino asaga huno anaꞌaleꞌmo neꞌategeꞌa hanageke yaꞌmo noꞌaliye. Hapa neꞌmaegeꞌa afamo anagaꞌmo magokepiꞌmo lokaeꞌa maiꞌnaya sipisipi anagakana huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Fatago vayaꞌmogimo ani kavaꞌmo ageteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiyaꞌmonanafa hosu vayaꞌmo apavayaleꞌmo alino akani maleꞌnigeꞌa apake noꞌaiye.
Muki afiteꞌa ageꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo ani kavafeꞌmo apakesa afifi huꞌa maigae. Apakaemo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa vayaꞌaeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniya kavaꞌamo ageꞌa aeto hugae.













































Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa Ala kava neꞌnieꞌmo, lamaga nahaopaleꞌmo faika maime maime neꞌugeꞌnao kame vayakamo aliꞌna kaiya afeꞌalumelaga apateno, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa kayotetiꞌmo yagaika apatesana himamukamo Saiyoni taonifatiꞌmo alino atesigeno ugiye. Kame vayakamogi folagapiꞌmo maiꞌneka yagaika apato, huno kaha paiꞌniye.
Himamukaletiꞌmo hisana afinaꞌmo vayakamogimo apaipafatiꞌmo hapauꞌnisigeꞌa apakufamo kamiteꞌa apaote konali kukenamo aliꞌa vaiteꞌa kakame hugae. Aꞌnemogimo apaipa kupatiꞌmo mafaꞌnemo aliꞌa neꞌataya kava huno netepiꞌmo laoꞌyaꞌmo nelamiye. Ani kava huno Gotiꞌa neya vayakamo alino apatesigeꞌa laoꞌyakana huꞌa afole aiteꞌa kagaetegamo ugae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa aipa agesamo alino afe oleno agoꞌyamo ataleno ge hunoꞌaeꞌmo, Melikisetekiꞌa mono huno neꞌateya vekamo maiꞌniya kava huka agae akamelegatiꞌmo agae nofi vekamo mono huka neꞌatana vekamo maiꞌneka muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo maige maige huka maigane, huno kaha paiꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmo lamaga kahaopaleꞌmo maiꞌniye. Agaemo aipamo leno apatesiya afinaꞌmo kini vayaꞌmo alagi apamagigiye.
Agaemo muki alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌmo alino fako huno apateteno kamiti apamagisigeꞌa faliteꞌapaeꞌmo apakufaꞌamo mopafiꞌmo asagauꞌa aigae. Agaemo muki haopalega maiꞌnaya kini vayaꞌaifeꞌmo kame huno apateteno huno aeno apakasegaiye.
Kategamo neꞌunoꞌaeꞌmo ka agiꞌnaleꞌmo haneꞌniya anipatiꞌmo negaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo he tino lokiya vaino aeno apakasegaiye.























































Nagaemo nunumu huge keya aeꞌna ge huge huꞌna maiꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa afiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.
Keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogeno geꞌnimo afiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ofaliꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huguve.
Falisuva kavaꞌmoꞌa nofi aegekana huno natafauno alagi huno maiꞌniye. Kanolufiꞌmo lamiguve, huꞌna nagesamo afiteꞌna nahausoli huteꞌna koli huꞌnove.
Ani kava huꞌna maiꞌneꞌna Ala kava nefeꞌmo, Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahao ke hovanagi nagufamo alika katika nato, huꞌna keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnove.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fiku hapa maeno apamige fatago kavaꞌamo huge huno neꞌmaiye. Gotitimoꞌa hau huno nelateya vekamo maiꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa apamuꞌamo ohaneꞌnigeꞌa afiteꞌa oꞌageꞌnaya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapate. Hosu yaꞌmo aliꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo naha maeꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa huno naha maeꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo nauneꞌnameyo, huꞌna, maika aika afeleka maika falu huvo.
Ala kava neꞌnimogae, huꞌna, falisuva kavategatiꞌmo nagufaꞌnimo ago alika katika nateꞌneka naunumo aeka kalo paeka nateteka naiyafiꞌmo oꞌnahaesiyafeꞌmo yagaika nateꞌnane.
Nagaemo Ala kava neꞌmo aulagaleꞌmo ofaliꞌa afaꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaitegamo umenitata nehuve.
Nagesamo afiꞌna fatago nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo ge huꞌnove. Ge huꞌnaeꞌmo, lusi hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌnove, huꞌna ge huꞌnove.
Nagaemo, Muki vayaꞌaifeꞌmo aigofe vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae, huꞌna alagepa huꞌna nagesamo oꞌafiꞌneꞌna malage huꞌna ge huꞌnove.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa nagaetegamo lusi kava huno alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo anonaꞌalefeꞌmo na agufa yaꞌmo amiguve.
Nagaemo lagufamo alino katino lateꞌniya kavafeꞌmo nagesamo afiteꞌna kapufi aniꞌmo aliꞌna neteꞌna Ala kava nefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huguve.
Nagaemo, naha maeꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaetegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo huguve, huꞌna huꞌnova gemo akame huꞌna Ala kava neꞌmo vayaꞌamogi apaulagaleꞌmo agaetegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo huguve.
Gotiꞌa vayaꞌaeꞌmo, hogote vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae, huno huteno agesamo neꞌafiyaꞌmofeꞌmo mago vayaꞌamo falisagenoꞌaeꞌmo, ina agufa vayane, huno osuno amuse huno apategaiye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamo maiꞌnove. Itaꞌnimoꞌmo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaliya aꞌmo maiꞌniya kava huꞌna maiꞌnove. Hatu maeka nateꞌnanageꞌna afa vekamo maiꞌnove.
Kahao ke heꞌna ofalinimo kamiteꞌna kagaefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huguve.
Naha maeꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo Ala kava nefeꞌmo, kagaetegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo huguve, huꞌna huꞌnova gemo akame huꞌna vayaꞌamogi apaulagaleꞌmo agaetegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo huguve.
Yulusalemu taoni folagapiꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo mono noꞌafiꞌmo huguve. Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo.
O alu nofi vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Muki alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌe alu nofi vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo.
Na kava huꞌnigetaene. Agaemo lusi kava huno hau huno lateteno alino ao yaꞌmo hu maleꞌniye. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa lapa maegauve, huno laha paiꞌniya gemo lama geꞌamoꞌmo muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hanege hanege huno afaꞌa hanegaiye. Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo.
Ala kava neꞌmo alagepa vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo hao ke heyo. Hau huno neꞌapateyanageno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hau huno apatege apatege huno maigiye.
Isaleli vayaꞌmogitamo, Hau huno neꞌapateyanageno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hau huno apatege apatege huno maigiye, huta higetao.
Eloni nofi vayaꞌamogitapamo, Hau huno neꞌapateyanageno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hau huno apatege apatege huno maigiye, hutapa hiyo.
Muki vayaꞌamogitapamo agaefekeꞌmo koli hutetapa mono nehaya vayaꞌmogitapamo, Hau huno neꞌapateyanageno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hau huno apatege apatege huno maigiye, hutapa hiyo.
Lusi hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo geꞌnimo afiteno hatu maeno nateꞌnigeꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌnove.
Ala kava neꞌmo nagae vekamogeno naha maesiyafeꞌmo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo vayaꞌmogi nagaetegamo hisaya kavafeꞌmo koli osuguve.
Ala kava neꞌmo nagae vekamogeno naha maesiyafeꞌmo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo apakeꞌnovana kame vayaꞌnimo asagauꞌa aigae.
Vayaꞌmogimo laha maesayafeꞌmo lagesamo afisunana kanale osugifa Ala kava nefekeꞌmo laha maegaiye, huta lagesamo afisunana kanale hugiye.
Ala apaki aliteꞌa neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogi laha maesayafeꞌmo lagesamo afisunana kanale osugifa Ala kava nefekeꞌmo laha maegaiye, huta lagesamo afisunana kanale hugiye.
Muki alu nofi vaya alu nofi vayaꞌmo kame vayaꞌnimo maiꞌneꞌa faiꞌa ku aiꞌa nateꞌnageꞌnaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo himamuꞌaletiꞌmo alagi aliꞌna hano huꞌna apatalegauve.
Muki haopalega maiꞌneꞌa faiꞌa ku aiꞌa nateꞌnageꞌnaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo himamuꞌaletiꞌmo alagi aliꞌna hano huꞌna apatalegauve.
Kevegevegana huꞌa faiꞌa ku aiꞌa nateꞌnayaꞌmonanafa aufe nofipiꞌmo malage huno atamo leno yu neheya kava huꞌna Ala kava neꞌmo himamuꞌaletiꞌmo alagi aliꞌna hano huꞌna apatalegauve.
Kameꞌnimogae, huꞌna, alika nagoꞌya faitalanageꞌna heleve hugefe huꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa naha maeꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa lokiya vaino nateꞌnigeꞌna yoke nehuve. Agaemo nagufamo ago alino katino nateꞌniye.
Afiyo, huꞌna, alagepa vayaꞌmogimo seli noꞌapifatiꞌmo apakufamo ago alino katino apateꞌniya kavafeꞌmo yoke huꞌapaeꞌmo, Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa himamuꞌaletiꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo huꞌniye.
Himamuꞌaletiꞌmo aeta apakaseꞌnone, huꞌa nehae.
Ofaliꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa huꞌniya kavafeꞌmo ava gemo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paiguve.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa lusi kava huno namagiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa falisuvafeꞌmo afaꞌa oꞌnataleꞌniye.
Alopa mono noꞌmo kitamo yakika nategeꞌnao haiꞌna Ala kava nefeꞌmo hao ke heno.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa kipaꞌamo haneꞌnigeꞌa alagepa vayaꞌageꞌmo faleꞌa nehaiye.
Geꞌnimo afiteka nagufamo alika katika nateꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo kahao ke nehove.
Yafatetiꞌmo no nekiya vayaꞌmogimo mago no nekiya yafafeꞌmo, afa yafane, huꞌa huteꞌa aliꞌa yaga auꞌa ataleꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌa ani yafafeꞌmo, hogote yafaꞌmo noꞌmo faiꞌna atesuvafeꞌmo konale yafaꞌmo haneꞌniye, huno huteno alino asaga huno ateꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa ani kavaꞌmo huꞌnigetaeꞌmo ageteta aeto agufa kanale kava huꞌniye, huta lahau aiꞌnone.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa ani afinaꞌmo hu maleꞌniye. Ani afinaꞌmo lamogaga aigetao.
Aukaya hutaeꞌmo, O Ala kava nene, huta, lagufamo alika katika lato. O Ala kava nene, huta, laha maegenoꞌao aliꞌyatimoꞌmo alagepa huno afole aino, huta aukaya nehune.
Gotiꞌa Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌalefeꞌmo neꞌeya vekamo fiku ha maeno amino. Lagaemo Ala kava neꞌmo mono noꞌafatiꞌmo Gotiꞌa fiku lapa maeno lapamino, huta nehune.
Ala kava neꞌmo Gotiꞌa maiꞌniye. Agaemo ha le yaꞌamo alino lamiꞌniye. Ofalini afumo alitapa hiꞌyalamuteꞌmo maleꞌnetapa nofitetiꞌmo kitapa atafau maleyo.
Gotiꞌnimogamo maiꞌnananageꞌna kahao ke hegauve. Gotiꞌnimogamo maiꞌnananageꞌna ala kagikamo kamiguve.
Ala kava neꞌmo alagepa vekamo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agaefekeꞌmo hao ke heyo. Hau huno neꞌapateyanageno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hau huno apatege apatege huno maigiye.
Vayaꞌmogimo alagepa kavaꞌmo nehuꞌapaeꞌmo vaiꞌmo oꞌaliꞌa Ala kava neꞌmo keꞌaepa geꞌamo akame nehaya vayaꞌmogi Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Avayafatiꞌmo huꞌniya keꞌaepa geꞌamo akame huge agesayafeꞌmo muki apaipafatiꞌmo kahauya huge huꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogi Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Apakaemo mago hosu kavaꞌmo osuꞌa Ala kava neꞌmo kateꞌmo umenitata nehae.
Kagaemo, lapayamukiki hutapa geꞌnimo akame hiyo, huka huꞌnane.
Gekamo alagepa huꞌna afiteꞌna akame hisuvafeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.
Muki gekamo ageteꞌna afisuva afinaꞌmo navagage osugiye.
Nagaemo fatago kavaꞌmo huka alika fako huka nehana gekamo alagepa huꞌna afiteꞌnaeꞌmo alagepa fatago naipafatiꞌmo ala kagikamo kamiguve.
Avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo akame huguvanagi alagi nataleka oꞌuvo.
Haiya kava huno neya vekamoꞌmo nehiya kavaꞌamo afaꞌa aeno kalo paeno atalegaiye. Agaemo gekamo alagepa huno afisiya kavatetikeꞌmo afaꞌa aeno kalo paeno atalegaiye.
Muki naipafatiꞌmo kagesuvafeꞌmo kahauya huꞌnove. Hiyo, huka huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo ataleꞌna visuvafeꞌmo oꞌnatalo.
Kagaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo osisuvafeꞌmo gekamo naipafiꞌmo aliꞌna fala ki maleꞌnove.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, alagi alagepa huka maiꞌnane. Avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya malo.
Nagaemo navayafatiꞌmo muki gekamo fatago kavaꞌmo huka kavayafatiꞌmo alika fako nehana keꞌaepa gekamo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paiꞌnove.
Ma mopafi alopa kagemi yafeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiya kava huꞌna kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana gekamo akame hisuvafeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve.
Namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maige neꞌvana kaꞌmo ageꞌna alagepa huꞌna agege huꞌna maiguve.
Nagaemo avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo namogaga aiteꞌna nage okanigiye.
Kagaemo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekakamo magoꞌe huka fiku alika namigeꞌnao ma mopafiꞌmo afaꞌa maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo gekamo akame hino.
Naulagamo alika ayakeka nategeꞌnao keꞌaepa gekamo ageteꞌna nahau aiguve.
Ma mopafiꞌmo nata neꞌna neꞌvisugekaeꞌmo gekamo afisuvafeꞌmo alika fala okika alika nave liyo.
Muki afinaꞌmo alika fako nehana keꞌaepa gekamo afisuva naipamo nekaliyaꞌmofeꞌmo naipafiꞌmo nagafu nekiye.
Himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo huka faipa huka apateꞌnana vayaꞌmogimo kakamo ataleꞌa neꞌvagekaeꞌmo ge nehapane.
Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana gekamo akame huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa natege hosu gemo huge nehagi apavayamo alika akani apategeꞌa afaꞌa maiyo.
Neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogimo fai maiꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa nateꞌnayaꞌmonanafa aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌna avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana gekaeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve. Gekamoꞌmo visuva kaꞌmo alino nave neliye.
Nagupi mafaꞌnemo asagauno aiteno mopafiꞌmo maiꞌniye. Lapa maegauve, huka huꞌnana gekamo akame huka alika he tika nato.
Nagaemo nehuva kavaꞌnieꞌmo kaha paiꞌnogekaeꞌmo geꞌnileꞌmo aeka atagaina huka naha paiꞌnane. Avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya malo.
Alika naya malegeꞌna namiꞌnana gemo aepaꞌamo afiꞌna alagepa huꞌna afino. Neꞌalina aliꞌyakamo ageteꞌnaeꞌmo nahau aiꞌnova kavaꞌnieꞌmo hapa paiguve.
Kanamo aliꞌnogeno nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌmo ani hegekana huꞌniye. Lokiya vaiꞌna kategauve, huka huꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo lokiya vaika nato.
Aigofe kateꞌmo oꞌvisuvafeꞌmo ka akani maleteka keꞌaepa gemo fiku alika namiyo.
Lama ge kateꞌmo uguve, huꞌna nagesa afiꞌnove. Alika fako huꞌnana gemo aliꞌna naulagaleꞌmo maleꞌnove.
Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana geleꞌmo aliꞌna kamaeꞌnove. O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, navagage yaꞌmo alika oꞌnamiyo.
Magoꞌe huka naipa nagesamo alika namisanageꞌnaeꞌmo nagu nagu huꞌna gekamo hiyo, huka laha paiꞌnana gemo akame huꞌna huguve.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya malegeꞌnao oꞌataleꞌna akame hume hume uꞌna hano hisiya afinaꞌeꞌmo akame hino.
Alagepa huꞌna nagesamo afisuva yaꞌmo alika namigeꞌnao keꞌaepa gekamo akame hino. He, muki naipafatiꞌmo akame huguve.
Hiyo, huka laha paiꞌnana gekaeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauvaꞌmofeꞌmo ani kateꞌmo uꞌneꞌna hisuva naipamo alika kalika nato.
Fiku yanageꞌna ma mopafi yafeꞌmo nahaꞌye hugiye. Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana gekamo akame hisuva naipa nagesamo alika namiyo.
Alu yaꞌmo aulu haeꞌna neꞌagesugekaeꞌmo alika aika afe leka nato. Kagae kateꞌmo neꞌvisugekaeꞌmo alika he tika nato.
Aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnafiꞌmo gekamo alika lokiya vaika ato, kagaefekeꞌmo koli nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmae.
Alagepa huka alika fako nehanaꞌmofeꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo hisugeꞌapaeꞌmo huꞌa faipa huꞌa natesayafeꞌmo koli nehuvanagi naha mao.
Namiꞌnana gekaeꞌmo nahaꞌye nehiye. Fatago kavakaletiꞌmo alika he tika nato.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahau huka nato. Huguve, huka huꞌnana kavaꞌmo huka nagufamo alika katika nato.
Gekamokeꞌmo naha maegaiye, huꞌna nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo huno faipa huno neꞌnateya vekamo geꞌaleꞌmo aeꞌna atagaina huꞌna ha paiguve.
Alika fako nehana gekaeꞌmo nagesa afiꞌnaeꞌmo, naha maegaiye, huꞌna nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo lama gekamo navayafatiꞌmo alika oꞌatalo.
Ani kava huꞌna maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo keꞌaepa gekamo akame hume hume uꞌna maiguve.
Namiꞌnana gekamo afisuvafeꞌmo kahauya nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo kalavusifiꞌmo oꞌmaiꞌna afaꞌa maiguve.
Nagaemo kavayafatiꞌmo nehana gemo aliꞌna neꞌyagaiya kini vayaꞌaifeꞌmo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paisugenoꞌaeꞌmo navagage osugiye.
Nagaemo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya gekaeꞌmo hiyo, huka laha paiꞌnana gekaeꞌmo namogaga aiguve.
Nagaemo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya gekaeꞌmo hiyo, huka laha paiꞌnana gekalefeꞌmo nayaꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huteꞌna avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maiguve.
Kagaemo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnaeꞌmo kaha maegauve, huka naha paiꞌnana gekaeꞌmo halate kagesamo afika ho huvo. Ani gekaeꞌmo nagesamo afiꞌnaeꞌmo, alagi afole aigiye, huꞌna huteꞌna navayagunagu huꞌna maisuvafeꞌmo alika he tika nateꞌnane.
Gekamoꞌmo alagepa huꞌna maisuva yaꞌmo alino namiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo kana yaꞌmo neꞌalugenoꞌaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo falu nehiye.
Apakiꞌapileꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa neꞌapataya vayaꞌmogimo kigi yokalo gegeꞌmo huꞌa neꞌnatayaꞌmonanafa keꞌaepa gekamo oꞌataleꞌnove.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, akeyaꞌvilagamo gekamo alika fako nehana gekaeꞌmo nagesamo afiꞌna ho huteꞌna naipamo aliꞌna falu huꞌna neꞌatove.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo keꞌaepa gekamo ago amagiꞌa neꞌatalayaꞌmofeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo atete nehiye.
Nata neꞌna eꞌna maiꞌnova noꞌnifiꞌmo avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo yoke huꞌnove.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, haniꞌilagamo kagikaeꞌmo nagesamo afiꞌna ho nehuꞌnaeꞌmo keꞌaepa gekamo akame nehuve.
Namiꞌnana gekamo akame huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo ani yaꞌmo aliꞌnove.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagaemo hetamaꞌnimo maiꞌnane. Nagaemo gekaleꞌmo yagaiꞌneꞌna akame huguve, huꞌna huꞌnove.
Nagaemo muki naipafatiꞌmo, fiku naha maeka namiyo, huꞌna kaha paiꞌnove. Nahau huꞌna lapategauve, huka laha paiꞌnana kava huka kahau huka nato.
Nagaemo kavaꞌnieꞌmo nagesa afiteꞌnaeꞌmo aiꞌna afe leꞌna kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana gemo akame huꞌnove.
Hiyo, huka laha paiꞌnana gemo akame hisuvafeꞌmo afaꞌa oꞌmaiꞌna malage huꞌna he tiꞌna akame huꞌnove.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo nofitetiꞌmo kiꞌa nateꞌnayaꞌmonanafa keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nage okaniꞌniye.
Kagaemo fatago kavaꞌmo huka alika fako nehanaꞌmofeꞌmo haniꞌilaga folaguꞌmo he tiꞌna kahao ke hegauve.
Nagaemo kagaefeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌeꞌmo magokepiꞌmo lokaeta maiꞌnone. Apamiꞌnana geleꞌmo yagaiꞌa ateꞌneꞌa akame nehaya vayaꞌeꞌmo magokepiꞌmo lokaeta maiꞌnone.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahau huka neꞌapatana kavakamoꞌmo ma mopafiꞌmo havai teꞌniye. Avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya malo.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Kaha maegauve, huka huteka ani kava huka aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamo magoꞌe huka naha maeꞌnane.
Nagaemo hiyo, huka huꞌnana gekaeꞌmo nagesamo afiꞌna fatago nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo alagepa naipa nagesamo alika namiyo.
Kayoꞌmo oꞌnamiꞌnanageꞌnaeꞌmo hogoteꞌna gekamo ago ataleꞌnovaꞌmonanafa hemenimo gekamo akame nehuve.
Alagepa kavaꞌmo huteka alagepa vekamo yagu yaga kaipa vekamo maiꞌnananagi avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya malo.
Himuꞌnamu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogi aigofe nava gemo huteꞌa huꞌa faipa huꞌa nateꞌnayaꞌmonanafa muki naipafatiꞌmo namiꞌnana gekamo akame huguve.
Apaipamo yafakana huno haneꞌnigeꞌa afiꞌa aeto nosayaꞌmonanafa keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo amuse nehuve.
Kayoꞌmo namiꞌnanageꞌnaeꞌmo gekamo afiꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo kayoꞌmoꞌa alagepa huno naha maeꞌniye.
Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamoꞌmo tauseni monimo ago aeno agaseꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo gekaeꞌmo magoꞌe huno neꞌnahaiye.
Kagaemo kayatetiꞌmo nagupi mafaꞌnemo alo huka nateteka nagufamo alo huka nateꞌnane. Hiyo, huka laha paiꞌnana gemo afisuva nagesamo namiyo.
Nagaemo gekamoꞌa naha maegaiye, huꞌna huteꞌna navayagunagu huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo kagaefeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌmogi nageteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga aigae.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, afiꞌnovana alika fako nehana kavaꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌmo haneꞌnigeka gekamo akame huteka naha maesanafeꞌmo kana yaꞌmo alika namiꞌnane.
Kagaemo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnaeꞌmo naha paiꞌnana gekamo akame huka alagepa huka kahau huka nateteka naipamo alika falu huka nato.
Keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauvaꞌmofeꞌmo kahau huka nategeꞌnao afaꞌa maino.
Apakiꞌapileꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa neꞌataya vayaꞌmogimo nagaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo apavagage hisiya yaꞌmo alika apamiyo. Nagaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnayaꞌmonanafa namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maiguve.
Kagaefeꞌmo koli huteꞌa kagaemo kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo afiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo alika aika atagineka apategeꞌapao nagaetegamo eyo.
Nagaemo avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekaleꞌmo aeꞌna hapaisuva naipa nagesamo alika namigeꞌnao navagage osisiyafeꞌmo akame hino.
Nagufamo alika katika natesanafeꞌmo lusi kava huno nahauꞌnigeno lokiyaꞌnimo ago hano huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa kaha maegauve, huka huꞌnana gekaeꞌmo nagesamo afiteꞌna navayagunagu nehuve.
Gekamo afole aisiyaꞌaeꞌmo aulu heꞌna ageꞌna maiꞌnogeno naulagafatiꞌmo nagafu nekiye. Hainu afinaꞌmo naha maeteka naipamo alika falu huka nategane.
Nagaemo afu agufaletiꞌmo alo huꞌnaya ani kekana huꞌna maiꞌnove. Halinamo neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo vaiꞌniya ani kekana huꞌna maiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nage okaniꞌna nagesamo neꞌafuve.
Na magi afinaꞌmo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnamo kana yaꞌmo aliꞌna maiguve. Hainu afinaꞌmo apaini huꞌa neꞌnataya vayaꞌmo alika fako huka apateteka kayoꞌmo apamigane.
