Ala apaki aliteꞌa apakufamo avaleliꞌa nehaiya vayaꞌmogimo kelifiꞌmo asagauꞌna aisuvafeꞌmo kelimo kafi maleꞌnae. Ani kavaꞌmo keꞌaepa gekamo akame nosaya kavaꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Kagaemo muki hiyo, huka laha paiꞌnana gekamo alagi lama gemo haneꞌniye. Apakaetegamo hosu kavaꞌmo osuꞌnovaꞌmonanafa apaini huꞌa neꞌnatae. Naha mao.
Ma mopafiꞌmo maiꞌnogeꞌapaeꞌmo aliꞌa hano huꞌa natalesayafeꞌmo huꞌnageꞌnaeꞌmo hogoꞌamo faligefeꞌmo nehuꞌnaeꞌmo namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo oꞌataleꞌnove.
Nagaemo kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo akame hisuvafeꞌmo muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo nekahaiya kavakaletiꞌmo alika he tika nato.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, gekamo alagi asagauno oꞌaigiyaꞌmonanafa kokuꞌnapiꞌmo lokiya vaino haneme haneme uno haneno hano osugiye.
Kagaemo muki afinaꞌmo gekamo akame huka afole aiteꞌa faliteꞌa hume hume neꞌvaya vayaꞌaitegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo nehane. Kagaemo ma mopamo faika ateꞌnanageno haneme haneme eno hemenimo haneꞌniye.
Muki yaꞌamo alo huꞌnanageno keꞌaepa gekamo akame huno haneme haneme eno hemeniꞌeꞌmo afaꞌa haneꞌniye. Muki yaꞌamogimo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaliye.
Nagaemo keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo namogaga oꞌaiꞌnovesinana kana yaꞌmo aliꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo ago faliꞌnovesine.
Namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo nage okanigiye. Gekaletiꞌmo alagepa huꞌna maisuva yaꞌmo alika namiꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmae.
Nagaemo namiꞌnana keꞌaepa geeꞌmo kahauya huꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo nagaemo kagaika vekamo maiꞌnovanagi nagufamo alika katika nato.
Hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogimo namagisageꞌna falisuvafeꞌmo nagava maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maiguve.
Nagaemo ageꞌnovana muki haino hapaiꞌniya yaꞌmo ago hano huꞌnigeꞌna ageꞌnove. Hano huꞌniyaꞌmonanafa keꞌaepa gekamoꞌmo yofo yaꞌamoꞌmo alopa yaꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Nagaemo keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo lusi kava huno nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniye. Neteꞌe uneꞌeꞌmo gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Muki afinaꞌmo kagaemo hiyo, huka huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo nagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeno haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo keꞌaepa gekaletiꞌmo alika naya neꞌmalanageꞌnaeꞌmo nagaemo afiteꞌna ageꞌnova kavaꞌmoꞌa kame vayaꞌnimogi afiteꞌa ageꞌnaya kavaꞌapimo ago aeno agaseꞌniye.
Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maiꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo nagaemo gemo aepaꞌamo afiꞌnova kavaꞌnimoꞌa tisa vayaꞌnimogi afiꞌnaya kavaꞌapimo ago aeno agaseꞌniye.
Namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gemo akame nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo nagaemo gemo aepaꞌamo afiꞌnova kavaꞌnimoꞌa kosuna vayaꞌmogi gemo aepaꞌamo afiꞌnaya kavaꞌapimo ago aeno agaseꞌniye.
Gekamo akame huteꞌna muki hosu kateꞌmo oꞌvisuvafeꞌmo naiyamo kalavusi huꞌna ateꞌnove.
Kagaikamo alika naya maleꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo alika fako nehana gekamo oꞌataleꞌnove.
Nagaemo gekamo neꞌna afi geꞌnogeno haga nahauꞌniye. Gekamo hagaꞌamoꞌmo kevegeve anumoꞌmo nehiya hagaꞌamo ago aeno agaseno haga nehiye.
Namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gemoꞌa gemo aepaꞌamo neꞌafuva kavaꞌmo alino namiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo muki aigofe geeꞌmo alagi oꞌnahauꞌniye.
Gekamoꞌmo lamugana huno haneꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo aeno ha nelegeꞌna umenitata nehuve. Gekamoꞌmo aeno ha leno visuva kaꞌmo alino nave neliye.
Nagaemo, Alika fako nehana gekamo fatago gemo akame huguve, huꞌna nagoꞌyamo ataleꞌna ago kaha paiꞌnove.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, lusi kana yaꞌmo aliꞌnovanagi kaha maegauve, huka huꞌnana gekalefeꞌmo alika he tika nato.
Kahao ke hovanagi kagaefeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌnigeꞌna navayafatiꞌmo hisuva gemo ofalinigana huꞌna kamisuva yaꞌmo aliyo. Kagaemo alika fako nehana gemo alika naya malo.
Nagaemo muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa neꞌmauva yaꞌnimo atalesuva kavategamo maiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nage okaniꞌniye.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo natafausiyafeꞌmo aneꞌaimo hanagi maleꞌnayaꞌmonanafa namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo amagiꞌna oꞌataleꞌnove.
Mafaꞌneꞌapimogimo afoꞌapimogi kagemi yaꞌapimo neꞌaliya kava huꞌna kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gemo aliꞌnovanageno hetamaꞌnimo hanege hanege huno hanegaiye. Ani gekaeꞌmo naipafiꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve.
Avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gemo akame hume hume uꞌna falisuva afinaꞌmo hano hisiyafeꞌmo naipamo aliꞌna he tiꞌna ateꞌnove.
Nagaemo lole apakesamo neꞌafiya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo alagi oꞌnahauꞌniyaꞌmonanafa keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniye.
Nagaemo kagaepiꞌmo fala kiꞌna maiꞌnogeka kagaemo haleguꞌnimo maiꞌnane. Gekamo alagi afole aigiye, huꞌna huteꞌna navayagunagu huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, nagaetegatiꞌmo ataletapa viyo. Gotiꞌnimoꞌmo hiyo, huno huꞌniya gemo akame huguve.
Alagepa huꞌna afaꞌa maisuvafeꞌmo kaha maegauve, huka huꞌnana gekalefeꞌmo nayateꞌmo aliyo. Afole aisiya kavafeꞌmo navayagunagu nehuvaꞌmofeꞌmo fiku yanageno navagage hugiye.
Nayateꞌmo aliyo, lageso osuꞌna afaꞌa maiguve. Afaꞌa maiꞌneꞌna muki afinaꞌmo avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo akame huguve.
Muki vayaꞌmogi avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo amagiꞌa neꞌatalaya vayaꞌmo kakameꞌyamo neꞌapamine. Apakaemo aigofe kavaꞌmo nehuꞌapaeꞌmo apakaiꞌapieꞌmo humi neꞌapatae.
Goli yafaꞌmo atafiꞌmo kaeꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo oꞌaniꞌyaꞌamo leno afole aiꞌnigeꞌa aliꞌa neꞌatalaya kava huka hosu vayaꞌmo alika neꞌatalanaꞌmofeꞌmo kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniye.
Nagaemo kagaefeꞌmo koli nehugenoꞌaeꞌmo nagufamoꞌmo atete neꞌnahaiye. Alika fako nehana kavakaeꞌmo koli nehuve.
Nagaemo alagepa huꞌna aliꞌna fako huꞌna apateteꞌna fatago kavaꞌmo huꞌnove. Kana yaꞌmo aliꞌa neꞌnamiya vayaꞌai apayapiꞌmo maisuvafeꞌmo alagi nataleka oꞌuvo.
Anonaꞌnilefeꞌmo eka naimuꞌyaleꞌmo maigeꞌnao alagepa huꞌna maino. Fiku yanageꞌa ala apaki aliteꞌa apakufamo avaleliꞌa nehaiya vayaꞌmogi kana yaꞌmo aliꞌa namigayanagi naha mao.
Nagufamo alika katika natesanafeꞌmo aulu heꞌna agege fatago kavakalefeꞌmo gekamo agesuvafeꞌmo aulu haeꞌna agege huꞌna ageꞌna maiꞌnogeno naulagafatiꞌmo nagafu nekiye.
Kahau huka neꞌapatana kava huka kahau huka nateteka avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya malo.
Nagaemo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamo maiꞌnove. Nagaemo kavayafatiꞌmo keꞌaepa gekamo hugeꞌna gekamo aepaꞌamo afisuva kavaꞌmo alika namiyo.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, apakaemo keꞌaepa gekamo ago aeꞌa ati kaeꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo aliꞌyakamo alisana afinaꞌmo afole aiꞌniye.
Gekamo aeꞌa ati kaeꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo hiyo, huka huꞌnana gekalefeꞌmo nahauꞌniya kavaꞌmoꞌa hogote goli yafafeꞌmo nahauꞌniya kavaꞌmo ago aeno agaseꞌniye.
Gekamo aeꞌa ati kaeꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo muki kavatefeꞌmo namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo, fatago gemo haneꞌniye, huꞌna nagesamo afiteꞌna aigofe kavafeꞌmo alagi oꞌnahauꞌniye.
Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nahau neꞌauva gemo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌmo akame nehiye.
Gekamoꞌmo vayaꞌai apaipafiꞌmo faleno haitenoꞌaeꞌmo aeno ha nele. Negi vayaꞌmogi gekamo afiteꞌapaeꞌmo ge aepaꞌamo afigae.
Hiyo, huka huꞌnana gekaeꞌmo naga teꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo navayamo aka hulina ha ha huꞌnove.
Kagikaeꞌmo hapau apayamopafiꞌmo hapauꞌniya vayaꞌaitegamo nehana kava huka nagaefeꞌmo kahau huka nato.
Kagaemo gekaletiꞌmo alika ho huka nateteka hosu kavaꞌmoꞌa yagaino oꞌnatesiyafeꞌmo nataleka oꞌuvo.
Namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo akame hisuvafeꞌmo kana yaꞌmo aliꞌa namiꞌnaya kavapatiꞌmo hatu maeka nato.
Kaugosafatiꞌmo ha le yakamoꞌa aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnaleꞌmo aeno ha leno. Avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya malo.
Vayaꞌmogimo keꞌaepa gekamo akame nosayaꞌmofeꞌmo lusi kava huno naunu nelamiye.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, fatago vekamo maiꞌneka alagepa fatago kavaꞌmo huka alika fako huka neꞌatane.
Kavayafatiꞌmo hiyo, huka huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo fatago gemo alagi lama gemo haneꞌniye.
Kame vayaꞌnimogi gekaeꞌmo apake kaniꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo nayamukiki nehuva kavaꞌnimoꞌa atagana huno leno nasaga liꞌniye.
Gekamo alagi alagepa gemo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamoꞌnamo gekaeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniye.
Ala vekamo oꞌmaiꞌnogeꞌapaeꞌmo nagaefeꞌmo ina agufa neꞌmo maiꞌniye, huꞌa nehayaꞌmonanafa namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo alagi nage okaniꞌniye.
Fatago kavakamoꞌmo hanege hanege huno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hanegaiye. Keꞌaepa gekamo alagi lama gemo haneꞌniye.
Hanageke yaꞌmo nagaeteꞌmo afole aiꞌnigeno nagafu kiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa hiyo, huka huꞌnana gekaeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve.
Kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo fatago kavaꞌamoꞌmo alagi hanege hanege huno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hanegaiye. Kagaemo gemo aepaꞌamo afisuva kavaꞌmo alika namigeꞌnao afaꞌa maino.
Nagaemo muki naipafatiꞌmo, Ala kava nene, huꞌna, geꞌnimo afiyo, avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo akame huguve, huꞌna kagaefeꞌmo ge nehuve.
Nagaemo, Nagufamo alika katika nategeꞌnao kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo akame hino, huꞌna kagaefeꞌmo ge nehuve.
Ko otiꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo he tiꞌna, naha mao, huꞌna ge nehuve. Gekamo afole aigiye, huꞌna navayagunagu huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Nagaemo gekaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maisuvafeꞌmo haniꞌilagamo nau okaleꞌna afaꞌa maiꞌnove.
O, Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavakaletiꞌmo geꞌnimo afiyo. Alagepa huka alika fako nehana kavakaletiꞌmo alika he tika nato.
Hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌmo nahaopaleꞌmo eꞌnae. Apakaemo keꞌaepa gekamo hanetegeꞌapaeꞌmo afagiꞌaleꞌmo maiꞌnae.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kagaemo nahaopaleꞌmo maiꞌnanagenoꞌaeꞌmo muki gekamo hiyo, huka huꞌnana gekamo alagi lama gemo haneꞌniye.
Nagaemo akeyaꞌvilagamo kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo faika ateꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo afaꞌa hanegaiye, huꞌna ago afiꞌnove.
Nagaemo keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nage okaniꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo kana yaꞌmo aliꞌnovanagi kagesamo afiteka hatu maeka nato.
Agotileꞌmo he tika maiꞌneka naha maeka hatu maeka nato. Kaha maegauve, huka huꞌnana gekalefeꞌmo alika he tika nato.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo kahauya nosayaꞌmofeꞌmo apakufamo alika katika apatesanafeꞌmo afagiꞌaleꞌmo maiꞌnae.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Lusi kava huka kahau huka apatege apatege huka kahau huka neꞌapatane. Alagepa huka alika fako nehana kavakaletiꞌmo alika he tika nato.
Asole vayaꞌmogi apaini huꞌa natege kame huꞌa natege huꞌa maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo ataleꞌna oꞌuꞌnove.
Hosu kavaꞌapimo aeꞌa ati kaeꞌnaya vayaꞌmogi gekamo akame nosayaꞌmofeꞌmo apakeꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo kana huꞌniye.
Namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniya kavaꞌnieꞌmo kagesamo afiyo. Kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavakaletiꞌmo alika he tika nato.
Akeyaꞌvilaga aepa faiꞌniya afiꞌnatetiꞌmo haneꞌniya gekamo alagi lama gemo haneꞌniye. Muki gekamo alika fako nehana gekamoꞌmo hanege hanege huno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo hanegaiye.
Ala vayaꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogi apaini huꞌa neꞌnataya kavaꞌapimo aepa vekamo oꞌmaiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa gekaekeꞌmo koli nehuve.
Vayaꞌmogi kame huꞌa aeꞌa apakaseteꞌa alopa kagemi yaꞌmo aliteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiya kava huꞌna gekaeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve.
Aigofe geeꞌmo alagi oꞌnahauꞌniyaꞌmonanafa keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniye.
Fatago kavaꞌmo huka alika fako nehanaꞌmofeꞌmo muki afinaꞌae afinaꞌaeꞌmo seveniꞌa afinaꞌmo kahao ke nehove.
Keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo hapau apayamopafiꞌmo hapauꞌniya vayaꞌmogi alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnageno apaipamoꞌmo falu nehiyanageno mago yaꞌmoꞌa apavalelino asagauno aisiya yaꞌmo ohaneꞌniye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, nagufamo alika katika natesanafeꞌmo navayagunagu huꞌna maiꞌneꞌna hiyo, huka huꞌnana gemo akame nehuve.
Nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌa kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo akame nehigenoꞌaeꞌmo lusi kava huno nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.
Muki nehuva kavaꞌaꞌnimo kaulagaleꞌmo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaꞌe kavayafatiꞌmo huꞌnana keꞌaepa gekaꞌeꞌmo akame nehuve.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, lokiya vaiꞌna ge nehuva geꞌnimo afiyo. Lapa maegauve, huka huꞌnana gekalefeꞌmo gemo aepaꞌamo afisuva kavaꞌmo alika namiyo.
Aukaya nehuva geꞌnimo afiyo. Lapa maegauve, huka huꞌnana gekalefeꞌmo hatu maeka nato.
Kagaemo avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnaya keꞌaepa gekamo alika naya neꞌmalanaꞌmofeꞌmo ala kagikamo kamiguve.
Muki gekamo hiyo, huka huꞌnana gekamo fatago gemo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo navayafatiꞌmo gekamo aeꞌna hakalo huꞌna hapa paiguve.
Namiꞌnana keꞌaepa gekamo lekana pai maleꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo kayatetiꞌmo naha mao.
O, Ala kava nene, huꞌna, nagufamo alika katika natesanafeꞌmo naga nete. Keꞌaepa gekaeꞌmo namogaga neꞌauve.
Afaꞌa maisuva yaꞌmo alika namigeꞌnao ala kagikamo kamino. Alika fako huka nateteka naha mao.
Nagaemo hiyo, huka huꞌnana gekaeꞌmo nage okaniꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo kahauya huka nago. Lageso huꞌniya sipisipigana huꞌna kataleꞌna uꞌnovanagi aliꞌyakamo neꞌaluva vekamo kahauya huka nageka navato.
Nagaemo kana yaꞌmo aliꞌnova afinaꞌmo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo alopa gefatiꞌmo ge huꞌna ha paiꞌnogeno afiꞌniye.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Apakaemo aigofe gemo huge humi apatege nehayanagi nagupi mafaꞌnemo alika katika ato.
Aigofe vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, anonatapilefeꞌmo na agufa yaꞌmo aligae. Gotiꞌa lapakaetegamo haiya kavaꞌmo hugiye.
Lokiya vekamoꞌa akoꞌya keveletiꞌmo lapaegaiye. Hokanufa atamoꞌmo leno lapasagaligiye.
Avovo nehuve. Nagaemo hosu vayaꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌna maiꞌnove. Meseki nofi vayaꞌe Keta nofi vayaꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌna maiꞌnove.
Nagaemo lusi yatala afinaꞌmo kame hisaya vayaꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌna maiꞌnova kavaꞌmoꞌa kanale osiye.
Nagaemo, alagepa huta magokepi lokaeta maigune, huꞌna hapa paiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa apakaemo kame hisayafekeꞌmo hapauꞌniye.
Nagaemo avelega aulu heꞌna agesufiye. Haiyategatiꞌmo naha maesiya yaꞌmo afole aigiye.
Avelegatiꞌmo naha maesiya yaꞌmo afole oꞌaigifa Ala kava neꞌmo kokuꞌnaꞌe mopaꞌeꞌmo alo huꞌniya vekamokeꞌmo naha maegaiye.
Yagaino kateꞌnisigeka aeka halu vale lamika asagauka oꞌaigane. Yagaino nekateya vekamo au okalegaiye.
Afiyo, huꞌna, Isaleli vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya vekamoꞌa au maiꞌmai osuge au okalege huteno afaꞌa maiꞌneno yagaino maigiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa yagaino nekateya vekamo maiꞌniye. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa kahaopaleꞌmo he tino maiꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo auneꞌamoꞌa uluna vaino nekategeka ani ulunapiꞌmo neꞌmaine.
Felugamo yegemoꞌmo kaleno kasaga oligiye. Haniꞌilagamo kaimoꞌmo alino hosu huno okategaiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alu hosu kavaꞌe alu hosu kavatetiꞌeꞌmo alino hosu huno okatesiyafeꞌmo yagaino katesigeno kagupi mafaꞌnemo alagepa huno maigiye.
Nokamo ataleka visanagenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa yagaino katege atagi neka esanagenoꞌaeꞌmo yagaino katege huno yagaino kategaiye. Hemenimo yagaino nekateyanageno henagaꞌamo muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo yagaino katesigeka alagepa huka afaꞌa maige maige huka maigane.
Apakaemo, Ala kava neꞌmo noꞌafiꞌmo haigetao, huꞌa naha paiꞌnageꞌnaeꞌmo namogaga aiꞌnove.
Uta avaꞌyi huteta haita maiꞌnetaeꞌmo, O Yulusalemuo, huta, lagaemo eta kagae yafa lafi kegiꞌyafiꞌmo he tita maiꞌnone, huta nehune.
Yulusalemu taonimo kiꞌnageno magokepiꞌmo lokaeno alagepa huno haneꞌniye.
Muki nofi vayaꞌmo haiꞌa nefalae. Ala kava neꞌmo nofi vayaꞌamogimo Ala kava nefekeꞌmo hao ke hesayafeꞌmo Isaleli vayaꞌaifeꞌmo Goti geꞌamo afisayategamo haite haite huꞌa nehaiye.
Ani taonifiꞌmo Nevini nofi vayapati kini vayaꞌmogimo fai maiꞌneꞌa aliꞌa fako huꞌa neꞌapataya siaꞌapimo haneꞌniye.
Yulusalemu vayaꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌa falu huꞌa maisayafeꞌmo nunumu hutapa apateyo. Yulusalemu taonieꞌmo hapauꞌnisiya vayaꞌmogimo alagepa huꞌa maiyo.
Yafa lafi kegiꞌyafiꞌmo alagepa huꞌa magokepi lokaeꞌa maiyo. Kini vayaꞌmogi noꞌapifi noꞌapifiꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiyo.
Konagaꞌnimogiꞌe nafaluꞌnimogiꞌeꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maisayafeꞌmo huꞌnaeꞌmo, yafa lafi kegiyafiꞌmo alagepa huꞌa magokepi lokaeꞌa maiyo, huꞌna nunumu huꞌna neꞌapatove.
Ala kava neꞌmo Gotitimo noꞌaeꞌmo nagesa afiꞌnaeꞌmo agae taonimo alagepa huno hanesiyafeꞌmo nayamukiki huguve.
Kokuꞌnapi maiꞌnana Ala vekamogae, huꞌna, Nagaemo aliꞌna maku huꞌna nekagove.
Afiyo, huꞌna, Aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogimo aliꞌya aepa vekamo ayateꞌmo agege aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya aꞌmafaꞌnemogimo aliꞌya aepa a kanomo ayateꞌmo agege huꞌa maiꞌnaya kava huta Ala kava neꞌmo Gotitimofekeꞌmo ageme ageme neꞌvisunagenoꞌaeꞌmo hau huno lategaiye.
Vayaꞌmogimo muki afinaꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa huꞌa faipa huꞌa nelatae. Kahau huka lato, O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, kahau huka lato.
Muki afinaꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo lagaefeꞌmo, ina agufa vayaꞌmo maiꞌnae, huꞌa hapa nepaiye. Ala vayaꞌmo maiꞌnone, huꞌa nehaya vayaꞌmogimo lusi kava huꞌa huꞌa faipa huꞌa nelatae








Ala kava nefekeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa fatago nehaya vayaꞌmogimo Saiyoni avegana huꞌa maiꞌnae. Saiyoni avemoꞌa kanage kanaga osuno lokiya vaino nehaneya kava huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Avemoꞌmo Yulusalemu taonimo faino ku aino ateꞌniya kava huno Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa vayaꞌamo faino ku aino neꞌapateyanageno muki afinaꞌaeꞌmo faino ku aino apategaiye.
Hosu vayaꞌmogimo muki afinaꞌmo alagepa vayaꞌai mopaleꞌmo yagaiꞌa oꞌapategae. Alagepa vayaꞌmogimo hosu kavaꞌmo osisayafeꞌmo muki afinaꞌmo hosu vayaꞌmogi yagaiꞌa oꞌapategae.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, gekamo akame nehaya vayaꞌaitegamo kanale kavaꞌmo huvo.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alagepa kaꞌmo ataleꞌa kayagi kayaga kateꞌmo neꞌvaya vayaꞌmo apavalelino visigeꞌa hosu kavaꞌmo nehaya vayaꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa ugae. Isaleli vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa lapa maenagetapa yuna lapaipamo kalitapa maiyo.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hatu maeno lateteno Saiyoni kotegamo lavalelino eꞌnigetaeꞌmo alagamuna agegekana huta maiꞌnone.
Lusi kava huta kigi huteta lamogaga aita yoke huꞌnone. Alu nofi vayaꞌmogi, Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa lusi kava huno hapa maeꞌniye, huꞌa huꞌnae.
He, lusi kava huno laha maeꞌnigeta lamogaga aiꞌnone.
Aniꞌmo leno laneꞌniya ani kalokalopafiꞌmo koꞌmo neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo aniꞌmo nelamigeꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga neꞌaiya kava huta vayatimo hatu maeka apategetao lamogaga aino.
Avina yaꞌmo nehakalaya vayaꞌmogimo apaunu nelamiyanageꞌa henagaꞌamo neꞌyaꞌmo aliteꞌapaeꞌmo apamogaga aigae.
Mago vekamoꞌa avina yaꞌmo hakalesiyafeꞌmo alinino uꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo aunu nelamisiyaꞌmoꞌmo neꞌyaꞌamo alitenoꞌaeꞌmo amogaga aime aime egaiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hapa oꞌmaesiyaꞌmoꞌmo noꞌmo nekiya vayaꞌmogimo afa aliꞌyakeꞌmo aliteꞌa noꞌmo okigae. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa hapa oꞌmaesiyaꞌmoꞌmo taonifiꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogi afaꞌageꞌmo neꞌyagaisagenoꞌaeꞌmo taonifiꞌmo hosu kavaꞌmo afole aigiye.
Lapakaemo kotilamiyapiꞌmo lapaupatiꞌmo he titapa aliꞌyaꞌmo alime alime utapa haniꞌilagamo notapilegamo etapa avaꞌyi hutetapaeꞌmo lapaipamoꞌmo falu nosigetapa afa aliꞌyaꞌmo neꞌaligenoꞌaeꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo afole noꞌaiye. Alagepa yatapimo afole noꞌaiyaꞌmonanafa hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniya vayaꞌamo fiku hapa maeno neꞌapamigeꞌapaeꞌmo apau nekalae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa mafaꞌnemo fiku hapa maeno apamiꞌnigeꞌa aliꞌa neꞌapatae. Mafaꞌnemo alagepa miyakana huno neꞌapamiye.
Ati vekamoꞌa asole kevemo aliteno maiꞌnisiyana alagepa huno maisiya kava huno neya vekamoꞌa mafaꞌnemo alino apatesiyaꞌmoꞌmo ani kava huno alagepa huno maigiye.
Asole keve maleꞌnaya vayaꞌmo maiꞌnaya kava huꞌa asole mafaꞌnemo aliꞌa apateꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo apamogaga aigae. Kame vayaꞌapimogi agoti huꞌa apatesageꞌapaeꞌmo huꞌa aeꞌa apakasegae.
Muki vayaꞌmogi Ala kava nefekeꞌmo koli huge agae kateꞌmo uge huꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo Goti aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiꞌnayanageꞌa afaꞌa apamogaga aigae.
Kagaemo hoyakafatiꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo alika netekaeꞌmo kamogaga aika alagepa huka maigane.
Akamoꞌmo asole alagamo neꞌaeya nofikana huno nokafiꞌmo maigiye. Mafaꞌne anagakamogimo saufa olivi yosagana huꞌa maiꞌneꞌa hiꞌyalamukaleꞌmo faiꞌa ku aiꞌa kategae.
Afiyo, huꞌna, Ala kava nefekeꞌmo koli nehaya vayaꞌmogimo ani kava huꞌa alagepa huꞌa maigae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa Saiyoni taonifatiꞌmo kaha maeno. Muki afinaꞌmo ma mopafiꞌmo maiꞌnekaeꞌmo Yulusalemu taonifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo apakesanageꞌapaeꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiyo.
He, kagaemo mafaꞌnekamogimo aliꞌa apatesaya mafaꞌnemo afaꞌa apakesanafeꞌmo Gotiꞌa kaha maeno. Isaleli vayaꞌmo alagepa huꞌa maiyo.








Ala kava neo, huꞌna, muki yaꞌmoꞌa aino nati kaeꞌnigeꞌna afepilaga maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo kagaefekeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge nehuve.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, geꞌnimo afiyo. Naha mao, huꞌna keya aeꞌna ge nehuva geꞌnimo kagetafo huka afiyo.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, hosu kavatimo alika fako huka lateteka miyatimo lamiꞌnanesinana Ala kava nene, huꞌna, ina laꞌmo afaꞌa aeno kasalo paeyesine.
Magoke vekamoꞌa alagi aeno kasalo opaeyesinaꞌmonanafa kagaefeꞌmo koli huteꞌa mono hisayafeꞌmo hosu kavatimo alika neꞌatalane.
Nagaemo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa naha maesiyafeꞌmo agava maiꞌneꞌna geꞌaekeꞌmo nagesa afiteꞌna agava maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo navayagunagu nehuve.
Neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogi hani huꞌniya yaꞌmo hano hisigeno ha le yaꞌmo afole aisiyafeꞌmo nehapaigeꞌa agava neꞌmaiya kava huꞌna Ala kava nefeꞌmo magoꞌe huꞌna agava neꞌmauve. He, agava neꞌmaiya kava huꞌna aeꞌna apakaseꞌna Ala kava nefeꞌmo magoꞌe huꞌna agava neꞌmauve.
Isaleli vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava nefeꞌmo lapakesamo afitetapa lapa maesiyafeꞌmo lapavayagunagu hutapa maiyo. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa vayaꞌaeꞌmo hau huno neꞌapateyanageno olapatalegaiye. Agaemo muki alu hosu kavapatiꞌe alu hosu kavapatiꞌeꞌmo miya faino hatu maeno neꞌapateyaꞌmofeꞌmo ani kavafeꞌmo lapakesa afitetapa lapavayagunagu hutapa maiyo.
Agaemo agaiꞌa Isaleli vayaꞌamo muki alu hosu kavapatiꞌe alu hosu kavapatiꞌeꞌmo miya faino hatu maeno apategaiye.
Ala kava nene, huꞌna, nagufamo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna noꞌnatove. Aeꞌna apakaseꞌnova vekamo maiꞌnove, huꞌna nosuve. Nagaemo alopa aliꞌyafeꞌmo nagesa oꞌafige afaꞌa oꞌagesuva kavafeꞌmo nagesa oꞌafige nehuve.
Nahaꞌye nosigeno naipamoꞌmo falu nehiye. Itaꞌamoꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeno maiꞌneno nuꞌmo mo siꞌniya mafaꞌnegana huꞌna maiꞌnove. Naipamoꞌa nuꞌmo mo siꞌniya mafaꞌnegana huno haneꞌniye.
Isaleli nofi vayaꞌnimogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa afaꞌa laha maegaiye, hutetapa hemenigekeꞌmo aepa faitetapa muki afinaꞌae afinaꞌaeꞌmo lapakesamo afiyo.


















Apakeyo, huꞌna, Goti konaga vayaꞌamogimo magoke apaipa apakesamo aliteꞌa magokepi lokaeꞌa alagepa huꞌa maisaya kavaꞌapimoꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌmo amuse hisaya kavaꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Mani agufa alagepa kavaꞌmoꞌa alagepa atumo neꞌaiya uvelimo Gotiꞌa aliꞌyaꞌamo alisayafeꞌmo lekana paino apateꞌniya vayaꞌai apakufaleꞌmo faleꞌa neꞌapataya uveligana huno haneꞌniye. Eloniꞌa hogote vekamo mono huno neꞌapateya vekamo agenopafiꞌmo ani agufa uvelimo lakiꞌa ateꞌnageno emineno avenanapa ayokatetiꞌmo yatala kukenaꞌamo atupalegamo lamino kasaeꞌniye.
Alagepa huꞌa magokepi lokaeꞌa neꞌmaiya kavaꞌmoꞌa netepiꞌmo Hemoni aveleꞌe Saiyoni aveleꞌeꞌmo kahauleꞌmo lao yaꞌmo emineno nehaneya lao yakana huno haneꞌniye. Gotiꞌa magoke apaipa apakesamo aliteꞌa magokepi lokaeꞌa alagepa huꞌa neꞌmaiyategamo fiku hapa maeno neꞌapamiyanageꞌa alagepa huꞌa maige maige huꞌa maigae.
Muki vayaꞌamogitapamo afiyo, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌamo neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogitapamo haniꞌilagamo Ala kava neꞌmo noꞌafiꞌmo he titapa ala agiꞌamo amiyo.
Aote mono noꞌafatiꞌmo lapayaꞌmo alita asaga huliꞌnetapaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hutapa ateyo.
Kokuꞌnaꞌe ma mopaꞌeꞌmo alo huꞌniya Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa Saiyoni taonifatiꞌmo lapa maeno.
































































Ala kava nene, huꞌna, alagi nageka alagepa huka nageꞌnane.
Nagaemo itopaleꞌmo neꞌmaufi he tiꞌna neꞌmaufi huꞌna maiꞌnogekaeꞌmo neꞌnagane. Kagaemo afagitegamo maiꞌnekaeꞌmo nagesa neꞌafuva nagesamo neꞌnagane.
Umenitata huge havaege nehugekaeꞌmo nageteka muki nehuva kavaꞌnimo ago neꞌnagane.
Ge osuꞌnovaꞌmonanafa Ala kava nene, huꞌna, henagaꞌamo hisuva geꞌnimo ago ageꞌnane.
Yagaika ku aika nateteka nagaeteꞌmo kayaꞌmo maleka neꞌnatane.
Ago nageꞌnanana kagae kaipa kagesamoꞌmo nagae naipa nagesamo ago aeno agaseꞌniyanageꞌna afaꞌa oꞌagegauve.
Kagaetegatiꞌmo faiꞌna kasalo paetaleꞌna haiyategamo uguve. Maiꞌnanategamo uꞌna oꞌmaiꞌna naoteꞌmo maisuvafeꞌmo haiyategamo uguve.
Kokuꞌnapiꞌmo haiꞌna maisuvana maiꞌnane. Nagaemo faliꞌnaya vayaꞌmo uꞌa maiꞌnaya kotegamo lamiꞌna maiguvana maiꞌnane.
Yegemo hainenoꞌaeꞌmo hayomo neꞌaeya yaꞌmoꞌa afagitega mopa atupaleꞌmo malage huno neꞌviya kava huꞌna malage huꞌna afagitega uꞌna maiguvana maiꞌnane.
Afagitega uꞌna maiꞌnisugekaeꞌmo kayatetiꞌmo navalelika egane. Ani kava huka lamaga kayatetiꞌmo natafauka maigane.
Nagaemo, hani huka aika nati kao, huꞌna hisuvana hani huꞌniya yapiꞌmo ha le yakamoꞌa aeno ha leꞌnigeka neꞌnagane.
Hani huꞌnisiya yapiꞌmo uꞌna fala kisuvana nagegane. Yegemoꞌmo aeno ha neleya kava huno kagae kaulagaleꞌmo hanipiꞌmo aeno ha nele. Hani nehiya kavaꞌmoꞌmo kagae kaulagaleꞌmo ha le yakana huno haneꞌniye.
Muki nahau nayamopafiꞌmo haneꞌniya yaꞌaꞌnimo kagaikamo alo huꞌnanageno kagaika yaꞌmo haneꞌniye. Muki nagufafiꞌmo haneꞌniya yaꞌaꞌnimo alo huteka alika itaꞌnimo aipafiꞌmo magokepi maleꞌnane.
Kagaemo alagepa huka alo huka nateꞌnanaꞌmofeꞌmo koli huteꞌna kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga nehuve. Nagaetegamo huꞌnana kavaꞌmo ageteꞌnaeꞌmo nahau neꞌauve. Huꞌnana kavafeꞌmo alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌnane, huꞌna huteꞌna aliꞌna namalagiꞌnove.
Itaꞌnimo aipafiꞌmo maiꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo nayamufaꞌnimo afole aiteno kosime kosime uꞌnigeka nageꞌnane.
Itaꞌnimoꞌmo aipafatiꞌmo alino oꞌnateꞌniya afinaꞌmo muki nagufafiꞌmo haneꞌniya yaꞌaꞌnimo ago ageꞌnane. Ma mopafiꞌmo afole aiꞌna oꞌmaiꞌnogekaeꞌmo na magi afinaꞌmo ma mopafiꞌmo maisapi huka mukufiꞌmo ago avoꞌmo kae maleꞌnane.
Nagaefeꞌmo kagesamo neꞌafina kavakamoꞌmo aeto agufa kanale yaꞌmo haneꞌnigeno neꞌnahaiye. Nagaefeꞌmo kagesamo neꞌafina kavaꞌmo lusi asole kavaꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Lekana paiguvana ani kahaepaleꞌmo aise yafaꞌmo ago aeno agaseꞌniya agufa yaꞌmo haneꞌniye. Naupatiꞌmo he tiꞌnaeꞌmo kagaeꞌekeꞌmo maiꞌnoꞌae.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, hosu vayaꞌmo apamagisanafeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye. Kaveta nehapaya vayaꞌmo nataleꞌa visayafeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.
Apakaemo kagaefeꞌmo hosu gemo huteꞌa huꞌa faipa huꞌa nekatae.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Apaini huꞌa nekataya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo naini huꞌna neꞌapatove. Apakameꞌyamo nekamiya vayaꞌai apaulagafiꞌmo navenatuꞌna heꞌna neꞌapatove.
Nagaemo apakaefeꞌmo alagi oꞌnahauꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo, kame vayaꞌnie, huꞌna nehuve.
O Gotiyo, huꞌna, naipa nagesafiꞌmo alagepa huka alika fako huka nago. Naipa nagesafiꞌmo aulu haeka ago.
Naipafiꞌmo hosu kavaꞌnimo haneꞌnifigi ageteka alagepa huꞌna maige maige huꞌna maisuva kateꞌmo navalelika uvo.



























































Gotiꞌnimogamo kini neꞌnimogae, huꞌna, kagaefekeꞌmo ala vekamo maiꞌnane, huꞌna huguve. Muki afinaꞌmo kahao ke hege hege huꞌna kahao ke hegauve.
Muki afinaꞌae afinaꞌaeꞌmo kahao ke hegauve. Muki afinaꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huge huge huꞌna maiguve.
Ala kava neꞌmo ala neꞌmo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa atesaya vekamo maiꞌniye. Ala agiꞌamo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ageta aeto osugune.
Itaꞌapi afoꞌapimogimo huꞌnana kavafeꞌmo, lusi alagepa kavaꞌmo huꞌniye, huꞌa aliꞌa apatesaya mafaꞌneꞌapieꞌmo kava gemo huꞌa hapa paitesageꞌapaeꞌmo apakaemo henagaꞌamo aliꞌa apatesaya mafaꞌneꞌapieꞌmo kava gemo huꞌa hapa paite hapa paite huliꞌa ugae.
Apakaemo kagaefeꞌmo huꞌapaeꞌmo, ha le konali yaꞌagi ala agiꞌagi huno haneꞌniya vekamo maiꞌniye, huꞌa hisageꞌnaeꞌmo nagaeꞌeꞌmo aeto agufa kanale kavakaeꞌmo nagesa afifi huꞌna maiguve.
Vayaꞌmogi lokiya kavaꞌmo nehana kavakaeꞌmo kava gemo hisageꞌnaeꞌmo nagaeꞌeꞌmo, ala vekamo maiꞌniye, huꞌna huguve.
Apakaemo kanale alagepa kavaꞌmo nehana kavafeꞌmo kava gemo huꞌa hapa paige fatago kavakaeꞌmo yokemo huge huꞌa maigae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa fiku laha maeno lamige hau huno latege malage huno aipamo leno olatege hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauge huno neꞌmaiye.
Agaemo muki vayaꞌaitegamo alagepa kavaꞌmo huteno muki alo hu maleꞌniya yategaꞌeꞌmo hau huno neꞌapate.
O Ala kava nene, huꞌna, muki alo huꞌnana vayaꞌmogiꞌe yaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hugae. Muki vayakamogimo kahao ke hegae.
Apakaemo muki vayaꞌmogimo lokiya kavaꞌmo nehana kavakaꞌe ha le konali yakaletiꞌmo neꞌyagaina kavakaleꞌefeꞌmo ava gemo afisayafeꞌmo neꞌyagaina kavafeꞌmo, lokiya himamuꞌaletiꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo nehiye, huꞌa hugae.
<range>
Muki afinaꞌmo yagaige yagaige huka yagaigane. Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa, ma kavaꞌmo huguve, huno huꞌniya gemo akame huno ani kavaꞌmo nehiye. Muki kavaꞌamo alagepa kavaꞌageꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Agaemo hanageke yaꞌmo neꞌaliya vayaꞌmo hapa maege asagauꞌa aiꞌnaya vayaꞌmo alino he tino apatege huno neꞌmaiye.
Muki afaꞌa neꞌmaiya yaꞌmogiꞌe vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo apaka neteya afinaꞌmo kagaefeꞌmo apakesamo neꞌafigekaeꞌmo neꞌyaꞌmo neꞌapamine.
Hapauꞌnigekaeꞌmo neꞌapamine.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa muki afinaꞌmo ani kava nehunoꞌaeꞌmo fatago kavaꞌmo huge yagu yaga kavaꞌmo huge nehiye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaefeꞌmo apaipafatiꞌmo keya aeꞌa ge nehaya vayaꞌai hapaopaleꞌmo eno neꞌmaiye.
Agaefeꞌmo koli huꞌneꞌa mono nehaya vayaꞌaitegamo hapauꞌnisiya kavaꞌmo afaꞌa hugiye. Keya aeꞌa ge nehagenoꞌaeꞌmo apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaefeꞌmo hapau apayamofiꞌmo hapauꞌniya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapategeꞌa afaꞌa neꞌmaiye. Afaꞌa neꞌmaiyaꞌmonanafa muki hosu vayaꞌmo alino apagoꞌya lagauno apatalegaiye.
Muki afinaꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huꞌna ategauve. Muki afinaꞌmo muki afaꞌa neꞌmaiya yaꞌmogiꞌe vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo aote agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga hiyo.





















































Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo. Mono noꞌafiꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo. Kokuꞌnapi himamuꞌalefeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo.
Himamuꞌaletiꞌmo huꞌniya kavatefeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo. Magoꞌe huno hogote vekamo maiꞌniya kava hutapa magoꞌe hutapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo.
Pikulimo nehutapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo. Alu agufa gita alu agufa gitamo neꞌamagitapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo.
Yaveꞌyamo neꞌamagitapa lapaiyamo aetapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo. Gita neꞌamagitapa kapufa gemo hutapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo.
Veloꞌmo neꞌamagitapa alopa gefatiꞌmo hutapa agiꞌaleꞌmo alitapa asaga hiyo.
Lapavamusamo neꞌaiya vayaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo. He, Ala kava neꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo alita asaga hiyo.

















































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Mani yokemo Salomoniꞌa avoꞌmo kae maleꞌniya yokemoꞌmo muki yokeꞌamo ago aeno agaseꞌniye.
Nagaefeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavaꞌmoꞌa alagepa nofi alagafati aniꞌmoꞌa nehiya agufa hagaꞌamo ago aeno agaseꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo yafayaꞌmo huka natesanafeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye.
Asole alagepa atumo neꞌaiya uveliletiꞌmo kagufaleꞌmo fale maleꞌnanageno kagufalegatiꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiye. Kagikamoꞌmo alagepa atuꞌmo neꞌaiya aniꞌmo aino lakiꞌniya anikana huno haneꞌneno alagepa atumo neꞌaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo veꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa ohavaeꞌnaya aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌmogimo kagaefeꞌmo hapau apayamopafiꞌmo nehapaiye.
Kagaemo nayate heka navayu hulika neꞌegetao lagaemo nagu nagu huta eta kakame huta ugune. Kini vekamoꞌa navalelino uno noꞌafiꞌmo maisuvafeꞌmo nateꞌniye. Kao vayaꞌmogitamo kagaefekeꞌmo lamogaga aiteta amuse hugune. Apakaemo alagepa nofi alagafati anifeꞌmo apakesamo afiꞌa apamogaga neꞌaiyaꞌmonanafa lagaefeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavafekeꞌmo lagesa afifi huta lamogaga aigune. Fatago vayaꞌmogi kagaefekeꞌmo hapau apayamopafiꞌmo nehapaiye.
Yulusalemu aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌmogitapae, huno, nagufaꞌamo anupa nagufamo haneꞌniyaꞌmonanafa kanale nagufaꞌe a kanomo maiꞌnove. Nagaemo Keta vayaꞌai seli noꞌapigana huꞌna maiꞌnovaꞌmonanafa Salomoniꞌa alagepa lavolavomo asai maleꞌniya lavolavogana huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Anupa nagufamo haneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo afa a kanoe, hutapa oꞌnageyo. Yegemoꞌmo naleno alino ani agufa nagufamo kalino nateꞌniye. Itaꞌnimoꞌa ve mafaꞌne anagaꞌamogi apaipamo leꞌa nateteꞌapaeꞌmo, uka nofi hoyatileꞌmo yagaiyo, huꞌa naha paiꞌnae. Vaehae, nagaiꞌni hoyanileꞌmo alagepa huꞌna oꞌyagaiꞌnove.
Lusi kava huno nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimogae, huꞌna, sipisipi anagakamo haiyategamo apavalelika uka neꞌyaꞌmo alika neꞌapamine. Yegemo haineno namotule neꞌaeya afinaꞌmo haiyategamo apavalelika uka neꞌapatanageꞌa maiꞌa falu nehae. Naha paigeꞌnao hosu kavanageꞌna kaꞌmo ataleꞌna kavagi vayaꞌai sipisipiꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌna maino.
Alagepa kanale a kanomogae, huno, muki aꞌne anagaꞌmo ago aeka apakaseꞌnane. Ani kotegamo oꞌageꞌnisanaꞌmoꞌmo sipisipi anagaꞌai apaiyakamo alinika aise meme anagakamo apavalelika uka sipisipileꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌai seli no haopaleꞌmo uka neꞌyaꞌmo alika apamiyo.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimogae, huno, Kagaemo Kini vekamo Felo hosi anagaꞌamogi kame hisayafeꞌmo talalamo halauliꞌa neꞌvaya hosigana huka maiꞌnane.
Muki kayokateꞌmo haneꞌniya konali yakamoꞌa kaugosafiꞌmo aeno ha nele. Kagaemo kanale sesumo lugokafiꞌmo huka aliꞌnanageno alagepa huno aeno ha nele.
Lagaemo konali yakamo goli yafatetiꞌmo alo huge siluva yafatetiꞌmo alo huge huteta kamigune.
Kini vekaꞌnimo hiꞌyalamuꞌaleꞌmo siateꞌmo fai maiꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo fale maleꞌnova aniꞌmoꞌa alagepa atuꞌamoꞌmo aino atagu nefae.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimoꞌa meya hayafatiꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiya anikana huno maiꞌneno muki haniꞌilagamo nuꞌnilaꞌmogani folagapiꞌmo havaegaiye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimoꞌa Enigeti kotegatiꞌmo nofi hoyafatiꞌmo yosa ausemoꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yosa ausegana huno maiꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimogae, huno, vae, alagepa kanale a kanomo maiꞌnane. He, alagepa kanale a kanomo maiꞌnane. Kaulagamoꞌa kaugoꞌyavemo aulagagana huno haneꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimogae, huꞌna, Vae, alagepa kanale vekamo maiꞌnane. He alagepa kanale vekamo maiꞌnane. Hipatiꞌamo alino hegafa hu maleꞌniye.
Nokotiꞌaleꞌmo kanale yosamo haneꞌniye. Yofo yosamo sita yosamo haneꞌnigeno hanae yosamo paini yosamo haneꞌniye.
Nagaemo Salonigayaga yahaofatiꞌmo kahaumoꞌa haesa ausemo neheya ausegana huꞌna maige ave aiyamo folagapiꞌmo haneꞌniya yaveyave kahaumo ausegana huꞌna maige huꞌna maiꞌnove.
Aufe kahaumo haneꞌniya folagapiꞌmo kanale yaveyave kahaumo ausemo haneꞌniya kava huno nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimoꞌmo aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌai folagapiꞌmo maiꞌniye.
Alagepa alagamo neꞌaeya yosamo yahaofilaga yosamo haneꞌniya folagapiꞌmo haneꞌniya kava huno nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo ve mafaꞌne anagaꞌai folagapiꞌmo maiꞌniye. Nagaemo lusi yegemo nelegeꞌnaeꞌmo ani yosamo ulunapiꞌmo itopaleꞌmo maiꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo lusi kava huꞌna namogaga aiꞌnove. Ani yosa alagamo lagiꞌna neꞌnogeno navayafilagatiꞌmo lusi kava huno hagaꞌage neꞌnahaiye.
Agaemo alopa neꞌyaꞌmo neꞌnaya noꞌafiꞌmo navalelino haino nagaefeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniya kavatefeꞌmo kalahauꞌmeꞌmo nagenopaleꞌmo asai maleꞌniye.
Nagaefeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo lokiyaꞌnimo alagi ohaneꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo nofi alagafati aniꞌmo alika namiteka alika lokiya vaika nato. Alagepa apoli alagamo alika namigeꞌna neꞌna falu hino.
Hoga ayatetiꞌmo nageyutega maleteno lamaga ayatetiꞌmo nagufaleꞌmo natafauno maiꞌniye.
Yulusalemu aꞌmafaꞌne anagane, huꞌna, lokiya gefatiꞌmo huꞌnaeꞌmo, afela afumogimo koli huteꞌa apaune nehaya afu anagaꞌmogi nehaya kavafeꞌmo lapakesamo afitetapa nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimo aupatiꞌmo haunetapa oꞌateyo. Agaiꞌamo hauꞌninageno aupatiꞌmo he tigiye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo agemo afiꞌnove. Agaemo aeno hailo hailo hulino nagu nagu huno avelegamo neꞌe.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimoꞌa kanale afela afugana huno nagu nagu hulino neꞌe. Ago eno kumateꞌmo he tino maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo aise yasi katetiꞌmo nopilagamo aulu heno ageꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimoꞌa naha paiꞌniye. Agaemo naha painoꞌaeꞌmo, Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimo alagepa kanale aꞌnimogae, huno, he tika kumatega emikeka nagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeka eno.
Kagaemo yasi kofeꞌmo koli osuvo. Koꞌmo neꞌaiya afinaꞌmo ago hano huꞌniye.
Hemenimo muki haopalegamo kahau ausemo ago heꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo nama anagaꞌmogimo yoke nehae. Kaugoꞌyave anagaꞌmogimo yoke huꞌnageꞌapaeꞌmo muki haopalegatiꞌmo vayatimogimo neꞌafiye.
Fiki yosamoꞌa aepa faino alagamo aeꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo nofiꞌmoꞌa ausemo heꞌnigeno alagepa atumo neꞌaiye. Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimo alagepa kanale aꞌnimogae, huno, he tika egetaꞌao uguꞌae.
Kaugoꞌyave namaꞌnimo yafakapiꞌmo maiꞌnane. Aulafi kateꞌmo haika fala kika maiꞌnane. Kanale kaugosamo alika nave ligeꞌna ageno. Kagemo alagepa kagemo haneꞌnigi kage aigeꞌna afino.
Aise afela kala anagaꞌmo apatafauka apanu kiyo. Fiku yanageꞌa hoyatifiꞌmo haiꞌeꞌa nofiꞌmo aliꞌa hosu huꞌa ategae. Nofitimoꞌa saufa alagamo aeꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmae.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekamo nagaiꞌni vekaꞌnimo maiꞌnigeꞌna agaiꞌa aꞌamo maiꞌnove. Agaemo sipisipi anagaꞌamo apavalelino uꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo kanale yaveyave kahaumoꞌmo ause heꞌniya folagapatiꞌmo kahaumo neꞌnae.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimogae, huꞌna, oꞌnataleka malage huka aika atagineka eka alino fako huno laꞌateꞌniya avelegamo haikeka kanale afela afugana huka nagu nagu huka egetaꞌao nagaeꞌeꞌmo maime maime neꞌvisuꞌagenoꞌaeꞌmo kotisigenoꞌaeꞌmo hani huꞌniya kavaꞌmo hano hino.
Haniꞌilagamo hipaꞌnileꞌmo havaeꞌneꞌnaeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnieꞌmo kahauya huꞌnovaꞌmonanafa oꞌageꞌnove.
Nagaemo he tiꞌna taonifiꞌmo uꞌneꞌna huꞌna muki kaꞌaleꞌmo kahauya huꞌna agegauve, huꞌna nagesamo afiꞌnove. Nagaemo kahauya huꞌnovaꞌmonanafa oꞌageꞌnove.
Uꞌneꞌna nehugeꞌapaeꞌmo taonifiꞌmo uꞌeꞌa huꞌa neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogimo neꞌnagageꞌnaeꞌmo, Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo ageꞌnafiye, huꞌna apafi geꞌnove.
Nagaemo apataleꞌna uvategamo malage huꞌna neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo ageꞌnove. Nagaemo agaetegamo uꞌnaeꞌmo agaemo natalesiyafeꞌmo oꞌnahauꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo anu kiꞌna maiꞌnove. Oꞌataleꞌna avaleliꞌnuꞌna alino nateꞌniya itaꞌnimoꞌmo nehavaeya yapilagamo utaꞌa haiꞌnoꞌae.
Yulusalemu aꞌmafaꞌne anagane, huꞌna, lokiya gefatiꞌmo huꞌnaeꞌmo, afela afumogimo koli huꞌa apaune nehaya afu anagaꞌmogi nehaya agufa kavafeꞌmo lapakesamo afitetapa nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekamo aupatiꞌmo haunetapa oꞌateyo. Agaiꞌamo hauꞌninageno aupatiꞌmo he tigiye.
Ageyo. Ina laꞌmo yahaofilagamo aniꞌmo ohaneꞌniya kotegatiꞌmo haine neꞌe. Maketiletiꞌmo miya nefaiya laꞌnefamo atafiꞌmo nekaya afinaꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaigeno halinaꞌamoꞌmo posigana huno haneꞌneno halinamo ailinuno nehaiya kava huno haine neꞌe.
Ageyo, huꞌna, Mago vayaꞌmogi Salomoni siamo aliniꞌa neꞌae. Sigisitiꞌa Isaleli ati vayaꞌmo koli nosaya lokiya ati vayaꞌmogimo faiꞌa ku aiꞌa ateliꞌa neꞌae.
Muki vayaꞌamogimo kame nehaya kavaꞌmo ageꞌa alagepa huꞌnaya vayaꞌmogi naipeꞌapimo aliniꞌa neꞌae. Haniꞌilagamo afole neꞌaiya kavafeꞌmo koli nehayaꞌmofeꞌmo naipeꞌapimo apaluteꞌmo maleꞌnae.
Kini vekamo Salomoniꞌa Lemanoni kotegati aliꞌnaya alagepa yosaletiꞌmo alini uꞌeꞌa nehaya siaꞌamo mago aise nokana huno kiꞌniye.
Agaemo siluva yafatetiꞌmo posiꞌamo alo huge goli yafatetiꞌmo afeꞌalumelagaꞌamo alo huge huno alo huteno haesa lavolavoletiꞌmo aino ati kae maleꞌniye. Yulusalemu aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌaifeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniya kavatetiꞌmo yuꞌilagaꞌamo alagepa huno alo huꞌniye.
Saiyoni aꞌmafaꞌne anagane, huꞌna, lapakaemo etapa kini vekamo Salomoniꞌmo ageyo. Agaemo agenopaleꞌmo kini kakolitamo haneꞌniye. Kini vekamo Salomoniꞌa aꞌmo aliꞌniya afinaꞌmo lusi kava huno amogaga aiꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo itaꞌamoꞌmo ani kakolitamo alino agenopaleꞌmo maleno ateteno kini vekamo lekana paino ateꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimogae, huno, vae, alagepa kanale a kanomo maiꞌnane. He, alagepa kanale a kanomo maiꞌnane. Kaulagamoꞌa kaugoꞌyavemo aulagagana huno haneꞌnigeno kanale kayokaꞌmoꞌa aino ati kaeꞌniye. Kayokaꞌmoꞌa meme anagaꞌmogi Gileyati avelegatiꞌmo magokepi lokaeliꞌa nelamiya meme anagaꞌai apayokakana huno haneꞌniye.
Muki kaveꞌamoꞌmo yaveyave sipisipi anagaꞌmogi apayokaꞌmo magoke aiyaya huꞌa lagauꞌa apateteꞌa hemenimo aniꞌmo faleꞌa apateꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo apayokaꞌmoꞌa yaveyaveꞌage nehiya kava huno kaveꞌmoꞌa yaveyaveꞌageꞌmo nehiye. Mani muki sipisipi anagaꞌmogimo lagoꞌya apanaꞌaumo maleꞌnae. Mago anamo sipisipimo oꞌmaiꞌnae.
Kavayamo kanale haesa nofikana huno haneꞌnigeka alagepa kagemo neꞌaine. Kayokaꞌmoꞌa aino ati kaeꞌniya kagesa aepaleꞌmo mago yosamo agiꞌamo pamagalanati alagamo aino apalo atiꞌniya yosa alagagana huno haneꞌniye.
Lugokamoꞌa kini vekamo Neviniꞌa kame nehiya yaꞌamo maleꞌniya noꞌmo yatala vegovego nokana huno haneꞌniye. Ani nopiꞌmo lokiya kame nehaya vayaꞌai haleguꞌapimo tauseniꞌa haleguꞌmo asai maleꞌnae.
Lole nukalaꞌmoꞌa kanale lagoꞌya afela afulaꞌmoganimo yaveyave kahaumo ausemo haneꞌniya folagapatiꞌmo kahaumo neꞌnaꞌa afulakana huno haneꞌniye.
Nagaemo alagepa atu neꞌaiya yosamo haneꞌniya avefiꞌmo haiꞌna maime maime neꞌvisugenoꞌaeꞌmo kotisigenoꞌaeꞌmo hani huꞌniya kavaꞌmo hano hugiye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimogae, huno, alagepa kanale a kanomo maiꞌnane. Oꞌaniꞌya faifa yaꞌmo kagaeteꞌmo ohaneꞌniye.
Aꞌnimogae, huno, kagaemo nagaeꞌeꞌmo Lemanoni aveletiꞌmo ataleka ugetaꞌao. Amana avelegatiꞌmo agege Sena avelegatiꞌmo agege Hemoni avelegatiꞌmo agege huka ago. Ani loleꞌe magoꞌe avefiꞌmo Laiyoni anagaꞌe Laiyonigana huꞌa maiꞌnaya afela pusi anagaꞌeꞌmo maiꞌnae.
Nasaꞌnimogamo aꞌnimae, huno, kagaemo aiseꞌatoꞌamo nagaemo aulu nahaeka neꞌnaganagenoꞌaeꞌmo naipafiꞌmo lusi kava huno nahaꞌye huꞌniye. Nagaemo lugokamo ageteꞌnaeꞌmo kagaeteꞌmo asagauꞌna neꞌauve.
Nasaꞌnimogamo aꞌnimae, huno, Nagaefeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavaꞌmoꞌa alagepa kanale kavaꞌmo haneꞌniye. Ani kahauꞌniya kavakamo hagaꞌamoꞌmo nofi alagafati aniꞌmo nehiya hagaꞌamo alagi ago aeno agaseꞌniye. Ani nefalana aniꞌmoꞌa alagepa atuꞌamoꞌmo muki alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌmo atuꞌamo ago aeno agaseꞌniye.
O aꞌnimogae, huno, Kavayafatiꞌmo kevegeve anumo asagauno neꞌaiye. Kavenafuꞌnamo afeꞌalumelaga kevegevemo anuꞌe nuꞌanuꞌeꞌmo haneꞌniye. Kukenakalegatiꞌmo alagepa atumo Lemanoni avefatiꞌmo neꞌaiya agufa alagepa atumo neꞌaiye.
Nasaꞌnimoꞌmo maige aꞌnimo maige huno maiꞌniya aꞌnimoꞌa hoyaleꞌmo kegiꞌyamoꞌa faino ku aiꞌniya hoyagana huno maige keli kotupi aniꞌmo muki vayaꞌmogimo oꞌnesayafeꞌmo ka akani maleꞌniya keli kotupi anikana huno maige aniꞌmo kanage kanage huno haine neꞌeya aniteꞌmo loki ae maleꞌniya anikana huno maige huno maiꞌniye.
Kagae hoyafati yosamoꞌmo alagepa alagamo neꞌae. Haga atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌmo nehage. Magoꞌaletiꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌmo alo huge haga neꞌyaꞌmo alo huge laꞌnefamo atafi kageno halinamo neꞌaigenoꞌaeꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiya laꞌnefamo alo huge huꞌa alo nehae.
<range>
Kagaemo kanage kanage huno haine neꞌeya aniꞌmoꞌa muki hoyafilagamo nelamiya anikana huka maige Lemanoni avefatiꞌmo emine neꞌeya anikana huka maige huka maiꞌnane.
Hoga haopalegatiꞌmo yasimo alinika eno. Lamaga haopalegatiꞌmo yasimo alinikeka hoyaꞌnifiꞌmo aligenoꞌao alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌmoꞌa muki haopalegamo ailino uneno hino. Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimoꞌa hoyaꞌafatiꞌmo eno alagepa yosa alagamo lagino neno.
Nasaꞌnimogamo aꞌnimogae, huno, Nagaemo hoyaꞌnilegamo ago eꞌna alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌmo agiꞌamo meyaꞌe mago alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌeꞌmo aliꞌna anupa huꞌnove. Nagaemo kevegevemo aliꞌna anoꞌaꞌe anuꞌaꞌeꞌmo neꞌnove. Nagaemo nuꞌanuꞌe nofi alagafati aniꞌeꞌmo aliꞌna neꞌnove. Nao vayaꞌnimogitapae, huno, alitapa neyo. Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vayaꞌnimogitapae, huno, He, aniꞌmo alita netapa lapamu hiyo.
Haniꞌilagamo nau kaleꞌnovaꞌmonanafa nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌa auꞌmo okaleno afaꞌa maiꞌniye. Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo agemo afiꞌnove. Kitaꞌnileꞌmo hakalu hakalu huteno, Nasaꞌnimogamo nahau nayamopafi aꞌnimogae, huno, Kitamo yakika nato. Haniꞌilagamo aniꞌmoꞌa emineno nagenopafiꞌmo aniꞌmo faleno nateꞌnigeno nayokapiꞌmo lao yaꞌmo emineno havai teꞌniye, huno naha paiꞌniye.
Nagaemo kukenaꞌnimo ago asagiꞌna ataleꞌnovanageꞌna halate haiya kava huꞌna aliꞌna vaiguve. Nagaemo naiyaꞌnimo ago sese hu maleꞌnovanageꞌna halate he tiꞌna uꞌneꞌna hisugeno naiyaꞌnileꞌmo oꞌaniꞌya faigiye, huꞌna ha paiꞌnove.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimoꞌa kitamo alita neꞌyakuna yateꞌmo ayaꞌmo aliꞌnigeꞌna ageteꞌnaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo he tiꞌniye.
Nagaemo kitamo yakiꞌna atesuvafeꞌmo he tiꞌna kitamo alita neꞌyakuna yaꞌaleꞌmo nayaꞌmo neꞌalugenoꞌaeꞌmo meya aniꞌmo alagepa atu neꞌaiya aniꞌmo nayate haneꞌniya aniꞌmoꞌa kita alita neꞌyakuna yaꞌaleꞌmo aeno kamaeꞌniye.
Nagaemo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo kita yakiꞌna ateꞌnovaꞌmonanafa ago utegeꞌna nagaemo oꞌageꞌnove. Nagaemo huꞌniya geꞌaeꞌmo nagesamo neꞌafugenoꞌaeꞌmo naipamoꞌmo alagi hosuꞌniye. Nagaemo agaefeꞌmo kahauya huꞌnovaꞌmonanafa oꞌageꞌnove. Nagaemo keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnovaꞌmonanafa agaemo geꞌnileꞌmo aeno atagaina huno ge osuꞌniye.
Umenitata nehuꞌa taonifiꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogi nageteꞌapaeꞌmo namagiꞌa nagufamo aiꞌa atalagauꞌnae. Yafa lafi kegiꞌyaleꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogi naugosafiꞌmo aiꞌna ati kaeꞌna neꞌaluva lavolavoꞌnimo aliꞌnae.
Yulusalemu aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌmogitapae, huno, Lapakaemo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo agetapaeꞌmo agaefeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo lokiyaꞌnimo ohaneꞌniye, hutapa ha paiyo, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Alagepa kanale a kanomo maiꞌneka muki aꞌne anagaꞌmo ago aeka apakaseꞌnana a kanomogae, huꞌa, kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya vekamo haiya kava huno maiꞌneno muki hapau apayamopafiꞌmo nehapaiya vayaꞌmo aeno apakaseꞌniye. Haiya kava huno maiꞌneno muki hapau apayamopafiꞌmo nehapaiya vayaꞌmo aeno apakaseno maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo lokiya gefatiꞌmo hiyo, huka laha paine, huꞌa ha paiꞌnae.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo yaveyave augosamo hanege haesa augosamo hanege huno haneꞌniye. Agaemo asole tauseniꞌa vayaꞌmo ago aeno apakaseꞌniye.
Agenopamoꞌmo hogote goli yafakana huno leꞌnigeno ayokakuꞌmo kanale alopa ayokakuꞌmo mago anupa namamo ayokagana huno haneꞌniye.
Aulagamoꞌmo kaugoꞌyave nama anagaꞌmogi nuꞌmo anuletiꞌmo aniꞌmo faleꞌa uꞌa ani agiꞌnaleꞌmo he tiꞌa maiꞌnaya namagana huno haneꞌniye.
Agalametalegatiꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yosamo aise yosamo hiꞌyalamuteꞌmo haneꞌniya yosagana huno hanege kahaumo ausemo aulafilega haneꞌniya kahaumo ausegana huno hanege huno haneꞌniye. Avayamo kanale kahaumo ausegana huno haneꞌnigeno avayafatiꞌmo alagepa atumo neꞌaiya aniꞌmo meya aniꞌmo lape tape huno asagauno neꞌaiye.
Ayatalaꞌmoꞌa goli linimo apayateꞌmo neꞌvaiya linigana huno haneꞌniye. Alopa moniletiꞌmo miya nefaiya yafaꞌmo aeno ha neleya yafaꞌmo apayateꞌmo neꞌvaiya linifiꞌmo neꞌmalaya linigana huno haneꞌniye. Agufamoꞌa elefeni afumo avekana huno haneꞌnigeno agufalegatiꞌmo yaveyaveꞌage huteno aeno ha leꞌniye.
Aiyaꞌalaꞌmo kanale yaveyave yafatetiꞌmo alo nehaya posilaꞌmo golilateꞌmo aeꞌa he tiꞌa ateꞌnageno haneꞌniya posigana huno haneꞌniye. Agaemo Lemanoni avegana huno maige alagepa sita yosagana huno maige huno maiꞌniye.
Avayafatiꞌmo haga huꞌniye. He, muki agufaꞌamo alagepa agufamo haneꞌniye. Yulusalemu aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌmogitapae, huꞌna, Agaemo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo maige nao vekaꞌnimo maige huno maiꞌniye, huꞌna lapa paiꞌnove, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Alagepa kanale a kanomo maiꞌneka muki aꞌne anagaꞌmo ago aeka apakaseꞌnana a kanomogae, huꞌa, Kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya vekamo haiyategamo uno maiꞌniye. Lagaemo kagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeta kahauya huta agesunafeꞌmo haiya kateꞌmo uꞌniye, huꞌa afi geꞌnae.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo hoyaꞌafiꞌmo uno maiꞌniye. Agaemo sipisipi anagaꞌamo hoyaꞌafatiꞌmo nesayafeꞌmo apavalelino uꞌniye. Agaemo kanale yaveyave kahau ausemo alino anupa huno malesiyafeꞌmo hoyaꞌafiꞌmo uno maiꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniya vekamo nagaiꞌni vekaꞌnimo maiꞌnigeꞌna agaiꞌa aꞌamo maiꞌnove. Agaemo sipisipi anagaꞌamo apavalelino uꞌnigeꞌa kanale yaveyave kahaumoꞌmo ausemo heꞌniya folagapatiꞌmo kahaumo neꞌnae, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya aꞌnimogae, huno, vae, kanale taonimo Tilisi taonigana huka maiꞌnane. Kanale taonimo Yulusalemu taonigana huka maiꞌnane. Asole ati vayaꞌmogimo asole kalahauꞌmeꞌmo aliniꞌa neꞌvageꞌa apaketeꞌapaeꞌmo hapau neꞌaiya asole ati vayakana huka maiꞌnane.
Aulu nahaeka oꞌnago. Kaulagamoꞌmo ago aeno nagaseꞌnigeꞌna kagaefeꞌmo neꞌnahaiye. Kayokaꞌmoꞌa meme anagaꞌmogi Gileyati avelegatiꞌmo magokepi nelamiya meme anagaꞌai apayokakana huno haneꞌniye.
Muki kaveꞌakamoꞌmo yaveyave sipisipi anagaꞌmo hemenimo aniꞌmo faleꞌa apateꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo apayokaꞌmoꞌa yaveyaveꞌageꞌmo nehiya kava huno kaveꞌmoꞌa yaveyaveꞌageꞌmo nehiye. Mani muki sipisipi anagaꞌmogimo lagoꞌya apanaꞌaumo maleꞌnae. Mago anamo sipisipimo oꞌmaiꞌnae.
Kayokaꞌmoꞌa kagesa aepaleꞌmo aino ati kaeꞌniya kagesa aepamoꞌmo mago yosamo agiꞌamo pamagalanati yosa alagamo aino apalo atiꞌniya yosa alagagana huno haneꞌniye.
Kini vekamo aꞌne anagaꞌmo asole aꞌne anagaꞌmo maiꞌnae. Sigisitiꞌa kuvini aꞌne anagaꞌmo maige henaga aꞌne anagaꞌamo eitiꞌamo maige lekana opaisuna agufa alu aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌmo aliꞌniya aꞌne anagaꞌamo maige huꞌa maiꞌnae.
Maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa kaugoꞌyave namaꞌnimoꞌa aeno apakaseno haino hapaiꞌniye. Asole aꞌne anagaꞌmo maiꞌnayaꞌmonanafa aꞌnimo magokeꞌageꞌmo maiꞌniye. Itaꞌamoꞌmo magoke aꞌmafaꞌneꞌamo maiꞌniye. Alino ateꞌniya itaꞌamoꞌmo, hogote aꞌmafaꞌneꞌnimo maiꞌniye, huno agesamo afiꞌniye. Muki aꞌmafaꞌne anagaꞌmogi ageteꞌapaeꞌmo hao ke heꞌnae. Kuvini aꞌne anagaꞌmogiꞌe kini vekamo alu aꞌne anagaꞌamogiꞌeꞌmo agiꞌaleꞌmo aliꞌa asaga huꞌa ateꞌnae.
Aulu neꞌnahaeya a kanomo ina laꞌae. Kaimoꞌa alagepa huno aeno ha lege yegemoꞌa alagepa huno aeno ha lege huno aeno ha neleya kava huno aulu neꞌnahae. Asole ati vayaꞌmogimo asole kalahauꞌmeꞌmo aliniꞌa neꞌvageꞌa apaketeꞌapaeꞌmo hapau neꞌaiya ati vayakana huno maiꞌniye, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Nagaemo kagoꞌmufilagatiꞌmo neꞌaeya yosa alagamo agesuvafeꞌmo lamiꞌna alagepa yosamoꞌmo alagamo neꞌaeya yosa hoyafiꞌmo maiꞌnove. Nofiꞌmo alagepa huno haneꞌnifi pamagalanati yosamoꞌa ause heꞌnifi huꞌna agesuvafeꞌmo lamiꞌnove.
Nagesamo oꞌafiꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo malage huno nagupi mafaꞌnemoꞌa alino he tino nateꞌnigeꞌna aliꞌna namalagiteꞌnaeꞌmo visuvafeꞌmo nehuve. Hapauꞌnisiya vayaꞌnilefeꞌmo hosimoꞌmo halaulino neꞌviya talalagana huno alino ha maleno nateꞌniye, huno huꞌniye.
Yulusalemu a kanomogae, huꞌa, Aika atagi neka eno. Kagaemo atagi neka egetao lagaemo kageno, huꞌa ha paiꞌnae. Yulusalemu a kanomo agesayana na agufa a kanomo agegae. Agaemo lole nofi ati vayakana huno maiꞌniya a kanomo agegae, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Kini vekamo aꞌmafaꞌneꞌamogae, huno, kagaemo kaiyaleꞌmo suꞌmo vaika aliꞌnana kaiyaꞌmoꞌmo magoꞌe huno kanale kaiyamo haneꞌniye. Kaumiꞌyamo aeno hapaiꞌniya yaꞌe kaleꞌyamo aeno hapaiꞌniya yaꞌeꞌmo alopa moniletiꞌmo miya nefaiya yafaꞌmo ani kava huno alagepa huno ageꞌniya vekamoꞌa alo huꞌniya yafakana huno haneꞌniye.
Kagae kaipamo folagapiꞌmo mago kapugana huno haneꞌniye. Ani kapufiꞌmo nofi alagafati aniꞌmo havai teꞌniye. Kaipamo alagepa kanale kaipamoꞌmo ani kava huno vitimo aliniꞌeꞌa magokepi aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maleꞌnaya vitimo yaveyave ausemo folagapiꞌmo haneꞌniya vitigana huno haneꞌniye.
Kagaemo lole nukalaꞌmoꞌa ani kava huno lole kanale afela afulaꞌmo lagoꞌya afela afulakana huno haneꞌniye.
Lugokamoꞌmo mago yatala vegovego noꞌmo yaveyave nokana huno haneꞌniye. Kaulagalaꞌmoꞌa lole ani kotutalaꞌmo Hesimoni taonimo yafa lafi kegiꞌya kate kipateꞌmo haneꞌniya ani kotutalakana huno haneꞌniye. Kagaemo kagoꞌyamo kanale kagoꞌyamo Lemanoni yahaofiꞌmo yatala nokana huno haneꞌniye. Kava neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogimo ani nopiꞌmo maiꞌneꞌa Namakasi taonifi maiꞌnaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo aulu hapaeꞌa apakeꞌa yagaiꞌa neꞌmaiye.
Kagenopamoꞌmo Kameli avegana huno haneꞌniye. Kayokaꞌmo okokana agufa kayokaꞌmo haneꞌniye, huno ha paiꞌniye. Agaemo kini vekamo atafauꞌnigeno haiteꞌa emiꞌeteꞌa nehaya yateꞌmo maiꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya a kanomogae, huno, alagi kanale a kanomo maiꞌnane. Muki yaꞌakamoꞌmo namogaga aisuva agufa kavaꞌmo nehiye.
He tika maikaeꞌmo alagi alagepa huno api aino haneꞌniya kokanasi yosagana huka he tika maiꞌnane. Nukamoꞌmo ani agufa yosa alagagana huno haneꞌniye.
Nagaemo, Ani yosafiꞌmo haiꞌna yosa akopaleꞌmo atafauguve, huꞌna huꞌnove. Haiꞌna maisugeno nukamoꞌmo nofi alagamoꞌa magokepi akalo akalo huno nehaneya kava huno hanegaiye. Kavayafatiꞌmo apoli yosa alagamoꞌa kanale atumo neꞌaiya agufa atumo aigiye.
Kavayamo nofi alagafati aniꞌmo hogote anikana huno hanegaiye, huno ha paiꞌniye. Ani nofi alagafati aniꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnilefeꞌmo haneꞌniye. Ani aniꞌmoꞌa hagaꞌageꞌmo huꞌniye. Apaukalegekana huꞌa neꞌmaiya vayaꞌmogimo neꞌneꞌapaeꞌmo ge nehae.
Nagaemo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimo aꞌamo maiꞌnogeno nagaefeꞌmo haꞌye nehiye, huno huꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimogae, huno, nagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeka egetaꞌao malaga uguꞌae. Utaꞌa alu aise taonifiꞌe alu aise taonifiꞌeꞌmo havaegauꞌae.
Havaetetaꞌaeꞌmo kotilamisiyapiꞌmo he titaꞌa nofi hoyalegamo utaꞌaeꞌmo nofiꞌmoꞌa ago ausisimo aeꞌnisifi auseꞌamo ago aino ata leꞌnisifi pamagalanati yosamoꞌa ago ause heꞌnisifigetaꞌa utaꞌa agegauꞌae. Maiꞌnetaꞌaeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya kavaꞌnimo aliꞌna kave liguve.
Alagepa kahaumo ausemoꞌa alagepa atumo neꞌaiye. Nagaemo alagepa yosa alagamo aliꞌna muki yafa lafi kegiꞌya kate kipaꞌaleꞌmo maleꞌnove. Magoꞌamo akeyaꞌvilaga alige magoꞌamo hemenimo alige huꞌna aliꞌna anupa huꞌna maleꞌnove. Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimogae, huno, kagaetefeꞌmo aliꞌna anupa huꞌna maleꞌnove, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Nasaꞌnimoꞌa itaꞌnimo nuꞌaleꞌmo neꞌniya nasaꞌnimogagana huka maisanafeꞌmo nahauꞌniye. Nasaꞌnimogamo maiꞌnanesinana kumatega kageteꞌnaeꞌmo kahaeꞌna neꞌnesugenoꞌaeꞌmo mago vekamoꞌa ani kavafeꞌmo hosu agesamo afaꞌa oꞌafiyesine.
Inagi nagaemo kagaemo kavaleliꞌna itaꞌnimo notegamo visugekaeꞌmo kagaemo alagepa huka afaꞌa alika naya malegane. Nagaemo nofi alagafati anipiꞌmo alagepa haga nehiya yaꞌmo aliꞌna ateteꞌna alo huꞌna kamiguve, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Hoga ayatetiꞌmo nageyutega maleꞌneno lamaga ayatetiꞌmo nagufaleꞌmo natafauꞌniye.
Yulusalemu aꞌmafaꞌne anagane, huno, lokiya gefatiꞌmo huꞌnaeꞌmo, afela afu anagaꞌmogi koli hutaleꞌa apaune nehaya afuꞌaifeꞌmo lapakesamo afitetapa nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya a kanomo aupatiꞌmo haunetapa oꞌateyo. Agaiꞌamo hauꞌninageno aupatiꞌmo he tigiye, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Ina laꞌamoꞌmo yahaofilagatiꞌmo eno hau ayamopafiꞌmo hauꞌniya vekaꞌamo agufaleꞌmo atafautegeꞌana kako kiliꞌana haiꞌana neꞌaꞌae, huꞌa huꞌnae. Kagaemo apoli yosamo aepafiꞌmo havaeꞌnanageꞌna kahauneꞌna kateꞌnove. Itakamoꞌmo ani yosa aepafiꞌmo alino kateꞌniye. Alino kateꞌniya a kanomoꞌmo ani yosa aepafiꞌmo alino kateꞌniye, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Mago vekamoꞌa alagena kavaꞌamo hu neꞌmaleya kava huka nagaemo alika kaipafiꞌmo alagena kavaꞌmo hugekana huka hu malo. Ani kava huka nagaemo alika kayamoteꞌmo alagena kavaꞌmo hugekana huka hu malo. Ani kavatefeꞌmo nahau nayamopafiꞌmo nahauꞌniya kavaꞌmo lokiyaꞌamoꞌmo fali kavaꞌmo lokiyaꞌagana huno haneꞌniye. Nagaefeꞌmo hau ayamopafiꞌmo ohauꞌnifi, huꞌna nagesamo neꞌafuva kavaꞌmoꞌa nefaliya kavakana huno haneꞌniye. Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya kavaꞌmo atagana huno nele. He, lusi kava huno nele.
Hau ayamopafiꞌmo nehaiya kavaꞌmoꞌa atagana huno neleyanageno aniꞌmoꞌa afaꞌa aeno yu osegaiye. Aniꞌmo hesiyaꞌmoꞌmo alagi aeno ati okaegaiye. Mago vekamoꞌmo a kanoeꞌmo, Nagaefeꞌmo kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahausiyafeꞌmo muki moniꞌaniletiꞌmo miya faiguve, huno ha paisigenoꞌaeꞌmo, afaꞌa ina agufa yane, huno huteno hosu aipamo kaligiye, huno huꞌniye.
Lasatimoꞌmo aise aꞌmafaꞌnemo maiꞌnigeno nuꞌamo oꞌmeꞌniye. Mago vekamoꞌmo aligefeꞌmo hisigetaeꞌmo agaetegamo na agufa kavaꞌmo hugune, huno apafi geꞌniye.
Agaemo alagepa huno taonilefeꞌmo yafa lafi kegiꞌyagana huno maiꞌnisigetaeꞌmo lagaemo ani yafa lafi kegiꞌyaleꞌmo siluva yafatetiꞌmo yatala noꞌmo kime kime haigune. Agaemo kitagana huno maiꞌnisigetaeꞌmo lagaemo agaeteꞌmo lokiya sita yosaletiꞌmo noꞌamo kigune, huꞌa ha paiꞌnae.
Nagaemo mago yafa lafi kegiꞌyagana huꞌna maiꞌnogeno nuꞌnimoꞌa lole yatala vegovego notalakana huno haneꞌniye. Ani afinaꞌmo fiku naha maeꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo aulagaleꞌmo alagepa huꞌna maiꞌnove, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Kini vekamo Salomoniꞌa nofi hoyaꞌamo Malihamoni kotega haneꞌniye. Agaemo hoyaꞌaleꞌmo yagaiꞌa atesayafeꞌmo apavaleno apateꞌniye. Apakaemo nofi alagamo alisayafeꞌmo muki vayaꞌamogimo vani tauseni vani tauseni huꞌa siluva yafatetiꞌmo miya faiꞌa amisaya kavaꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Hoyaꞌnimo nagaiꞌni hoyamo naulagaleꞌmo haneꞌniye. O Salomonigae, huno, vani tauseni siluva yafaꞌmo alitesanageꞌa hoyaleꞌmo neꞌyagaiya vayaꞌmogi tu hataleti tu hataleti huꞌa aligae.
Hoyafiꞌmo neꞌmaina aꞌnimogae, huno, kagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌa maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo kagemo neꞌafiye. Kagemo aigeꞌna afino, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Nahau nayamopafiꞌmo neꞌnahaiya vekaꞌnimogae, huno, malage huka emikeno. Mago alagepa afela afumoꞌa alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yaꞌmo havai teno haneꞌniya avelegamo nagu nagu huno haine neꞌeya kava huka emikeno, huno ha paiꞌniye.












































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa Yonaꞌmo Amitai mafaꞌneeꞌmo ha painoꞌaeꞌmo,
Alo huka alopa taonimo Niniva taonifiꞌmo uka ge hapauvo. Lusi hosu kavaꞌmo nehageꞌna apakeꞌnove, huno ha paiꞌniyaꞌmonanafa
Yonaꞌa Ala kava netegatiꞌmo ataleno aune hetaleno Tasisi taonifiꞌmo ugefeꞌmo huꞌniye. Ataleno uno Yopa taonifiꞌmo lamino Tasisi taonifiꞌmo ugefe huꞌniya sipimo miya faiteno sipifiꞌmo haino maiꞌniye. Yonaꞌa Ala kava netegatiꞌmo ataleno aune hetaleno uꞌniye.
Aune hetaleno neꞌvigenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa lusi lokiya yasimo alino ateꞌnigeno solovala aniteꞌmo alinino eꞌniye. Lusi yasimo alige ko aige huꞌnigeno aniꞌmoꞌa aino holakau holakau huno sipimo aeno atava aisiya agufa kavaꞌmo huꞌniye.
Sipifiꞌmo aliꞌya neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogi lusi kava huꞌa apamoꞌya aiꞌa hapausoli huteꞌapaeꞌmo gotiꞌapimogifeꞌmo apamete apamete huꞌa, laha mao laha mao, huꞌa keya aeꞌnae. Sipimoꞌmo kana osisiyafeꞌmo sipifiꞌmo haneꞌniya kagemi yaꞌmo aliꞌa anipiꞌmo yaga auꞌa ataleꞌnae. Ani kava huꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Yonaꞌa anagamo oꞌmaiꞌnifa sipimo afepilagamo lamino au kaleno maiꞌniye.
Sipifiꞌmo aliꞌya neꞌaliya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya vekamoꞌa ageyana Yonaꞌa afaꞌageꞌmo au kaleno maiꞌnigeno agetenoꞌaeꞌmo, Na kava higekaeꞌmo kau kaleka maiꞌnane. He tika kagaika gotikamofeꞌmo keya aeka ge huvo. Ofalisunafeꞌmo afiteno laha maesifi laha oꞌmaesifigi ge huka afi go, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Sipifiꞌmo aliꞌya neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogi apakaiꞌapi apakaiꞌapimo huꞌapaeꞌmo, Lagitimo avoꞌmo kaeteta kupiꞌmo ai maleꞌneta kupatiꞌmo ina la agimo alisupi mani neꞌaluna hanageke yaꞌmo aepa vekamo agaemae, huta agegaune, huꞌa huꞌnae. Ani kava huteꞌa Yona agimo aliꞌnae.
Apakaemo Yonafeꞌmo, Mani neꞌaluna hanageke yaꞌmo aepa vekaꞌamo ina laꞌae. Na kava higekaeꞌmo sipifiꞌmo maiꞌnane. Kagaemo haiya kotega vekamo maiꞌnane. Haiya nofi vayapati vekamo maiꞌnane, huꞌa loka huꞌa afi geꞌnae.
Afi geꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo, Himulu nofi vekamo maiꞌnove. Ala kava neꞌmo kokuꞌnapi neꞌmaiya Gotiꞌmo solovala aniꞌe mopaꞌeꞌmo alo huꞌniya Gotifeꞌmo mono nehuva vekamo maiꞌnove huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Ani gemo afiteꞌapaeꞌmo sipifiꞌmo aliꞌya neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogi lusi kava huꞌa apamoꞌya aiteꞌa, Kagaemo lusi hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnane, huꞌa ha paiꞌnae. Hogoteno yasimo oꞌaliꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo Yonaꞌa, Nagaemo Ala kava netegatiꞌmo ataleꞌna naune hetaleꞌna neꞌove, huno hapa paiꞌnigeꞌa ago afiꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo lusi hosu kavaꞌmo huꞌnane, huꞌa ha paiꞌnae.
Solovala aniꞌmoꞌa lusi kava huno ayamukiki huno magoꞌe magoꞌe huno aino holakau holakau huꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo sipifiꞌmo aliꞌya neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogi Yonafeꞌmo, Kagaetegamo na kava hisunageno aniꞌmo afaꞌa hanesigeta ugune, huꞌa afi geꞌnageno
Yonaꞌa, nasagautapa yaga auta natalegenoꞌao aniꞌmo afaꞌa haneno, huno hapa paiꞌniye. Ago afiꞌnovana aniꞌmoꞌa lapakaetegamo lusi kava huno aino holakau holakau nehiya kavaꞌmo aepa vekamo nagaekeꞌmo maiꞌnove, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Sipifiꞌmo aliꞌya neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogimo ani agiꞌnaleꞌmo visayafeꞌmo latapa kayotetiꞌmo apaya mukiki huꞌa aniꞌmo avaleꞌa apakamelaga ataleme ataleme uꞌnayana ani agiꞌnaleꞌmo malage huꞌa oꞌuꞌnageno yasimo alige aniꞌmoꞌa magoꞌe magoꞌe huno aino holakau holakau huge huno maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo afaꞌa oꞌuꞌnae.
Apakaemo Ala kava nefeꞌmo, Ala kava nene, huꞌa, Mani vekamo asagauta anipiꞌmo yaga auta atalegaunaꞌmofeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo anonaꞌatimo alagi olategeta afaꞌa maino. Vayaꞌmo neꞌapamagiya vayaꞌmo agoti huka neꞌapatana kava huka agoti huka olato. Ala kava nene, Kagaemo ani kavaꞌmo alika lave liꞌnane, huꞌa ha paiteꞌa
Yonaꞌmo asagauꞌa anipiꞌmo yaga auꞌa ataleꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo aniꞌmo aino holakau holakau osuno afaꞌa haneꞌniye.
Sipifiꞌmo aliꞌya neꞌaliya vayaꞌmogi ani kavaꞌmo ageteꞌapaeꞌmo Ala kava nefeꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa koli huteꞌa afumo amagiꞌa Gotiꞌmo ofalinimo amiteꞌa mago alagepa kavaꞌmo hisayafeꞌmo magoke magoke vayaꞌmogi, ina kava hugune, ma kava hugune, huꞌa hute hute huꞌnae.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa alopa noyamemo alino ateꞌnigeno uno aka huꞌneno Yonaꞌmo alino nakaitalegeno lamino loleꞌe magoꞌe felugaꞌe haniꞌilagaꞌeꞌmo noyamemo agupafiꞌmo maiꞌniye.
Yonaꞌa noyamemo agupafiꞌmo maiꞌnenoꞌaeꞌmo Ala kava neꞌmo Gotiꞌamofeꞌmo nunumu huꞌniye.
Nunumu hunoꞌaeꞌmo, Ala kava nene, Alopa hanageke yaꞌmo aliꞌneꞌna naipafiꞌmo lusi kava huno nagafu kiꞌnigeꞌnaeꞌmo kagaefeꞌmo keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogekaeꞌmo geꞌnileꞌmo aeka atagaina hukaeꞌmo naha maeꞌnane. Nagaemo faliꞌnaya vayaꞌmo uꞌa maiꞌnaya kotegaeꞌmo agiꞌamo Siyo kotegatiꞌmo, naha mao, huꞌna keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogekaeꞌmo geꞌnimo afiꞌnane.
Kagaemo alika yaga auka nataleꞌnanageꞌna emiꞌneꞌna solovala aniꞌmo afepilagamo maiꞌnove. Aniꞌmoꞌa faino ku aiteno alagi aeno nati kaeꞌniye. Aniꞌmoꞌa lusi kava huno ayamukiki huteno aino holakau huno aeno naga seteno aeno nati kaeꞌniye.
Ago alika naha faika nataleꞌnanaꞌmonanafa halate kagae aote mono nofeꞌmo aulu hegauve.
Aniꞌmoꞌa aeno naga seno aeno nati kaeꞌnigeꞌna navamusaꞌmo noꞌauve. Solovalapi kahaumoꞌmo nagenopaleꞌmo kino nati kaeꞌniye.
Nagaemo ave aiyafiꞌmo emiꞌneꞌnogenoꞌaeꞌmo kaꞌnimo akanino nateꞌneno natafauno nateꞌniyaꞌmonanafa kagaemo Ala kava neꞌnimogamo nagufamo kasalisiya kelifatiꞌmo navalelika haikeka nateꞌnane.
Ala kava nene, Falisuva agufa naipamo kaliꞌniye, huꞌna huteꞌna kagaefekeꞌmo nagesamo afiꞌna ho huteꞌna nunumu huꞌnova geꞌnimoꞌmo kagae aote mono nopiꞌmo faleno haiꞌniye.
Aigofe gotiꞌapimogifeꞌmo mono nehaya vayaꞌmogi kahau huka apatesana Gotigamo ago kataleꞌnae.
Kataleꞌnayaꞌmonanafa yokemo huꞌna kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huguve. Mago ofalinimo kamigekana huꞌna navayafatiꞌmo kagikaleꞌmo aliꞌna asaga huguve. Ani kava huguve, huꞌna nagoꞌya ataleꞌna kaha paiꞌnova gemo amagiꞌna oꞌatalegauve. Ala kava neꞌmokeꞌmo vayaꞌai apakufamo alino katino neꞌapate, huno nunumu huꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa noyameeꞌmo ha paigeno uno ani agiꞌnaleꞌmo Yonaꞌmo mu valino ateꞌniye.
Halate Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa Yonafeꞌmo, Alo huka alopa taonimo Niniva taonifiꞌmo uka ago kaha paiꞌnova gemo aeka hakalo huka hapa paiyo, huno ha paiꞌniye.
<range>
Ha paiꞌnigeno Yonaꞌa Ala kava neꞌmo geꞌamo afiteno alo huno Niniva taonifiꞌmo uꞌniye. Niniva taonimo alopa taonimo haneꞌniye. Mago vekamoꞌa ani taonifiꞌmo magokayaga atupalegatiꞌmo usiyana loleꞌe magoꞌe felugaꞌe haniꞌilagaꞌeꞌmo maime maime uno magokayaga atupalegamo avaꞌyi hisiya agufa alopa taonimo haneꞌniye.
Yonaꞌa ani taonimo magokayaga atupalegatiꞌmo uno magoke felugamo maiteno uno taoni folagapiꞌmo muki vayaꞌaifeꞌmo, Fotiꞌa afinaꞌmo utesigeno Gotiꞌa Niniva taonimo alino hano huno ataleteno alino lapagoꞌya lagauno lapatalegaiye, huno aeno hakalo huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Niniva taonifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo Goti geꞌamo ani gemo afiteꞌapaeꞌmo, lama gemo huꞌniye, huteꞌa apakesa afiꞌa fatago huꞌnae. Lagaemo ina agufa vayaꞌmogitaꞌe ala lagi vayaꞌmogitaꞌeꞌmo laipamo alita afe leteta neꞌyaꞌmo mosiꞌneta kogu agufa kukenamo alita vaiteta maigune, huꞌa huꞌnae.
Ala kini vekaꞌapimo Niniva vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya vekamoꞌa ani gemo afitenoꞌaeꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya siateꞌmo fai maiꞌniyatetiꞌmo he tino vailiꞌneno yagaino neꞌapateya kukenaꞌamo asagino maleteno kogu kukenamo alino vaiteno laꞌnefafiꞌmo itopale maiꞌniye.
Agaemo mago keꞌaepa gemo huteno Niniva vayaꞌaitegamo ataleꞌnigeno uneno huꞌniye. Ani gemo hunoꞌaeꞌmo, Ala vekatapimoꞌnaꞌe yahauve vayaꞌeꞌmo keꞌaepa gemo hu maleꞌnone. Ani gemo hutaeꞌmo, Muki vayaꞌamogitapamogi pulumakagi sipisipimogi hutapa aniꞌmo oꞌnege neꞌyaꞌmo oꞌnege hutetapa afaꞌa mositapa maiyo.
Muki vayaꞌamogitapamo kogu agufa kukenamo alita vaitetapa afumo kogu kukenamo alita kofitapa apateyo. Gotifeꞌmo lokiya vaitapa nunumu hiyo. Muki vayaꞌamogitapamo lapaote lapaote hutapa hosu kavatapimo ataletetapa vayaꞌmo neꞌapamagiya kavaꞌe kaveta nehaya kavaꞌeꞌmo ataletetapa maiyo.
Gotiꞌa ani kavaꞌmo huguve, huno huꞌniya geꞌe aipamo leno lateꞌniya kavaꞌeꞌmo atalesifi oꞌatalesifigeta ofalisunafeꞌmo amalageka huta agegaune, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Ani kava huꞌa hosu kavaꞌapimo ataleꞌnageno Gotiꞌa apaketenoꞌaeꞌmo aipa agesamo alino afe leteno ani kavaꞌmo huguve, huno hapa paiꞌniya kavaꞌmo osuno ataleꞌniye.
Gotiꞌa huꞌniya kavafeꞌmo Yonaꞌa alagi ohauꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo aipamo leꞌniye.
Yonaꞌa nunumu hunoꞌaeꞌmo, Ala kava nene, huno, Koꞌnimo ataleꞌna oꞌmeꞌnova afinaꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo hugane, huꞌna huꞌnofiye. He, ani gemo ago huꞌnove. Ani kavaꞌmo hugane, huꞌna nagesamo afiꞌnovaꞌmofeꞌmo ataleꞌna naune hetaleꞌna Tasisi taonifiꞌmo ugefeꞌmo huꞌnove. Ago afiꞌnovana kagaemo fiku hapa maeka apamiteka kahau huka neꞌapatana Gotigamo maiꞌnane. Kaipamo malage huno nole. Kahau kayamopafiꞌmo kahauꞌniya kavaꞌmo asole kavakamo haneꞌniye. Kagaemo vayaꞌmo apamagisanafeꞌmo okahauꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo kaipa kagesamo alika afe nelane.
Ani kava nehanaꞌmofeꞌmo Ala kava nene, huꞌna, Hemenimo afaꞌa neꞌmauva yaꞌnileꞌmo aligeꞌna ago falino. Afaꞌa maisuvana kanale osugiye. Kanale kavanageꞌna afaꞌa faliguve, huno nunumu huꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa, Yonao, huno, Kaipamo neleya kavakamoꞌa kanale kavaꞌmo nehapiye, huno afi geꞌniye.
Yonaꞌa taonifatiꞌmo ataleno malaga lamino yegemo haine neꞌeya kategamo uno uluna noꞌmo kiteno ulunapiꞌmo maiꞌneno taonifiꞌmo na agufa kavaꞌmo afole aisifi huno agava maiꞌneno ageno maiꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmo Gotiꞌa yegemo oꞌalesigeno ulunapiꞌmo maisiyafeꞌmo nofifeꞌmo, hago, huno huꞌnigeno nofiꞌmo hageteno no yosaleꞌmo kino haiꞌniye. Yonaꞌa ani nofifeꞌmo lusi kava huno amuse huꞌniye.
Egamo kotilamiyapiꞌmo Gotiꞌa mago kafamo alino kayo ateꞌnigeno eno nofipiꞌmo neꞌnigeno falu teꞌniye.
Yegemo haineteno leꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo Gotiꞌa amuko yasimo alino ateꞌnigeno amuko yasi alige yegemoꞌmo Yona agenopaleꞌmo alege huꞌnigeno Yonaꞌa aulagamoꞌmo atete huteno kalafe kalafe huꞌnigeno faligefeꞌmo huꞌniye. Yonaꞌa Gotifeꞌmo, Faliguve. Afaꞌa maisuvana kanale osugiye. Kanale kavanageꞌna afaꞌa faliguve, huno ha paiꞌnigeno
Gotiꞌa, Nofiꞌmo falu teꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo kaipamo leꞌnigeka kanale kavaꞌmo nehapiye, huno afi geꞌnigenoꞌaeꞌmo, he, naipamo lusi kava huno leꞌnigeꞌna alagepa kavaꞌmo nehuve. Afaꞌa faligesuve, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa, Ani nofiteꞌmo yagaika oꞌatege alagepa huno hanesiyafeꞌmo aliꞌyaꞌmo oꞌalige huka maiꞌnane. Ani nofiꞌmo magoke haniꞌilagamo malage huno hageteno alu haniꞌilagamo ago falu teꞌniye. Ani aise nofiꞌmo ina agufa nofifeꞌmo kahau huka neꞌatane.
Ani kava huꞌna Niniva vayaꞌaifeꞌmo nahau huꞌna neꞌapatove. Niniva taonifiꞌmo lusi asole nute mafaꞌne anagaꞌmo vani hataleti tuveti tauseniꞌamo (120,000) maige asole afumo maige huꞌa maiꞌnae, huno ha paiꞌniye.





















































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Yesu Kalaisiꞌa Nevini aginago neꞌmo maiꞌnigeno Neviniꞌa Emalehamu aginago neꞌmo maiꞌniye. Yesu Kalaisi aginago vayaꞌai apakiꞌapimo haneꞌniye.
Emalehamuꞌa Aisikiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Aisikiꞌa Yekopuꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Yekopuꞌa Yutaꞌe konagaꞌamogiꞌeꞌmo alino apateꞌnigeꞌanaeꞌmo
Yutaꞌe Tamaꞌeꞌmo mago lagoꞌya mafaꞌnelaꞌmo Pelesiꞌe Silaꞌeꞌmo aliꞌana anateꞌnaꞌae. Itaꞌanimoꞌmo Tamaꞌa maiꞌniye. Pelesiꞌa Hesaloniꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Hesaloniꞌa Lamaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Lamaꞌa Aminatapiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Aminatapiꞌa Nasoniꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Nasoniꞌa Salimoniꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeꞌanaeꞌmo
Salimoniꞌe Lehepiꞌeꞌmo Movasiꞌmo aliꞌana ateꞌnaꞌageꞌanaeꞌmo Movasiꞌe Lutiꞌeꞌmo Ometiꞌmo aliꞌana ateꞌnaꞌageno Ometiꞌa Yesiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Yesiꞌa Neviniꞌmo ala neꞌapimo yagaino neꞌapateya kini neꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeꞌana Neviniꞌe hogoteno Yulaiyateꞌmo maiꞌniya a kanoꞌeꞌmo Salomoniꞌmo aliꞌana ateꞌnaꞌageno
Salomoniꞌa Liyamoamuꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Liyamoamuꞌa Amaisaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Amaisaꞌa Esaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Esaꞌa Yehosafatiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Yehosafatiꞌa Yolamuꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Yolamuꞌa Asaiyaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Asaiyaꞌa Yotamiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Yotamiꞌa Enasiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Enasiꞌa Hesekaiyaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Hesekaiyaꞌa Manasaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Manasaꞌa Emoniꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Emoniꞌa Yosaiyaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Yosaiyaꞌa Yekonaiyaꞌe konagaꞌamogiꞌeꞌmo kame vayaꞌapimogi Isaleli vayaꞌmo apavaleli uꞌa Mamiloni kotegamo apateꞌnaya afinaꞌmo alino apateꞌniye.
Kame vayaꞌapimogimo apavaleli uꞌa Mamiloni kotegamo apateꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Yekonaiyaꞌa Siyalitiyeliꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Siyalitiyeliꞌa Selamameliꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Selamameliꞌa Amaitaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Amaitaꞌa Elaiyakimiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Elaiyakimiꞌa Esoꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Esoꞌa Setokiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Setokiꞌa Ekimiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Ekimiꞌa Elaiyatiꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Elaiyatiꞌa Eliyesaꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Eliyesaꞌa Mataniꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Mataniꞌa Yekopuꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno
Yekopuꞌa Yosefeꞌmo Maliya anauꞌamoꞌmo alino ateꞌnigeno Maliyaꞌa Yesuꞌmo Gotiꞌa lekana paino ateꞌniya vekamo agiꞌamo Kalaisiꞌmo alino ateꞌniye.
Ani kava huꞌa Emalehamu mafaꞌnelupatiꞌmo afole aiꞌnaya aginago vayaꞌmo fotiniꞌa vayaꞌmo afole aiteꞌa faliteꞌa hume hume neꞌagenoꞌaeꞌmo henagaꞌamo Neviniꞌa afole aiꞌniye. Neviniꞌa afole aitegeꞌa ani kava huꞌa fotiniꞌa aginago vayaꞌmo afole aiteꞌa faliteꞌa hume hume neꞌageꞌapaeꞌmo Mamiloni kotegamo apavaleli uꞌa apateꞌnageꞌa maiꞌnae. Mamiloni kotega maiꞌnaya afinatetiꞌmo ani kava huꞌa fotiniꞌa aginago vayaꞌmo afole aiteꞌa faliteꞌa hume hume neꞌagenoꞌaeꞌmo Kalaisiꞌa anileꞌmo afole aiꞌniye.
Yesu Kalaisiꞌa itaꞌamoꞌmo alino ateꞌniya kavaꞌmo ina kavaꞌmo huno afole aiꞌniye. Yosefeꞌa Maliyaꞌmo lekana pai maleꞌniyaꞌmonanafa agaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeꞌana ohavaeꞌnaꞌagenoꞌaeꞌmo aote Aunemeꞌamoꞌmo aipaguꞌmo amiꞌnigeno ageꞌniye.
Yosefeꞌa Maliyaꞌmo lekana pai maleꞌniya vekamo alagepa neꞌmo maiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo, ava gemo hisugeno avagage hisiyafeꞌmo oꞌnahauꞌniyanageꞌna afaꞌa ategauve, huno agesa afiꞌniye.
Agesamo afiteno, alagamuna ageyana Ala kava neꞌmo enisole neꞌamo agaetegamo emineꞌnigeno ageꞌniye. Enisole neꞌmoꞌa ha painoꞌaeꞌmo, Nevini aginago Yosefeyo, huno, aote Aunemeꞌamoꞌmo aipaguꞌmo amiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo akamo Maliyaꞌa alisanafeꞌmo koli osuvo.
Agaemo ve mafaꞌnemo alino atesigenoꞌaeꞌmo ani mafaꞌnemoꞌa vayaꞌamo hosu kavapatiꞌmo apakufamo alino katino apategaiyaꞌmofeꞌmo agiꞌamo Yesuꞌae huka ato, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaetegati gemo alinineno aeno hakalo huno hapa nepaiya vekamo avayafatiꞌmo huꞌniya gemo afole aisiyafeꞌmo ani kavaꞌmo afole aiꞌniye.
Agaemo hapa painoꞌaeꞌmo, Veꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeno ohavaeꞌnisiya aꞌmafaꞌnemoꞌa aipaguꞌeꞌmo maiteno ve mafaꞌnemo alino ategaiye. Agiꞌamo Imaniyuveliꞌae huꞌa aegae, huno avoꞌmo kae maleꞌniye. Imaniyuveliꞌae agimo aepaꞌamo Gotiꞌa lagaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeno neꞌmaiye.
Yosefeꞌa aupatiꞌmo he tino enisole neꞌmoꞌa ha paiꞌniya gemo akame huno uno Maliyaꞌmo aliꞌniyaꞌmonanafa
agaeꞌeꞌmo magokepi lokaeno ohavaeno aote maime maime neꞌegenoꞌaeꞌmo mafaꞌnemo alino ateꞌniye. Yosefeꞌa mafaꞌneꞌamo agiꞌamo Yesuꞌae, huno ateꞌniye.
Maliyaꞌa Yesuꞌmo Metelehamu taonifiꞌmo Yuta kotegamo Helotiꞌa kini neꞌmo maiꞌneno vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino neꞌapateya afinaꞌmo alino ateꞌniye. Alino ateꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo kanefiꞌmo alagepa huꞌa neꞌagaya vayaꞌmo yegemo haine neꞌeya kotegatiꞌmo eꞌa Yulusalemu taonifiꞌmo avaꞌyi huteꞌapaeꞌmo,
Yu vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaino apatesiya kini neꞌmo saufamo alino ateꞌniya mafaꞌnemo haiyaꞌaleꞌmo maiꞌniye. Lagaemo agae kanefiꞌmo yegemo haine neꞌeya kotegatiꞌmo ageteta agaefeꞌmo mono hisunafeꞌmo agaetegamo neꞌone, huꞌa huꞌnae.
Helotiꞌa yagaino neꞌapateya kini neꞌmoꞌa ani gemo afitenoꞌaeꞌmo hausoli huꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo muki Yulusalemu taonifiꞌmo maiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogiꞌeꞌmo ani kava huꞌa hapausoli huꞌnae.
Helotiꞌa mono huꞌa neꞌapataya vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaiꞌa neꞌapataya vayaꞌaifenagi keꞌaepa gemo avoꞌmo kaeꞌa aliꞌa apaya neꞌmalaya vayaꞌaifenagi huno keya aeno ge huꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo, Kalaisi neꞌmo haiya kotegatiꞌmo afole aigiye huꞌa huꞌnae, huno apafi geꞌnigeꞌapaeꞌmo,
Metelehamu taonimo Yuta kotegatiꞌmo afole aigiye. Gotitegati gemo alinineno aeno hakalo huno hapa nepaiya vekamoꞌa hunoꞌaeꞌmo,
Kagaemo Metelehamu taoniyo, huno, Yuta kotega taoniyo, huno, vayaꞌmogimo sipisipileꞌmo neꞌyagaiya kava huno Isaleli vayaꞌnileꞌmo yagaino apatesiya neꞌmo kagaepatiꞌmo afole aigiyaꞌmofeꞌmo Yuta vayaꞌaiteꞌmo yagaiꞌa neꞌapataya vayaꞌai apaulagaleꞌmo afa taonimo ohaneꞌnanageꞌa muki taonimogi aeꞌa kaga oseꞌnae, huno avoꞌmo kae maleꞌniye, huꞌa ha paiꞌnae.
Ha paiꞌnageno ani gemo afitenoꞌaeꞌmo ageteꞌa afiꞌnaya vayaꞌaifeꞌmo fala kino ge huꞌnigeꞌa eꞌa aliꞌa anupa huꞌa maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo, hainu afinaꞌmo kanefiꞌmo afole aiꞌniye, huno apafi geꞌniye.
Agaemo Metelehamu taonifilagamo alino apatetenoꞌaeꞌmo, alagepa hutapa uteta hutapa kahauya hutapa ani mafaꞌnemo agetapa avateyo. Nagaeꞌeꞌmo uꞌna mono hisuvafeꞌmo agetetapaeꞌmo etapa naha paiyo, huno hapa paiꞌniye.
Ani gemo afiteꞌapaeꞌmo atale uꞌa agayana hogoteꞌa yegemo haine neꞌeya kotegatiꞌmo ageꞌnaya kanefiꞌmo halate uno hogoteꞌnigeꞌa ageꞌnageno uno saufa mafaꞌnemo maiꞌniya yateꞌmo haneꞌniye.
Haneꞌnigeꞌa ageteꞌapaeꞌmo lusi kava huꞌa apamogaga aime aime uꞌnae.
Apakaemo nopiꞌmo haiꞌa anakayana mafaꞌneꞌaꞌe itaꞌamoꞌmo Maliyaꞌeꞌmo maiꞌnaꞌageꞌa anaketeꞌapaeꞌmo apaleꞌya faiꞌneꞌa ape huꞌa Yesufeꞌmo mono huꞌnae. Kesiꞌapifatiꞌmo yakiꞌa goli yafanagi lusi moniletiꞌmo miya nefaiya yaꞌmo aliꞌa atafiꞌmo kaeꞌnageno alagepa atumo neꞌaiya yanagi alagepa atumo neꞌaiya uvelimogi huꞌa aliꞌa amiꞌnae.
Gotiꞌa alagamuna kategatiꞌmo hapa painoꞌaeꞌmo, Helotitegamo halate atagi netapa oꞌviyo, huno hapa paiꞌnigeꞌa ataleꞌa alu katetiꞌmo koꞌapilegamo uꞌnae.
Apakaemo utageno Yosefeꞌa alagamuna ageꞌniyana Ala kava neꞌmo enisole neꞌamoꞌmo, he tika mafaꞌneꞌaꞌe itaꞌamoꞌeꞌmo anavalelika kaune heka Isipi kotegamo uvo. Helotiꞌa ani mafaꞌnemo amagisiyafeꞌmo kahauya nehiyanagi anavalelika uka Isipi kotegamo nagava maiꞌnegeꞌnao kaha paino, huno ha paiꞌniye.
Yosefeꞌa aupatiꞌmo he tino haniꞌilagamo mafaꞌneꞌaꞌe itaꞌamoꞌeꞌmo anavalelino Isipi kotegamo uꞌniye.
Uꞌa maiꞌnagenoꞌaeꞌmo Helotiꞌa ago faliꞌniye. Ani kava huno Ala kava neꞌmoꞌa agaetegati gemo alinineno aeno hakalo huno hapa nepaiya vekamo avayafatiꞌmo huꞌniya gemo afole aiꞌniye. Ani gemoꞌmo hunoꞌaeꞌmo, Nagaemo keya aeꞌna ge huꞌnogeno mafaꞌneꞌnimo Isipi kotegatiꞌmo eꞌniye, huno avoꞌmo kae maleꞌniye.
Helotiꞌa agesa afiꞌniyana, ageteꞌa afiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo humi nateteꞌa nagesasi huꞌa uꞌnae, huno huteno lusi kava huno aipamo leꞌniye. Agaemo, Metelehamu taonifiꞌe Metelehamu haopalegaꞌeꞌmo uteta hutapa muki ve mafaꞌne anagaꞌmo lole kafugamo oꞌmaiꞌnisaya ve mafaꞌne anagaꞌmo apamagigeꞌa faliyo, huno hapa paiꞌniye. Agaemo ageteꞌa afiꞌnaya vayaꞌmogimo ani afinaꞌmo kanefiꞌmo afole aiꞌnigeta ageꞌnone, huꞌa ha paiꞌnaya geꞌapieꞌmo agesa afiꞌniyaꞌmofeꞌmo ani gemo huꞌniye.
Ani afinaꞌmo Yelemaiyaꞌmo Gotitegati gemo alinineno aeno hakalo huno hapa nepaiya vekamo avayafatiꞌmo huꞌniya gemo afole aiꞌniye.
Ina gemoꞌmo hunoꞌaeꞌmo, Lama taonifatiꞌmo apakemo aiꞌnageꞌa afiꞌnae. Yulagefa aige aviꞌya huge huꞌnageꞌa afiꞌnae. Lesoꞌa mafaꞌne anagaꞌaeꞌmo aviꞌya huno apateꞌniye. Mafaꞌne anagaꞌamo ago faliꞌnayaꞌmofeꞌmo aipamo aliꞌa falu huꞌa atesayafeꞌmo huꞌnayana oꞌafiꞌniye, huno avoꞌmo kae maleꞌniye.
